258b3(rgyud 'grel): po che sna bzhi'i rang bzhin can rtse mo brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa'o// de'i steng du yi ge hUM las byung ba'i sna tshig lha rdo rje/ de'i steng du paM las byung ba'i sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab mo brgyad pa lta ba dang ge sar du gcas pa/ de'i
258b4(rgyud 'grel): dbusu A li kA li sbyor ba'o// de'i dbusu ya~M ge hUM rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin can 'od zer sna tshogs rnam par 'phro bar bsams la/ de yongasu gyur pa las dpal he ru ka nyi ma la bzhugs shing dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang
258b5(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa dur khrod brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o// de nas dur khrod rnams bshad par bya ste rdo rje ra ba'i nang du g.yon skor gyis phyogs thams cad dang / dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams bzhi bzhir brjed par bya ste/ dag tu gtu/
258b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / tshang tshing 'khrigs pa dang / 'ur 'ur 'bar bas khyab pa dang / 'jig su rung ba rnams shar la sogs pa'i phyogasu g.yon skor gyis legs par gnaso// dbang ldan gyi mtsho ma su ni ha dar rgod pa'o// byin za'i mchem/
259a1(rgyud 'grel): su ni nags tshol phun+d+ha sum tshogs pa'o// srin bu'i mtsham su no mun+d+ha pa mi bzung po// rlung gi mar+g+ha ma sun+ti kau l-i ki lo'-i sgra sgrogs pa// rdo rje ra ba'i dur khrod de rnams ni 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyi
259a2(rgyud 'grel): ro langs dang 'byung po 'dus pa tsu sbyang gi sgra sgrogs pa'o// rim pa de ltar gnas pa'i dur khrod brgyad po der shing dang / phyogs skyong ba dang / klu'i dbang po dang / sbyin gyi dbang po rnams la shi ri Sha dang a shwad thA dang / ka kau
259a3(rgyud 'grel): lI dang / tsu tA'i shing ste shar la sogs po'o// b+h+r-i ta dang / ka rany+tsaka dang / la tA pa ra ka ti ka dang / pa ra ti'i ba'o// de bzhin du dbang po dang / nor bdag dang / klu'i dbang po dang / gshin rje dang / dbang ldan dang / byin za dang /
259a4(rgyud 'grel): srin po dbang po dang / rlung bdag go// de bzhin du nor rgyas pa dang / 'jog po dang / stobs kyi rgyu dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma chen po dang / hu lun+ta dang / rigs ldan dang / dung skyong ngo // de bzhin du sgra sgrogs pa dang / rmugs pa dang / mun pa
259a5(rgyud 'grel): can dang / kun tu 'khyil pa dang / 'khrigs pa dang / drag po dang / 'bab pa dang / gang la sprin gyi bdag po ste/ de rnams de bzhin du bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'das zhal bzhi pa/ spyan gsum pa phyag bcu gnyis pa/ dpral
259a6(rgyud 'grel): bar rdo rje 'phreng ba 'dzin pa/ g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pas 'jigs byed chen po dang / dus mtshan dag zhabs kyis mnan pa/ rdo rje phag mo la 'khyud ba'i phyag gnyis kyi rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa/ phyag gzhan gnyis
259b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis glang po chu'i pags pa nA bzar bsnams pa/ g.yas pa'i phyag gsum pa la Da ma ruHbzhi pA la dgu s+yA/ lnga pa la gri gug/ drug pa la mdung rtse gsum pa bsgreng ba/ g.yon pa'i phyag gsum pa la khA T+wAM ga rdo rjes
259b2(rgyud 'grel): mya chen pa/ bzhi pa la khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa/ lnga pa la rdo rje'i zhags pa/ drug pa la tshangs pa'i mgo bo bstim pa/ ral po'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa/ thod pa'i phreng ba'i thod pa can/ zla ba phyed pa 'dzin pa/ sna tshog
259b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbu rgyan can zhal rnam par 'gyur ba/ mche ba gtsigs shing 'jigs par byed pa/ sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa/ sku mdog mthing ga bzhugs par bsam par bya'o// rtsa ba'i zhal mthing
259b4(rgyud 'grel): nag zhal g.yas pa shin tu ser ba/ rgyab pad+ma rA ga'i mdog can/ g.yon murka ta lta bu'i mdog can/ stag gi pags pa'i shams thabs bsnams pa'o// mI'i mgo bo rlon pa'i phreng ba 'phyang po rna cha dang / gdu bu dang /
259b5(rgyud 'grel): mgul rgyun dang / skya rags dang / spyi gtsug nor bus brgyan pa/ mchod phyir thogs pa 'chang ba/ thal ba dang / phyag rgya drug ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug rnam par dag byi'i phyir phyag rgya drug gis rgyas btab pa'o// dri'i spyan sder bcom
259b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das ma sku mdog dmar mo zhol gcig ma/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag gnyis ma/ skra gol ba/ gcer bu dum bu'i ska rags kyis brgyan pa/ phyag g.yon pa 'khyung nas gdug pa dang bdad bzhi la sogs pa'i
260a1(rgyud 'grel): khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa bsnams pa/ gA ya sra phyogs pa thams cung gdug pa rnams la sdigs mdzub byed cing / rdo rje bsnams pa/ bskal pa'i me lta bu'i gzi brjid chen po dang ldan pa/ khrag la
260a2(rgyud 'grel): dgyes shing khrag 'jug pa/ byin pa gnyis kyi 'khyud pa/ bde ba chen po dong thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid ca no// mkha' gro mu dang lho moM dang / khaN+Da re ha dang / gzugs can ma rnams ni don thams cad grub par byed pa ste/ pad+ma'i
260a3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs kyi gnasu nag po dang / lhod gu dang dmar po drang / ser po zhal gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa ste/ phyag g.yon na kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa/ g.yas pa Da ma ru dang gri gug bsnams pa/ spyan gsum pa skra grol bau/ gcerI bu gr-i yA
260a4(rgyud 'grel): brkyang bas bzhugs pa/ zhal mye che baM rnam par gtsigs pa/ phyag rgya rnam pa lngas brgyan pa/ dgod par bya'o// mchi mes rnam su 'dod chags dang gti mug la sngags pi rnam par dag pas sems tshim par byed pa'i mchod
260a5(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa'i snod bzhi po dgod par bya'o// dang po thugs kyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa ste/ mdog sngo nag rdo rje'i phreng bas brgyan pa/ de'i shAr gyi rtsibs la pul+li ra ma la yar/ khaN+Da k+Sho pA lA dang ra
260a6(rgyud 'grel): tu gtu mo ma'o// byang dzA lan+d+ha rar/ mahA kaM ka laM dang / gtum pa'i maug can ma'o// nub o D+yan du kaM ka la dang / 'od ldan ma'o// lho anu da ra/ mche bo rnam par gtsigs pa dang / sna chen ma'o// me go dA wa ri ri su ra bai ra dang
260b1(rgyud 'grel): brtan pA'i b+h+r-i ts+tshan+yA myA'o// bAdon bral nA mo sh+tsa rarA/ b+hod d+habyug med dang / mau'u thung myA'o// rlu dr-i tr-i ko Ti rdo n+yA 'od dang / l+yAngang+ga kaSh+Ti dbang phyug ma'o// dAbad+ma ldan mA la bar/ rdo rje sku dang / shing glau b+h+ra ma ste/ 'di dag nr-i
260b2(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi 'khor lo'o// gnyis pa gsung gi 'khor lo'i rtsibs brgyad pa dmyar po ste/ pad+ma'i phreng bas yongasu bskor ba'o// de'i shar gyi rtsibs kyi kyi kI mA rU pa ra/ aM gu ri dang / e rA ba tI'o// byang oM drer rdo rje
260b3(rgyud 'grel): ral pa can dang / 'jigs byed chen mo'o// nub tri sha ku ne ra/ dpa' bo chen po dang rlung gi shugs can ma'o// lho ko sa lar rdo rje hUM mdzad drang chang 'thung ma'o// shar lhor kA ling ga rA rab tu bzang po dang / sh+yA mA de bI'o//
260b4(rgyud 'grel): lho nub lAM pU kar rdo rje bzang po dang / shin tu bzang mo'o// nub byung kany+tsir 'jigs byed tshun po dang / rta na rna ma'o// byAng shar hi mA lA yUr mig mi bzang dang / kha ga na ste/ de dag ni gsung gi 'khor lo'o// gsum pa sku'i
260b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo ni dkar po ste/ 'khor li'i phreng bas yongasu bskor ba'o// de'i shwar-I gyi rtsibs pre ta pu rIr+ya stobs po che dang / 'khor lo'i shugs can mo'o// byang gr-i ha da ba tAr rin chen rdo rje dang / khaN+Da ro ha'o// nubo sau rASh+Ta ra/ rta
260b6(rgyud 'grel): mgrin dang / shoN+Di ni'o// lho phyogasu bar+Na dI bar na mkha'i snying po dang / 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o// shar lho na ga rar/ dpal he ru ka dang / shin tu dpa' mo'o// lho nub sin+d+hu ra/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / stobs chen ma'o//
261a1(rgyud 'grel): nub byang ma ror// rnam par snang mdzod dang / 'khor lo sgyur ma'o// byang shar ku la tAr rdo rje sems dpa' dang / brtson 'grus chen mo ste/ de dag ni sku'i 'khor lho'o// ShAN+Da ka pA la la
261a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i dpa' bo rnams ni zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi pi/ spyan gsum pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can/ phyag gnyis 'khyud pas rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa
261a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag g.yon pa na kha T+wAM ga/ g.yas pa na Da ma ru/ sku la phyag rgya rnam lnga la sogs pa dang ldan pa/ g.yas brkyang pas bzhugs pa'o// rab gtum la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams nau phyag gnyis dang / zhal gcig pa
261a4(rgyud 'grel): thod pa bsnams pa'i phyag gis 'khyud pa/ gdug pa rnams la sdigs mdzub dang gri gug bsnams pa/ mig gsum pa drag po'i gzugs can skra grol bas rnam par mdzes pa/ gnyisu med pa'i sbyor ba la
261a5(rgyud 'grel): brtson pa/ gcer bu'i mchog gdu bu dang dbu'i nor bu dang / rna cha dang / mgul brgyan dang / tshangs pa'i skud pa thogs pa/ mgo bo'i phreng bas mgul brgyan pa/ ska rags sil sil sgra bsgrogs pa'o// shar
261a6(rgyud 'grel): dang byang dang nub dang lho'i sgo rnamasu khwa gdong ma dang / 'ug gdong me dang / khyi gdong ma dang / phag gdong ma'o// shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / byang shar mtshams rnam su ya ma dA D+hi dang / gshin rje brtan
261b1(rgyud 'grel): ma dang / gshin rje pho nya mo drang / gshin rje mAche ba can ma dang / gshin rje 'joms ma ste/ ji ltar mkha 'gro ma la sogs pa'i tshogs ji ltar byar khA gdong ma la sogs pa'o dbye ba yang de bzhin no// de bzhin
261b2(rgyud 'grel): du mtshams na bzhugs pa'i lha mo rnams ni yid 'phrog pa'i gnyis pa ste/ thams cad yi dgas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing sems can gyi don mdzad pa la brtson pa'o// dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma 'di dag
261b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad ni dpral bar rdo rje'i phreng ba'o// de nas gzhan yang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun lha'i sbyor bas sbyar bar bya ste/ de dag kyang gang zhe na/ lus rjes su dran pa ni mkhri 'gro ma'o// tshur
261b4(rgyud 'grel): pa rje su dran pa ni lA ma'o// chos rdza su dran pa khaN+Da ro he'o// sems rjes dran pa ni gzugs can ma'o// 'dun pa'i rje 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni rab gtum ma'o// brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni/ gtum pa'i mig
261b5(rgyud 'grel): can me'o// dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni 'od ldan ma'o// sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni sna chen mo'o// dang po'i dbang po ni brtan pa'i blo can ma'o// brtson 'grus kyi dbang po ni mau'u thung ma'o// dran pa'i dbang
261b6(rgyud 'grel): po ni lang ka'i dbang phyag mo'o// tinge 'dzin gyi dbang po ni shing grib ma'o// shes rab kyi dbang po ni e ra ba ti'o// dad pa'i stobs na 'jigs nyid ma'o// brtson 'gros kyi stobs ni rlung gi shugs can ma'o// dan pa'i
262a1(rgyud 'grel): stobs ni chang 'thung ma'o// ting 'dzin gyi stobs ni sh+yA mA de byi'o// shes rab kyi stobs ni shin tu bzang mo'o// ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rta rna ma'o// brtson 'grus
262a2(rgyud 'grel): yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni kha ga na'o// dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o// shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni kha~MN+Da ro he'o// chos rnams par 'byed pa yang dag
262a3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub kyi yan lag ni Sh+yoN+Di ni'o// dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni 'khor lo'i go cha'o// btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni shin tu dpa' mo'o// yang dag pa'i lta ba ni stobs chen mo'o// yang
262a4(rgyud 'grel): dog pa'i rtog pa ni 'khor lo sgyur ma'o// yang dag pa'i ngag ni brdzun 'grus chen mo'o// yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ni khwa gdong ma'o// yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni 'ug gdong ma'o// yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni khyi gdong
262a5(rgyud 'grel): ma'o// yang dag pa'i dran pa ni phog gdong ma'o// yang dag pa'i ting 'dzin ni dpalA he ru ka'o// dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pi gshin rje brtan ma'o// dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams yang dag par bsrung ba ni
262a6(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje pho nya ma'o// mi dge bi'i chos skyes pa rnams yang dag par spong ba ni gshin rje'i mche ba can ma'o// mi dge ba'i choso ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa ni gshin rje 'joms ma'o// de nas gzhan yang
262b1(rgyud 'grel): sku'i dkyil 'khor mchog gi rim pa'i sbyor bas sa bcu yongasu dag pas gnas lA sogs pa yang dag paR+Sha bshad par bya ste/ pu dzA o a go DA/ de mA kA o tri ko ka la kA hi/ pre ti gr-I sau su na si ma ku pu zhes bya
262b2(rgyud 'grel): bA nai pul+lI ra ma la ya ste/ mgo por nI rab gtum ma'o// dzaM zhes bya ba ni dzA lAna? d+ha ra ste/ spyi gtsug tu gtum pa'i mig can mo'o// o zhes bya ba ni o Di ya na te/ rna ba g.yas par 'ong ldan ma'o// u zhes bya ba
262b3(rgyud 'grel): ni arbu de ste/ mgo bo'i rgyab tu sna chen mo ste/ gnaso// go zhes bya ba nau gro dA ba rI ste/ rna ba g.yon par brten pa'i blo can ma'o// rA zhes bya ba ni rA mau shwa ra ste/ smin ma'i dbus su mi thung ma'o// de zhes bya ba ni de bi ko Ta ste/
262b4(rgyud 'grel): mig tu lang+ga'i dbang phyug ma'o// mA zhes bya ba ni mA lA pa ste/ phrog par ni shing gri ba mu ste/ nye ba'i gnaso// 'di dag ni thugs kyi 'khor lo ste/ na mkha' la spyod pa'o// kA zhes bya ba ni kA ma rA pa ste/ mtshan khung dag tu ni
262b5(rgyud 'grel): a ra ba ti'o// oM zhes bya ba nI o dre ste/ nu ma gnyis ni 'jigs byed chen mo ste zhingango // tI zhes bya ba ni tri sha ku ne ste/ lte baT ni rAng gi shugs can ma'o// ko zhes bya ba ni ko sa l-i ste/ sna'i rtse mor tshang 'thung ma ste nye ba zhing/
262b6(rgyud 'grel): ka zhes bya ba naM ka ling+ga ste khar ni sh+yA ma de bi'o// la zhes bya ba ni pa li pau ka ste/ mgrin par ni shin tu bzang mo ste/ ts+tshan+do ha'o// gA zhes bya ba ni kAny+tsi na ste/ snying gar ni rta rna ma'o// hi zhes bya ba ni hi mA la ya ste/ 'dom su naM kha ga na sne/
263a1(rgyud 'grel): nye ba'i d+yAts+tshan+no ha'o// 'd-i dag ni gusung gau 'a khor stAM/ s+yA la spyod pa'o// b+h+yo zhes bya ba nr-i pai tA pu r-i s+t+waM/ mtshan mA la 'kho lo'i shugs can ma'o// gr-i zhes bya ba ni br-i ha dwe ba ste/ bshang bya'i lam
263a2(rgyud 'grel): du khyAr+b+bA ro he ste 'dus pA ts+tshan no// so zhes byA ba nA saunAn+tes+t+waM/ b+haR+Wa gnyi su naur+d+hA na'o/ su zhes bya ba nI su bAr+d+ha dwI pa ste/ d+yau naM b+he gnyis la 'khor lo'i go cha ma stAM/ nye ba'i 'dus pa tsa no// no zhes bya ba ni na ga ra ste/ sor mo rnam
263a3(rgyud 'grel): lA ni shaun tu dpa' mi'o// so zhes bya ba nAM saun+d+hA ste/ rkang po'i bo lA l+yA ni stobs che nA ma s+t+waM/ dur+ya da do// ma zhes bya ba ni ma rU ste/ mthe bo dag lA naM 'khor lho sgyur ma'o// ku nyes byA b+h+ra ni k+ko lu twA stAM/ bus maM gnyis
263a4(rgyud 'grel): nIni brtson 'grus chen mo ste/ nye ba'i dur khrod// 'di dag ni sku'i 'khor lo ste/ sa 'og ni gnas// de yang sgra gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis// yi ge gsum N+ya bo las// m+b+hi thaM ris+tho mi yul+yA sa 'og tu/ s+yAd cig gcis
263a5(rgyud 'grel): gis sku gtsog 'gyur// skad cig tsam gyi rnal 'byor bdag/ skyed cigrA gis naM phyag N+yA tsan+ta/ kun+da nAs kun tu skad tsig ste// skad cig gos ni grwa sung sngags 'don// oM AHhUM/ oM s+yArba bI ra yo gau nI/ nAM kA yai bIkrIt+taM badz+ra swa b+hA
263a6(rgyud 'grel): bA at+ma ko&haM/ oM badz+ra shud+d+haHsarba d+har+m+ma badz+re shud+d+ho ha~M/ de nas go cha gnyis shes nos// ye shes 'khor lo rnam par bsgom// sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor shes pas// dam tshig 'khor lo la myur gzhug/ de nas go cha gnyis bsha
263b1(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste/ snying gAr au ha'o// mgo bor na ma hi'o// s+yai gtsug lA swA h+ma hu/ brag pa gnyis la nI bau Sha Ta twe/ mig gnyis lA nI hUM hUM ho// yun lag thams cud lha n+ti phyaT haM/ dang po rdo rje snyems dpa' ste// gnyis pa
263b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam par snang mjed bkun/ gsum pa pad+ma gang dbang bzhum ba'i pa dang ldan te ruku/ rdo rje nyi ma rta mchog ste// gdug pa go cha rnams kyis bsrung // oM baM rdo rje pheg mo'o// hUM yo ya mi ni'o// hriM moM rmongs byed ma'o// hraM hU~M skyong byed mo'o// hUM hUM skrong byed
263b3(rgyud 'grel): ma'o// phaT phiT ni tsar+t+ti ka ste/ yan lag thams cad lnga mtshon cha yis te/ lte ba dang snying ga dang / de bzhin du kha dang / mgo bo dang / spyi gtsug dag gi mtshon cha nyid do// mdzub mo mdud byis gung mo nges par sbyor
263b4(rgyud 'grel): mthe bong rdo rje brtan por rab tu sbyar// 'di ni dpral ba'i dbyingasu rab bzhag nas// bskor zhing bskor bas kun tu bskor b.raru bya// rkang pa mnon cing gyen du blta// gyen du paM gyi sgra sgrogs shing // phyogs bcu 'jig rten khom
263b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa'o// dpa' blo rnal 'byor ma rnams dgug/ oM yau ga shud+d+haHsarba d+har+m+ma yAM ga shud+d+ho haM/ de nas snying po'i phyag rgya sbyin par bya ste/ lhag pa g.yasaM pa dang g.yon pa bskor zhing mkha 'gro ma'i dam pa bde bar
263b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhug par bya'o// oM shrI badz+ra he hi ru ru kaM hUM hUM phaT bodz+ra DA ki nI dzA la sam+ba raM swA hA/ snying po'i sngagaso// oM hrIHha haM hu~M hU~M phaT nye bi'i snying po'i sngag so// oM badz+ra bai ro tsa nI ye huM hUM phaT swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das ma'i snying poSh+Te/
264a1(rgyud 'grel): oM sar+b+ba bud+d+ha DA kI nI ye byAdz+nyA war+N+Na ni ye huM hUM phaT swA/ bcom ldan 'das ma'i nye bya'i spring po'o// oM kA ra ka ra hUM hUM phaT oM p+la tsat+ti huM hUM phaT/ auk+Sha r+ya kA ru dzaMtrUM phaT+Ta/ oM tsId+b+hak+ShI yai huM hUM phAH/
264a2(rgyud 'grel): oM bAn+d+ha ban+d+ha nr-i hUM phAT/ oM prA b+hU bA d+hA yai hU~M hUM pheMT+Te/ oM trA sa yAM trA sa ya hU~M hUM phaT/ oM myA hA nA si d+h+yaM hUM phaT/ oM k+Sho b+hA yAM k+Sho b+hA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM bI rA ma d+hI yau hu~M hU~M pheMT+Ta/ oM hU~M hrIM hU~M phAT/ oM kha nid+h+r-i i dz+yaM d+h+waM Sh+TaH/ au
264a3(rgyud 'grel): hraHhUM hU~M phaT/ oM laM ke shwa DI yai huM hUM phaT/ oM pheM pheM huM hUM phaT/ oM dru mats+tshe yai hu~M hUM phaT/ oM phaT phaT hUM hU~M phaT/ oM ai ra ba d+hi yi huM hUM phaT/ oM da ha da ha hrI hUM phaT/ oM ma hA bA ra bI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM pu tse pa tse huM hUM phaT/ oM bA yu/
264a4(rgyud 'grel): baibaM ge huM hUM phaT/ oM b+hAk+Sha b+hak+Sha ba s+yA ru d+hI R+Shan+ma mA lA bya lam+b+hi no huM hUM phaT/ IM s+yA nA pak+ShI ya huM hUM phaT/ A gr-ihAM gr-ih+Na s+yAp+ta pA tA la ga tA b+hU dz+re ga sar+b+baM wA/ tar+dz+dza ya tAdz+dza ya huM hUM phaT/ u sh+tse mA de bI l+ye huM hUM phaT/ au Ak+ShAr+N+Na u
264a5(rgyud 'grel): kaD+D+h+ya huM hU~M phaT/ oM su b+hI dr-i hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM hU~M hU~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM hA yA kAN+Do hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM d+hI dz+haiM huM hU~M phaT/ oM kha gAn+d+ha nI hu~M hU~M phaT/ A~M dz+dza r+g+haM hU~M hUM phaT/ oM tsak+Shu ba ge huM hUM phaT/ oM hraM hUM hu~M hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da ro hUM hu~M hU~M phuT/ oM hU~M hU~M hUM hU~M phaT/ oM shaMt+taM nI ye
264a6(rgyud 'grel): huM hU~M phaT/ oM hUM hUM hu~M hUM phaT/ oM tsakra bar+t+tid+d+hi yai hu~M hUM phaT/ oM ki wi ki la~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM su bI re huM hUM phaT/ oM si oM sau la~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM ma hA ba le hu~M hUM phaT/ oM hi li hi li huM hU~M phaT/ oM tsakra brti nI ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM d+hi li d+hi li huM hUM phaT/ oM
264b1(rgyud 'grel): many+dzu b+hir+ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM kA kA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM u l+yAkyA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM shA na s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM shU ka D+ha s+yA huM hUM phaT/ A~M ya ma dA D+hi ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma d+hA trU~M ya huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma daSh+ma N+DI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma ma/
264b2(rgyud 'grel): thA nI yau huM hU~M phaT/ oM DA ki nA~M ye huM hUM phaT/ oM lA ma hu~M hUM phaT/ oM khAN+Da ro hau hu~M hUM phaT/ A R+ShA pi NAM ye huM hUM phaT/ oM na mo b+ha ga ba tA bI re shA ya/ mAhA kalpAg+ni san+ni b+ha A/ dz+ra TA ma ku Tot+ka T+Te ya/ daMSh+Tha kra rA lo gra b+hI ShA Na ya
264b3(rgyud 'grel): mu khAM ya/ sa haM sra b+hu dzaM b+h+yAM su r-I ya/ pa nu pre sho d+ya ta shu lA kha TAM ga d+hA ra Ni/ byA g+hA dza nI ba ra nI d+hA rA yaM/ ma hA d+hI mAn+tA ka ra ba pu ny+dza ya huM hUM phaT/ de dag ni mchod po'i sdig so// ji ltar bams pa tsam gyis kyang // de bzhin
264b4(rgyud 'grel): gshegs kun khrus gsol ltarar+ya// lha yai chu ni dag pa yis// de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsolo// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga taM a b+hi She kA sa ma ya shrI ye hUM/ dbang bskur ba'i sngags so// rdo rje'i thal mo gyen du kha phye la mtshan
264b5(rgyud 'grel): phyed na gtor ma sbyin par bya'o// oM badz+ra a rel+le hoHtraM hUM baM ho// badz+re DA ki ni sa ma ya stau dr-i sh+ya hoHoM AHhUM zhes bya ba 'dis lan lnga'i baR+Sha du mngon par bsdogs par byas la btab par bya ste/ oM khu kha khA hi khA ha~M sarba yok+Sha rAk+Sha
264b6(rgyud 'grel): sau b+hU ta pra ta pi shA tsan+da dA pasmA ra DA ka DA ki n+ya da ya mi maM ba ling gr-ih+nan+na sa ma yi rakAn+sa/ maM ma sar+b+ba sid+d+him+me pra yauts+tshan+na yo thai baM ya thaiSh+TaM b+huM dza tha pi ba tha dzi g+ha tha mA ti kra ma ha/ mau ma sar+b+ba kA raM sat+sa khaM bi shud+d+ha ya sa hA yi ka b+ha dan+ta huM hUM phaT sI/
265a1(rgyud 'grel): !\u0f7f drung snron+ta mo drAg+sa/ khyAHkrA pA lnga'o// b+hU dang smA dgam+b+had+hA/ d+hA la la/ p+tAHsa pA d+yAng m+ba drA k+Sham+mAlka/ shAn+ti myA r+m+marnam pAR+thag s+hob sdu pa'o// rgyus b+hun+tha smA bar+b+hu/ a pyAn+ti Sh+To da g+mat+tha myong da ng+ga/
265a2(rgyud 'grel): mchin du ni rdo rje 'ong ngo // sgyid ni rdo sku'o// mig ni ad+g+ha ri ka'aM// mkhas pa ni rdo ral pa cu no// glo ba ni dpa' bo chen po'o// zlu ma nAM rdo rje hU~M mdzud do// gan+te ma naM rab tu bzang po'o// gling bA ni rdo rje brdung po'o// chu sgyu ni 'jigs byeng
265a3(rgyud 'grel): chen mo'o// sgra mtshams ni myig ma~M bzang ngo // bad+ya kan ni stobs po che'o// nAg ni rin chen rdo rje'o// khAgrA na D+ha ma grin+d+ra no// d+hAlA ni na mkha'o skyung po'o// tshwa lA n+ya dpal rdo rje hi \u0f7f'o// mchom ni pad+ma ger g+hi dbang phyug marmyil ma ni d+ha
265a4(rgyud 'grel): par snang mdzad do// snrubs nI dz+nyA b+h+rUM sems dpa' ste// de dag ni dpa' bre'i yan lag d+hAm par drag po'o// dpa' bo'i rna bo'i sdug sna mchog gang / mchod phyir thogs lnga sogs pa gar+dz+dza/ dpa' byoSh+Ti shu rtsa bzhi yI/ lus
265a5(rgyud 'grel): khams la rnam par brtag gi tshe'i phyug rgyu dpa' bo drug/ phyag rgya 'di yis lus mdzes ste rdo rje phag mo'i sngags gang yi ni// mgrin pa mgul ngos brgyun pa yin// snying po'i sngags kyi dpa' bo yi// phreng ba brgya yi byung
265a6(rgyud 'grel): brgyan// gsang sngags yi ge bdun gyis ni// rna cha yis ni rno ba brgyan// sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' gro ma/ pags pa'i gos ni 'dzin pa'i mchog// rnal 'byor ma drug sngags kyis ni// ska rags byas pa rnam par brgya no// dz+ra/
265b1(rgyud 'grel): lo kun gyi rnal 'byor ma// sngags kyi btung ba'i thod pa yin// ba ro tsa na'i sngags gang yin// thod pas mgo bo rnam par brgyan// de ltar bdag nyid rnam bsams te// tshing ngam sngags kyis shin tu bsrung // tshangs
265b2(rgyud 'grel): par spyod pa rtag gyur nas// rkang pa brgyad pa'i gsang sngags mchod// 'jigs pa thams cad rnam spangs te// de ltar rnal 'byor bdog nyid bsam// 'khor lo bde mchog sdom pa la// blo ldan che gang rnam pa raM spyod//
265b3(rgyud 'grel): rigs lnga dag tu kun spyod pa// rigs gcig tu ni rnam par brtag/ rnam par mi rtog bdag nyid sems// 'dod pa'i yon tan lho la spyong // dgos pa thams cad rnam spangs te// dpa' bo seng+ga bzhin du spyong // A l-i kA
265b4(rgyud 'grel): li mdun bsams naste// rnal 'byor chen po ngal bso ste// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa no// lte ba'i rtsa bar gnas par bsgom// yi ge mchog gi gnas gyur pa// de yi dbusu rnam par bsgom// sku gsung thug
265b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi rdo rje can// lha yi sku ni bsgom por bya// de ni gzugs las 'das pa ste// dngos po med pa'i chos nyid yin/ de yang bsam gyis mi khyab bsam// sems nyid brtag par mi bya'o// bsam gyis mi khyab de bsam
265b6(rgyud 'grel): nas// de las gzugs ni thob par 'gyur// kha dz+nyA ga ni lha'i sku// shes rab TA ma ru yi sgra// nyin mo bo tsam ldan rdo rje can// rnal 'byor ma ni mtshan mor bshad// mya ngan 'das byung dpa' bo rnams// drug pa
266a1(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi sprul bya ste// dag pa chos kyi sprul pa ni// phag mo'i gzugasu bstan pa yon/ hU~M yig gnyis med ye shes te// he ni rgyu sogs rnam par spangs// rwa yig tshogs
266a2(rgyud 'grel): dang bral ba nyid// ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa'o// sems ni ngal bas rnal 'byor pa// mya ngan 'das bstan pa ma yin nyid// 'phro ba'i tshe na rnal 'byor pa// dpal ldan khrag 'thung sogs rnal 'byor// me
266a3(rgyud 'grel): tog sna tshogs lag na thogs// sna tshogs rgyal mtshan ba dan dran dang // rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs dang // glu yis mchod pa sna tshogs kyis// 'chi ba zhes bya rnam rtog ste// mkha' sbyong gnas

267b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbusu sa bcu'i rang bzhin du bsams te/ gnas la/ rnal 'byor be srung ba'i don du tshangs pa'i gnas pozhi lo snyoms par 'jug pa sngon du 'gro bas/ phung po dang dbang po dang // khams rnams kyi nga rgyal bskyed par bya/
268a1(rgyud 'grel): de la gzugs kyi phung po ni rnam par snang mdzad do// tshor ba'i phung po ni rdo rje nyi ma'o// 'du shes kyi phung po ni pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug go// 'du byed kyi phung po ni rdo rje rgyal po'o// rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni rdo rje mi bskyod pa'o/

268a4(rgyud 'grel): nI phung po dang dbang po dang / khams rnam par dag pa g+ho nA'i lha ste/ bdag bya smang pa'o// he ru ka rnam par rgyal ba'i nga rgyal brtan pas/ g.yas pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur snying gar bsgreng ste/ g.yon se grol dang bcas pa'i sdig mdzu
268a5(rgyud 'grel): phyogasu bskor zhing / oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha huM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hu~M hUM phaT/ oM gr-Ih+NA pa yo gr-ih+NA pa ya huM hUM phaT/ oM A na ya hoHb+ha ga wAn badz+ra rA dzA huM hUM phaT/ ces brjod cing zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer gyi tshogs du ma spros pas bge
268a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams bskrad cing bsreg par rnam par bsams par byas la/ 'od de nyid dang / oM me di na~M badz+ra b+ha ba badz+ra ban+d+ha hUM zhes brjod pas/ 'og rtse gsum pa'i bdag nyid kyi sna tshogs rdo rjer byin gyis brlab par bya'o// oM badz+ra prI ka ra hUM baM hUM/
268b1(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra pany+dza ra hUM baM hUM/ oM badz+ra bi da na hUM khaM hUM/ oM badz+ra sa ra dz+wA la traM saM traM hUM/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la a na lArka hUM hUM hUM/ zhes bya ba'i sngags rnams kyis rim pa bzhin du rdo rje'i ra ba dang / gur dang / bla bre dang / mda'i dra ba dang / me ri 'bar
268b2(rgyud 'grel): baba'i mthar thug par bsams te/ las thams cad pa'i khro bo spros nas/ bgegs kyi dbang po rnams bkug ste/ oM g+ha~MHg+haHg+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya sarba duSh+TA na phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya sarba pA paM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badz+ra kI la ya badz+ra d+ha ra
268b3(rgyud 'grel): Adz+nyA ba ya te/ sarba big+h+nAM kA ya bAk+Shit+ta badz+ra kI lA ya hUM phaT ces bya ba'i sngags kyis phur bus gang ba bo// oM badz+ra mung+ga ra/ badz+ra kI la ya a ko Ta ya hUM phaT ces bya bas phur bu rnams brdungango // de nas rang gi snying gar aM las zla
268b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du/ hUM sngon po 'od zer sna tshogs 'pho ba byasems te/ de'i 'od kyis mdun gyi bar snang la bla ma dang sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i tshogs bltas te/ phyag byas nas/ phyi dang gsang pa dang / de kho na nyid
268b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis mchod pas yang dag par mchod de/ sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o// thog ma med dus 'khor ba ni// chags sogs rtog pa'i rang bzhin gyis// sdig bgyis mgon po'i spyan snga ru// ma lus so sor bshags pa
268b6(rgyud 'grel): bgyid rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu yis// nyer bsdus 'gro ba thams cad kyi// bsod nams tshogs ni ma lus la// rtag par bdag ni ying ngo // rdo rje'i ye shes thugs rgung nas// shing dbang drung na bzhugs gyur pa'i// 'gro la nyer brtses
269a1(rgyud 'grel): thub dbang rnams// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor du gsol// rgyal ba'i mdzad pa rdzogs gyur te// mgon po dbying su gshegs bzhed la// sems can sdug bsngal bral bar du// mya ngan mI 'dar bdug gsol/

269a3(rgyud 'grel): cad bskyung ba dang // sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las// grol bar bdag gis bsgrub par bgyi// brten sogs dge ba de dag gis// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'o// sangs rgyas nyid du bdag gyur nas// 'gro ba yad
269a4(rgyud 'grel): su grol byed shog/ de nas dngos po rnams yongasu bsal bar byas nas/ oM swa b+hA ba shud d+had+d+ha sarba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho&haM/ zhes bya bas dag par byas nas nye bar bsdus te/ nA de tsam g+hi ye shes la oM yU n+ya trA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&
269a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod pas byang chub kyi tshogs yongasu rdzogs pa'o// de las langs te yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor sngon po zla ba bkas pa lta ngu ba dan gyis mtshan pa'o// de'i steng du raM las me'i dkyil 'khor dmar me ge yung drung gis mtshan
269a6(rgyud 'grel): pa gru gsum pa'o// de'i steng du baM las chu'i dkyil 'khor dkar po zlum po bum pas ma mtshon pa'o// de'i steng du laM las sa'i dkyil 'khor ser po gru bzhi pa rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshon pa'o// de'i steng du suM las ri rab
269b1(rgyud 'grel): chen po rin po che sna bzhi'i rang bzhin las grub pa gru bzhi pa rtse mo brgyad kyis nye bar mtshan pa'o// de'i steng du hUM las sna tshogs rdo rje dang / de'i steng du paM las sna tshogs pad+ma gI sar gyi phreng bas mtshan pa'o// de'i dbusu
269b2(rgyud 'grel): U li kA lI la dag pa rnams A li kA li'i rnams par bsdus la der gyur pa las nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzugasu bsams te/ de'i byar du hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga pa hUM gis mtshon pa rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin can bsams pa

269b4(rgyud 'grel): phyophyed pas brgyan pa/ ka pA sum cu rtsa gnyis sam brgyad kyis spros pa/ dar dang zla ba dang nyi ma dang rnga yab dang / 'phan la sogs pas brgyan po de'i phyi rol na rdo rje'i sa gzhi la dur khrod brgya de gnas pa ste/ shar phyogasu drag
269b5(rgyud 'grel): tu gtum+b+ha par mdung gis phrug pa'i ro dang shIR+Sha ta la glang po'o gdong drung / dbang po dang / lha'i dge 'dun gyi tshogs dang / nor rgyas dang / sgra sgrogs byed rnams gnas pa'o// byang phyogs tshong tshing rnam par 'khrigs par byang
269b6(rgyud 'grel): chub kyi shing la gnod sbyin gyi gdong dang / ku bai ra dang / gnod sbyin gyi tshogs dang / sbrul gyis zos dang / 'jog po dang / sprin gyi rgyal po ldog byed rnams gnas pa'o// nub phyogs 'ur 'ur 'bar bar mya ngan med pa'i shing la
270a1(rgyud 'grel): chu srin gyi gdong can dang / rus pa'i re dang chu lha dang / sbyin dang gyi rgyal po dang / stobs kyi rgya dang / 'jigs par byed pa rnamaso// lho phyogs mthug pa'i dur khrod du bsregs pa'i ro dang / tsU ti'i shing la ma he'i
270a2(rgyud 'grel): gdong dang / gshin rje dang gshin rje'i tshogs dang / pad+ma dang 'khor byed rnamaso// dbang ldan gyi mtshams ha ha ra rgod par 'gegasu pa'i ro dang / n+ya gre b+hi rA shing la khyu mchog gi gdeng dang dbang ldan dang / yi dgas kyi tshogs dang / pad+ma
270a3(rgyud 'grel): chen po dang / gang ba rnams kyis mdzes pa'o// mdzes mo'i mtshams nags tshal phun sum tshogs par dum bur gyur pa'i ro dang / ka rA dza ka'i shing lA ra'i gi dong can dang / me lha dang / drang srong gi tshogs dang / hu lun+ta dang /
270a4(rgyud 'grel): bgegs byed rnams kyi gang ba'o// bden bral gyi mtshamasu mun pa mi bzad par byis pa shi ba'i ro dang / 'khri shing lha i dgus kyi gdong dang / srin po dang srin po'i tshogs dang rigs ldan dang / char 'bebs rnamaso// rlu
270a5(rgyud 'grel): du ki li kiM li sgra sgrogs par smyo ba'i ro dang / u dum bA ra'i shing la/ ri dgas kyi gdong dang / rlung lha dang rigs pa 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang / dung skyong dang sprin stug po rnamaso// de ltar dur khyed chen po der/ lha brgyad drang
270a6(rgyud 'grel): gza' brgyad dang / mkha'agro ma chen po brgyad dang / 'byung po'i tshogs dang / ri dang chu dang me dang sku gdung chen po brgyad dang / rnal 'byor pa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang smai byed dang / rjed byed dang / yi
270b1(rgyud 'grel): dgas dang / sha za dang / mkha 'gro rnams kyi gang zhing khwa dang bya rgod dang / khra dang 'ug pa dang / mgrin rings dang / wa dang spyang ki dang / ce spyang 'dus shing sgra 'byin pa'o// yongasu rdzogs pa'i gzhal yas khang gi snying po lnga bcoM
270b2(rgyud 'grel): 'das sku mdog ston po// shin tu khros pa dang / chags pa dang / zhi ba dang / mnyam pa'i zhal sngon po dang dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / ser po mnga' ba/ zhal re r-i la yang spyan gsum pa/ rdo rje dang thod pa'i dbu rgyan can ral pa'i thor
270b3(rgyud 'grel): tshugs kyis mdzes pa/ sna tshogs rdo rje dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / mi bskyod pa gnas pa/ phyag rgya drug gis brgyan pa/ brgya phyed pa'i mgo bo dang / sbrul gyi tshangs skud can/ phyag rgya bcu gnyis pa rdo rje phyag mo la 'khyud pa'i phyag
270b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag gis rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa/ gnyis kyis glang po che'i lpags pa bsnams pa/ g.yas pa'i lhag mas Do ma ru dang dgra sta dang gri gug dang / rtse gsum 'dzin pa'o// g.yon pa rnams na khaM T+wAM ga
270b5(rgyud 'grel): dang thod pa dang rdo rje zhags pa dang / tshongs pa'i mgo bo 'dzin pa/ zhabs g.yas brkyang 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan mnan pa'o// rdo rje phag mo ni sku mdog dmar po zhal mche ba gtsigs pa/ khrag la dgyes pa gri gug dang thod pa
270b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'i phyag gis 'khyud pa/ lhan cig skyes pa'i bde bas bgyes pa/ phyag rgya lnga dang thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan par gnas pa'o// shar de mkha' gro ma nag mo dang / byang du lA ma dang ljang gu dang / nub tu dum skyes ma dam
271a1(rgyud 'grel): mo dang / lho ru gzugs can ma ser po dang / mtsham su bum pa pad+ma'i snod dang ldan pa/ dri chen dang / dri chu dang / rang byung dang / glad pa dang / khu bas gang ba'o// de ltar lha lha'i bdag nyid ngam/ thung zhing sgeg pa'i sku
271a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang dril bu dang Da ma ru dang / kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa bsnams pa'i rang bzhin 'khor lo lnga dang bcas pa 'am/ bsdus pa'i rnal 'byor phyi nang gi 'khor lo gnyis bsgom par bya ste/ khwa gdong nag mo dang / ljang gu 'ug gdong dang
271a3(rgyud 'grel): khyi gdong dmar mo dang / phag gdong ser mo dang / gshin rje brtan ma dang / gshin rje 'joms ma dang / gshin rje pho ny+tsa mo dang / gshin rje mo che ba ma rnams gzugs gnyis ma'i rang bzhin can te/ zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi ma gri gug
271a4(rgyud 'grel): dang byed pa dang / Da ma ru dang / kha T+wAM ga bsnams pa/ zhabs g.yas brkyang bas ro mnanA pa/ phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa/ mi mgo'i ngo shal can sgeg pa'i zhal dang 'jigasu rung bar gnas pa'o// de ltar sprul pa'i sku'o sgom pa la gnas
271a5(rgyud 'grel): te/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i cho ga rdzogs par byA ba gsungs pa/ he ru ka la sogs pa'i lho// rtsi yos gzugs kyis yang dag gnas// lus kyi dkyil 'khor nyams dga' ba'i// rkang pa'i dkyil du bskyod byed rlung // gzhu yi/
271a6(rgyud 'grel): dbyibasu yang dag gnas// sum mdo'i gnasu mi yi dngos// gru gsum 'bar bar yang dag gnas// lto bar chu ni zlum po ste// snying gar sa ni gru bzhi gnas// sgal tshigs dbyug pa'i ri rab nyid// rang gi yan lag las
271b1(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i// ka ba brgyad ni nye bar gan+d+has// chu zheng kun tu mnyam pa yis// gru bzhi par ni rab tu grags// sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bo yis// dkyil 'khor gsum ni nges gsungs// pU dzA o a g+ho rA de mA/ kA kro N+Di ko ka la kA hi/ pro g+h+ra
271b2(rgyud 'grel): saM su na si ma ku/ mchogs ma pul+lI ma la yar// mi phyed rtsa ni so skyen 'bab// rab gtum thod pa'i dum bu ny-id// spyi gtsug dzA lan+d+ha rar ni// sgra s+thu 'bab+hA pa phrag gzugs mya// keng rus gtum pa'i mig can ma// o D+yan rna ba g.yas pa'i
271b3(rgyud 'grel): stengs// pags dang dri ma brtse bra ma// keng rus can dang 'od ldan ma'o// lhag pa'i steng na arbu da// g.yon pa marI nA shaM yi khams// 'bab pa mtsho gtsigs sna chen ma// go dA pa ri rna ba g.yon// thung ngu ma nI rgyus pa 'beb// lha dgra dang ni
271b4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' blo can// rA me shwa ra smin pa'i dbus// ru sbal skyes ma rus pa 'bab// 'od dpag med dang mi thung ma// lha mo'i mkhar ni mig gnyis la// sgom pa ma ni mkhal ma 'bab// lang ka'i dbang phyug rdo rje 'od// dpung pa'i rtsa bar mA la ba
271b5(rgyud 'grel): snying gi khams 'bab dbang ma ste// rdo rje sku dang shing grib ma// mkha' spyod nyid de thugs 'khor lA// kA mu rA ni mchun khung la// mig gi khams 'bab skyon 'byin ma// myu gu can dang sa bsrungs ma// nu ma gnyis la o dr-i ste//
271b6(rgyud 'grel): mjug ma mkhris pa 'bab pa nyid// ral pa can dang 'jigs byed mo'o// tri sha ku ni lte bar te// me mo'i rtsa ni glo ba 'bab// dpa' bo che dang rlung shugasau ma// sna yi rtse mar ke sa la// mtshan mo'i rtsa ni rgyu ma 'bab// rdo rje hUM mdzad
272a1(rgyud 'grel): chang mthung ma// ka ling+ga nI kha la ste// bsil sbyin ma nI gnye ma 'brub// rab tu bzang dang bsngo bsangs mo// mgrin pa'i gan+d+ha su lam+b+ha ka/ tsha ba ma ni 'pho ba 'bab// rdo rje 'od drang shin tu bzang // kAn+d+hi snying ga'i gan
272a2(rgyud 'grel): su ste// gzhol ma'i rtsa ru dri chen 'bab// 'jigs byed chen po d+ha rna ma// hi mA la ni chu so ru// shin tu gzugs can mtshan ma 'bab// mig mi bzang dang bya rgod ma// gsung ste sa spyod bdag nyid kyi// mkha 'gro mAr ni shes par bya//
272a3(rgyud 'grel): pu ri mchin ma la// rangs ma'i ru ni mchi lwa ma 'bab// 'khor lo'i shugs ma stobs po che// gr-i ha de ba bshad laM la// dpyi ma'i rtsa ni rnag 'bapa la// rin chen rdo rje dum skyes ma// sa~Mk+ShaSh+Ta ste brla gnyis la// rmya sprin ma ni khrag 'bab
272a4(rgyud 'grel): ma// rta mgrin dang ni cha nga? 'thung ma// gser gling byin pa gnyis la ste// sbyor bral ma ni rdul 'bab byed// mkha' snying 'khor lo'-i go ma mra// rkang pa'i sor myo nu ga Da// sbu gu maM ni tshil bu 'bab// shin tu dpa' mi hi ru ka/ sin+d+hu rkang pa'i
272a5(rgyud 'grel): bol nyid la// grub ma'i rtsa ni 'chi ma 'bab// pad+ma gar dbang stobs chen mo// ma ro rkang pa'i mthe bo ste// 'tsheng ma kha chu 'bab pa nyid// rnam snang 'khor lo sgyur ba mo// ku lu tA nI pus myo la// yid bzang ma ni snabs skye da byed//
272a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' gtso chen mo// sku ste sa 'og spyod ma yis// mkha'agro dpa' bor shes par bya// lte ba 'am snying ga'i rtsa bzhi ni// 'byung lnga'i rlung dang bdud rtsi 'bab// bde chen dgu yi bdag nyid bsam// phyag brgyad dam ni
272b1(rgyud 'grel): sgo brgyad du/ las kyi rlung ngam byed bdag gis// khwa gdong gshin rje la sogs brgyad// me long nang gi gzugs bzhin du// rang gi cha lugs brgyan pa'i tshul// ro yi gdan la legs par dgod// 'od 'phro 'od kyi dkyil 'khor
272b2(rgyud 'grel): can// mdzes shing 'jigs pa'i gzugs cano// sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis// yi ge gsum gyi ngo bo nyid// mtho ris mi yul sa 'og tu// skad cig gis ni sku ny-id gyur// skad cig gis ni rnal 'byor byung la/ skad cig
272b3(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan// kun nas kun tu skad cig ste// skad cig gis ni gsang sngags ljon/ oM AHhUM/ oM sarba bI ra yo gi na~M kA ya wAk+ShIt+ta badz+rA swa b+hA ba At+ma ko ho/ oM badz+ra shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA badz+ra shud+d+ho&haM/ oM AHhUM ho yig
272b4(rgyud 'grel): gis phyag rgya bzhis ni rgyas btab bya// oM sarba bA ra yo gi nI kA ya bAk+ShiN+Da dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko hUM/ ye shes las byung 'od tshogs kyis// rkang pa nas ni gtsug gtor mthar// lus kun rab tu bsal byas nas// khams gsum
272b5(rgyud 'grel): khyab par rab tu spro// mdzub mo mdud byas gung mo sbyar// mthe bong rdo rjer brten byas nas// dpral ba'i steng du rab bzhag ste// bskor zhing kun tu bskor bar bya// rkang pa mnan cing steng du blta// gyen du po gyi sgra sgrogs shing // phyogs
272b6(rgyud 'grel): bcu khams na bzhugs pa yis// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams dgug/ sngags dang phyag rgyar rab ldan pas// dgug sogs dam tshig ro mnyam byas// oM yo ga shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA yo ga shud+d+ho& ho/ de nas sngags kyis mtshon cha
273a1(rgyud 'grel): dgod// snying gar oM ha rnam pa yis// rdo rje seMs dpa' yang dag dgod// gnyis pa dpa ldan rnam snang mdzod// mchogs mar na ma hi nyid do// spyi gtsug swA hA hi nyid du// mgon po pad+ma gar dab rgyal// bzhi pa
273a2(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan he ru ka/ phrug pa la ni br-i ShiT he// mig gnyis la ni hUM hUM ho// rdo rje nyi ma gzi brjid ldan// drug pa rta mchog rgyal po nyid// phaT haM tshig kun mtshon pa'o// lte bar oM ba~M phrag mo'i bdag/ haM yaM snying gar gsod byed ma// hI maM kha la rmo
273a3(rgyud 'grel): byed ma// dpral bar hreM hU~M skyod byed nyid// hUM hUM spyi gtsug skrag byed ma// tshig mtha' kun l+ya phaT phaT te/ gtum mo'i bdag nyid rnam par bsam// bdud tshogs kun gyi g.yo ba yi// go cha bsrung ba bla na med// lus lasau khams gsum kun
273a4(rgyud 'grel): bkang ste// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis// na mkha'i gtos ni bkang byas la// 'dod pa lnga ni mnyes gyur nas// mgon po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dbang bskur ba ni bdag la stsol// yid kyi gsol ba legs btab+hA pas// ji ltar
273a5(rgyud 'grel): bltams pa tsam gyis ni// de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol lta ba/ lho yi chu ni dag pa yis// de bzhin du ni sku khrus gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ku sa mA ya shri ye hUM// de ltar sngags te brjod na su// pad+ma'i bum pas
273a6(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur bsam// lha rnams lus la bsdus nas kyang // mchod sprin kun gyis yang dag mchod// sna tshogs bstod pas mngon bstod nas// bdud rtsi mchog la long spyong bya// dpa' bos lha rnams gsal dmigs nas// chos kyi sku la
273b1(rgyud 'grel): nges par sbyar// dpa'o lhan cig skyes dga'i dngos// dag pa chos kyi sprul pa ni// phag mo'i gzugasu bstan// me long la sogs ye shes bzhi// mkha' gro ma bzhi pad+mar gnas// lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni mkha' gro ma'o// chos
273b2(rgyud 'grel): ba dran par nye bar gzhag pa ni lha mo'o// chos dran pa nye bar gzhug pa ni dum skyes ma'o// sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni gzugs can ma'o// 'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni rab tu gtum ma'o// brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi
273b3(rgyud 'grel): rka pa ni gtum pa'i mig go// dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni 'od ldan ma'o// sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni sna tshan ma'o// dang pa'i dbang po ni brtan pa'i blo can ma'o// brtson 'grus kyi dbang po ni mi thung ma'o// dran pa'i dbang
273b4(rgyud 'grel): po ni lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o// tIng nge 'dzin gyi dbang po ni shing gri be ma'o// shes rab kyi dbang po sa srungs ma'o// ngang pa'i stobs ni 'jigs byed chen mo'o// brtson 'grus kyi stobs ni rlung gi shugs can ma'o// dran pa'i
273b5(rgyud 'grel): stobs ni chang 'bung me'o// ti nge 'dzin gyi stobs ni sngo bsangs mya'i// shes rab kyi stobs ni shin tu bzang mo'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rta rna ma'o// brtson 'grus ying dge byang chub kyi yan lagA nI byA
273b6(rgyud 'grel): gdong ma'o// dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o// shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni khaN+Da ro hi'o// chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni shid+d+hon
274a1(rgyud 'grel): dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni 'khor lo'i go cha m+b+ha'o// btang snyems yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni shin tu dpa' mye'o// yang dag pa'i lta ba ni shin tu stobs chenA ma'o// yang dab pa'i rtog
274a2(rgyud 'grel): pa ni 'khor lo sgyur ma'o// yang dag pIng gau ni brtson 'grus chen po'o// yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ni khwa gdong mo'o// yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni 'ug gdong ma'o// yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni khyi gdong ma'o// yang dag pa'i dran pa ni
274a3(rgyud 'grel): phag gdong ma'oni// yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni dpalnga he ru ka'o// dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa ni gshin rje brtan ma'o// dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams bsrung ba ni gshin rje pho nya ma'o// mi dge ba' chos mi skyes
274a4(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams mi bskyed pa ni gshin rje mche ba ma'o// mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spong ba ni ga shin+do rje 'joms ma'o// de dag gi dpa' bo dang dpa' mo rnams gnyis med pa rnam par dag bya'o// A li kA li mngon
274a5(rgyud 'grel): bsams nas// rnal 'byor chen po ngal byaso ste// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa ni// lte ba'i rtsa bar gnas par bsgom// yi ge rnams kyi mchog gyur pa// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje n+dan// lha yi sku ni bsgom
274a6(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// de ni gzugs laso 'das pa ste// dngos po nya med pa'i sems nyid yin// sems nyid rtog pas mi bslad do// bsam gyis mi khyab de bsams na// de las gzugs ni thob par 'gyur// shrI ni gnyis med ye shes te/
274b1(rgyud 'grel): ni rgyu sogs stong pa nyid// ru ni tshogs dang bral ba ste// ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa'o// de ltar sku gsum sbyor ba yis// gnas byas dpa' bo de yis ni// yon tan thob pa gang yin pa// bskal pa bye ba du ma ru// kha ni brgyad stong du ma yi/
274b2(rgyud 'grel): brjod par nus pra mA yi ni// de nas sngags kyi dngos grub phyir// sngags kyi bzlas pa rab tu bar+Na ma// oM shrI badz+ra he he ru ru kaM huM hU~M DA ki nI dzA lA s+yai ba raM swA hA/ snying po'i sngag s+ho// oM hrIHha ha huM hUM phaT phuT/ nye ba'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra bi ro tsa nA/
274b3(rgyud 'grel): ye huM hUM phaT/ snying po'i sngagaso// oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nA~M badz+ro war+Na nI yi huM hUM phaT swA hA// nye ba'i snying po'o// sdig kun las ni rnam grol zhing // 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed yim/ oM sum+b+ha na~M sum+b+ha badz+ri DA ki nI hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na badz+ra lA me /
274b4(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya badz+ra khaN+Da ro hwe huM hUM phaT/ oM A NA ya ho b+ha gaM bAn badz+ra rA dza badz+ra rU pi NI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM na mo b+ha ga wa te wi re shA ya badz+ra kA kA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ sau ma hA kalpAg+ni saM nai b+hA ya badz+ra u lu kA s+ye huM hUM phaT/
274b5(rgyud 'grel): oM dza TA ma ku Tot+ka TA ya badz+ra shU nA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM daMSh+Ta kA ra lo gra b+hI Sha Na mu khA ya badz+ra sU ka rA s+ye huM hU~M phaT/ oM sa haM sra b+hA dza b+hA su rA ya ya ma dA D+hi huM hUM phaT/ oM pa ra shu pA sho d+ya ta shU la kha DA ga d+hA ri Ni badz+ra ya ma dU tI huM hUM phaT/ oM bAr+m+ma
274b6(rgyud 'grel): dzidzaM naM ba ra d+ha rA ya badz+ra ya ma daSh+NI Ni hu~M hUM phaT/ oM ma hA d+har+m+mAn+na ka ra wa pu ShA ya badz+ra yam ma thA ni huM hUM phaT/ rang gi yum dang gnyisu medang pa zhal bzhi dang rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags te bsu cha sbyin sreg dang bcas pas baMzlas// gzhan yod
276a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa'i tshul la yang // oM ka ra ka R+Sha badz+ra bA ts+tsha De badz+dza khar+d+ha ka pA la huM hUM phaT/ ces bya ba la sogs pa rnams oM dang hUM d+h+yaM phaT k+Shu bar chud pa/ phreng ba'i sngags dang / dpa' bo dpa' mo rnams 'brel
276a2(rgyud 'grel): bar bzla so// mnga'i 'od dang sgro'i 'od dang / lu gu rgyud dang / sum sgril ni cho ga'i khyad par ro// thams cad du'ang ches bstsal// rang 'dod las la gtor ma sbyin// dang po dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma// chang sngogs long spyod kyis mchod ma
276a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba'i phyag rgya rab bcings nas// skra grol gtser bur gyur pa yis// lho yisau phyogasu kha bltas la// dpal chen khrag 'bung nas brtsams nas// dur khrod gnas kyi mthur thug par// mngon po'i gnasu mchod par bya// skye ba
276a4(rgyud 'grel): dam pa kun 'dus la// bde ba thams cad dbul bar bya// der ni bza' ba rnams zos la// lhag ma snod gnyis gzhag par bya// ha ru kA dpal rnal 'byor bdag/ de yis mu mo dga' bar 'gyur// de yi lag tu 'ongs pa'i dpal
276a5(rgyud 'grel): gang gis kyang ni 'phrog mi nus// skye bo dang ldan kun gyis mchod// he ru ka dpal dgyes gyur nas// spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras rab gsol// oM A ral+li ho// dzaHhUM baM hoHbadz+ra DA ki kin+yaHsa mA ya s+t+waM dr-i sh+ya ho// lan gsum lnga yi bar du
276a6(rgyud 'grel): brjod// rdo rje thal mo gyen du b+hi// oM kha kha khA hi khA ti/ sarba yak+Sha rak+Sha saM b+hU ta/ pre tA bi shI tsan+d+ra da a pi smA ra badz+ra DA ka DA kin+d+rA da ya/ i ma~M ba ma~M kr-ir+m+ma// sa ma ya raHr+m+ma/ ma ma sarba sid+d+hi pA ya ts+tsheSh+Ta/ ya thai bi/ ya theSh+mA/ b+h+yaT+Ta b+h+yaH
276b1(rgyud 'grel): ba~M ban+d+ha/ mA ti kra ma tha ma ma sarba kaH yA satwA su kha bi shud+d+hA ya~M/ satwA yAM k+Sha b+ha bAn+d+ha hu~Md+hu phaT swAH/ oM khA kha khyA ti khA hi An+d+hi tsA b+hAk+Sha kA smAt+ma// skyes byas pa'i sngags kyis gtor ma phul la// lha mo chung ma dam chog rgyud ma
276b2(rgyud 'grel): dang // des gsungs tshig kyang tshad ma mchog yin te// bden pa de dag gis ni lha mo rnams// bdag la rje su 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur cig/ ces brjod la yi ge brgya pas brtan par bya ste/ sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dga' bas/ sems
276b3(rgyud 'grel): can rnams bde ba chen po'i bdag nyi du yang dag par bya'o// bdag don 'gyur dang gzhan la rnam brtse bas// dpal ldan 'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrub pa yi// thabs bdag cung zad bkod la tshul min pa// 'byung 'gyur nyes pa
276b4(rgyud 'grel): mkhas rnams bzod par mdzod// 'di yis bsod nus mtha' med sgrub gyur gang yin des// mtha' med sems can bde ba'i lam zhugs sangs rgyas shog// dpal 'khor lo sdom
276b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs de kho na nyid bsdus pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po rig po'i brtul zhugs pa dpal dA ri ka pas mdzad pa rdzogs// / b+hang+ga gau la'i paN+Di ta ku mA ra badz+ra dang / lo tsa ba dge slong nyi ma rdo rjes bsgyur cing zhus
276b6(rgyud 'grel): gtab phab pa'o// / bkra shis / sarba mahA
277a1(rgyud 'grel):  dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho de kho na nyid la 'jug pa zhes bya ba bzhugs/
277b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu gaR+Sha skad du/ shri tsakra sa~M ba ra maN+Da la bi d+hi tat+t+wa ba ta ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga de kho na nyid la 'jug pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa'
277b2(rgyud 'grel): lnga phyag 'tshal lo// srid las grol zhing yon tan mtha' yas dang ldan 'bras la nyer sbyor ba/ rin chen sgron gyur bla ma mchog ste 'jig rten ston pa rdo rje sems// skyon bral zhabasta la nyer btud 'gro lnga rnam brtses 'khor lo sdom
277b3(rgyud 'grel): pa yi// dkyil 'khor tshar 'byung cho ga mchog ldan gyur pa de nyis 'jug bshad// de nyid dbang bskur sngon 'gro bas// gsol 'debs slob ma'i mtshan nyid dag/ gnas lnga'i yon tan 'dzin pa 'am// dad pa yis ni nges 'gro ba// theg
277b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum don las mi 'da' zhing // theg pa mchog la mngon dga' dang // slob dpon la ni rab dad cing // 'gro la snying brtse bden par smra// mchog 'dod don la sbyor nus pa// rab dang snod du yongs shes nas// sku gsum po yi cho ga yis//
277b5(rgyud 'grel): dang por lha ni bsnyen par bya// dpa' bo lha mo khri phrag gsum// stong phrag nyi shus 'khor lo gsum// phyi dang nang gi 'khor lo gnyis// stong phrag phyed dang drug tu bzlas// 'bring ngam chung ngu'i tshul gnas na// dkyil 'khor dbang po
277b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bum du ste// de bzhin mkha' 'gro stong phrag bcu// bzlas te lha rnams mnyes par bya// ye shes mchog la khri phrag ste// sbyin sreg mchog gis nye bar mchod// lha rnams mnyes par ma gyur na// sgrub po grub la ma brten cing //
278a1(rgyud 'grel): de yis 'gro ba gzung mi nus// de bas sngon du nges bya ba// bsnyen pa gsum po rnam par sbyang // 'khor lo mchod sogs phun tshogs nas// maN+Dal me tog dang ldan pas// lan gsum du ni gsol ba yis//
278a2(rgyud 'grel): cho gas tshul bzhin bsgrub par bya// dpa' bo 'byer pa'i dus shes nas// brtser ldan yongs su dag pa'i blos// 'jigs bral dpa' bo'i sems kyis ni// 'gro ba bsgral zhes rnam bsams te// ri bo ri sul tshang tshong phug/ sman ljongs
278a3(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtsho'i 'gram dang ni// gdong nas grub pa'i dur khrod dam// phun tshogs 'tshe ba med pa dang // dben zhing gang du yid 'jug pa// der ni dpal chen dkyil 'khor bri// dpal ldan khrag 'thung rnal 'byor gyis// zhing skyong gnas kyi bdag po
278a4(rgyud 'grel): dag/ legs mchod khru gang gru bzhi po'i// maN+Dal byas te me tog gtor// lha rnams bskyed de mchod pa dang // bstod sogs las kyi mthar thug par// byas nas gsol ba gdab par bya// dus gsum 'byung ba'i mgon po rnams// bdag
278a5(rgyud 'grel): la brtse bas dgongs su gsol// mgon po rgyal ba sras mchod cing // slob ma rnams la sman slad du// dpal ldan rdo rje he ru ka'i// dkyil 'khor dmo pa 'drar 'tshal ba'i// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis// bdag la byin rlabs
278a6(rgyud 'grel): mchog nang mdzod// lan gsum du ni nges byas nas// dur khrod bdag po rnams bkug ste// me tog gtor ma'i mther thug par// mchod nas gsol ba'i tshig dag ni// khams gsum gnas pa'i dang lha dang klu// gnod sbyin dri za l+h+wa ma
278b1(rgyud 'grel): yin// gang dag rdzu 'phrul che ldan zhing // 'byung po bstan pa la dga' ba// bdag la dgongs par mdzad du gsol// sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa dang // sems can kun la phan don du// sa phyogs dag gnas 'di nyid du// dam pa'i dkyil
278b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor cher 'byung ba// ji ltar bsams pa'i las byed na// khyod kyis bar chad ma byed par// dge ba'i grogs po nyid du baM mdzod// de ltar khyed la bdag gis ni// don rnams gsol gyis ma bsla bor// rmi lam la sogs mtshan ma dang // leg/
278b3(rgyud 'grel): nyes ltas rnams bstan du gsol// de ltar lan gsum gsol btab nas// sa sbyang ba ni brtsam par bya// zhi ba'am drag po'i las byung ba// sbyin sreg dag ni byas pa 'am// las kyi chu yos gtor byas nas// dpa' bo las kyi rdo rje yis
278b4(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub rnam pa gsum gyi phyir// pus mo 'am lte ba 'am lkog ma yi// mtshams nub bor du sa rkos la// sdong dum sol ba gsegs ma dang // gyo mogo rus pa phug ma thal// gos rul rdo dang pag gu rnams// bsal byas nas ni legs par brtag/
278b5(rgyud 'grel): zug rngu'i nyes pa thams cad ni// gal te dbyung bar ma nus nas// lag pas bya ba cing gsang sngags bzlas// de yi sbyang pa de yin te// zug rngu'i nyes pa skye mi 'gyur// chu 'am sas ni yongs brtags nas// ltas ngan pa ni spang bar bya// sman 'bru rin
278b6(rgyud 'grel): chen la bcug nas// dri yis chu dang rnams bsgres pa'i// sas ni khung bu dgang bar bya// der ni 'thas par bcag byas nas// sngags pa rnams kyi dngos grub rgyu// shar dang byang du gzhol bar bya// dbus su mtho bas rgyal srid dam// rig pa 'dzin pa'i
279a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas dag thob// byad du mtho bas 'chi ba 'am// nor rnams nges par 'jog par byed// ji ltar bshad pa'i shar mthobs// myur du rigs rnams zad par byed// dbus su dma' bas grub med cing // sgrub pa po ni 'joms dang
279a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan// de lta'i skyon rnams yongs spangs te// khru gang nas brtsams khru stong ngam// khru ni bcu gnyis dang ldan par// gru bzhi shin tu mdzes par bya// mchod pa'i sa dang ldan byas te// shin tu dag par mi bya'o// lci bas la mi lhung bas// dkyil
279a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor sa ni logs par byug/ dur khrod kyi ni thal ba dang // mi 'chi bcu byed byas pas byug/ me tog sil mes legs bkang ste// bdag nyid dpo ldan 'ag 'thung gi/ cha legs legs par gnas byas nas// sems dpa'i skyil krung sbyor ba yas//
279a4(rgyud 'grel): dang pong tshogs ni rangab rdzogs / rmA oM zhes ni m+b+ha na brdzu nas// san mo mkha' smra sa byu sh+tsa// d+hIdz+dza hUM las / ma skye rje ny+dza m+me pa pa// na bya nas na sngags 'ang brjod// mam na hrI b+ha swA nA~M// de nas zlas
279a5(rgyud 'grel):  sa pam na pa nas/ da rgyal gas la ba'o// // gatshal pa das sa / na skyes ga/ m+bi/ ga sbyi
279a6(rgyud 'grel): ngag med pa yi mchog dkyil 'khor ngom pa bshang du gsol// mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs// mtshan med thams cad rnam par spangs// kun dub rang po du tsho / dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// sbo'i gyimo rnamachog las
279b1(rgyud 'grel): byung // ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyong ba// kun tu bzang po gsung gi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// sems can kun gyi sems chen po// rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med// kun bzangs thugs mchog kha lo sgyur// dkyil 'khor dam pa bshadu gsol//
279b2(rgyud 'grel): de ltar gsol ba'i tshig thos nas// rnal rgyal he ru kar byas te// mig gnyis ma dang Ta las byung // nyi ma zla ba rab bsgoms la// de dbus hUM las rdo rje che// nag po khro tshogs 'od 'phro bsam// rkang mthil aHlas sna tshogs kyi// rdo rje 'od zer dang ldan
279b3(rgyud 'grel): dgod// rdo rje dril bu kha T+wAM 'dzin// dkyil 'khor na mkhar bteg nas kyang // rdo rje lta ba dang bcas pas// byang shar gyi ni mtshams 'dug ste// rdo rje gsor bar mngon brtson pas// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// sangs rgyas deng du bdag la gson// nga ni dpa
279b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan he ru ka/ bka' yi 'khor lo rab sbyor gyis// lha klu lha mini gsang ba pa// rdzid byed la sogs pagegs kyi tshogs// sa 'dir ma gnas gzhan du dngas// gal te bdag bsgo las 'das na// rdo rje ba bzhin 'bar bal// rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba 'dis// mgon
279b5(rgyud 'grel): chel ba brgyur 'gas shing // 'jigs par 'gyur bar gdon mi za// dpal ldan khrog 'thung nga ror ldan// lan gsum du ni brjod par bya// g.yas nas lan gsum bskor ba dang // hUM zhes bya ba rab brjod nas// rdo rje grom pas 'gro ba dang // shar dang lho dang chu
279b6(rgyud 'grel): dang byang // g.yon brkyang ba dang g.yas brkyang dang // zlum po dang ni sa ga rnams// lan gsum du ni bsgoms te bya// rdo rje khro mo dang ldan pas// goms stabs rnam pa brgyad du 'gyur// de nis dbus su 'ongs nas kyang // sor ni bcu gnyis dang ldan zhing // seng lding
280a1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs dri mar bskus// dar dmar me tog phreng btags pa'o// phur bu bcu ni byas nas kyang // bgogs dgrar byin gyi brlabs zhal bzhi pas// dgug pas bka' yo 'khor lo spyad// dbang ldan la sogs phyogs bcur gdag/
280a2(rgyud 'grel): mtha'i dbyangs yig las byung ba'i// sa ni sna tshogs rdo rjer bya// rdo rje lta ba'i sbyor ba yis// ra ba dang nau dra ba bya// bdag nyid go chas rnam bsrungs nas// dpa' bo brtan par gnas pa bya// sa'i cho ga ste dang po'o// // de nas nong par sngar langs
280a3(rgyud 'grel): te// mchod pa kun dang rab ldan pas// rnal 'byor rnam par rdzogs dmigs te// dkyil 'khor dbus su 'dug nas ni// sa gnon po'i phyag rgya yis// Tak+ki ni ni hUM dzaHoM haM// sngogs des gser gyi mdog ldan zhing // rtag pas ral ba'i cho ga
280a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshon pa// rgyan mdzes gser gyi bum par ldan// pad+ma dkar po la gnas shing // bdag la bka' nod lha mo lha// mchod yon zhal bsil sogs phul nas// spos snod rdo rje dril 'dzin pas// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// spyod pa'i tshul
280a5(rgyud 'grel): dang khyad par gyi// sa dang pha rol phyin pa la// lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur// skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis// ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa// de bzhin bdag gi bdud sde las// rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri// lan gsum brjod pas rjes gnang
280a6(rgyud 'grel): de nyid du ni thim par bsamo// de nas ga bu ro la sogs dri yo chus// dkyil 'khor kun tu snyoms par byug/ dri zhim dam tshig dang ldan pas// dbus su gru bzhir rang sngogs kyis// de bzhin kun tu rab tu zlum// rang rang sngags kyi
280b1(rgyud 'grel): me tog dgod// rang sngags lha yi bdag nyid bsam// mar mo la sogs mchod pa kun// lha yi grangs bzhin rnam bkod de// bcu las dman pa nyid mi bya// 'bad de bskyed pa rdzogs gyur nas// 'bar ba'i phyag rgya rab bcings te// rkang pa mnan cing
280b2(rgyud 'grel): steng du blta// gyen du pheM gyi sgra sgrogs shing // phyogs rnams kun na bzhugs gyur pa'i// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams ni// spyan drangs dgug gzhug bcing ba dang // dbang du byas te byin gyis brlab// rang rang sngags kyi logs mchod nas// tha
280b3(rgyud 'grel): dad dam tshig dam tshig ches// mchod de rang rang gsang sngags bzlas// dgyes pa che la rnam bkod nas// sna tshogs mchod pas rab tu mchod// rdzas rnams thams cad bkod nas ni// lha rnams bsnyen gsan dbab par bya// g.yas par spos snod rdo
280b4(rgyud 'grel): rje dang // g.yon pas dril 'dzin pus btsugs nas// he ru ka dpal bcom ldan 'das// rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// thugs rje'i bdag nyid can rnams kyi// dkyil 'khor bdag ni bri bar 'tshal// slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang // khyed
280b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir// bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la// de ni gnang ba mdzad pa'i rigs// 'gro ba'i 'khor lo don mdzad pa'i// sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol// byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom dang // gang gzhan
280b6(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags lha rnams dang // lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang // gang yang 'byung po mthu chen dang // sems can bstan la dga' ba rnams// sha dang rdo rje'i spyan mnga' ba/ bdag la dgongs par mdzad du gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis//
281a1(rgyud 'grel): he ru ka 'byung dkyil 'khor ni// yo byed ci 'byor pas 'dri na// deng bdag slob mar bcas pa la// thugs ni brtse bar dgongs nas su// tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du// byin gyis brlab par mdzad du
281a2(rgyud 'grel): gsol// de ltar lan gsum gsol btab nas// rab dra ba la sogs pas// mtsham bcing ba ni brtan byas nas// g.yas kyis tsa bder nyal te brtag/ de nas bum pa bya ba ni// rin chen gser ram zangs la sogs// yang na sa yi khams
281a3(rgyud 'grel): las byung // mgrin mtho lte ba'ang yangs pa dang // mchu 'phyang khu khyer dang ldan zhing // rtsa ba nag po la sogs med// tsan dan dkar pos legs bskus te// bsang bdug bgegs bskrad sngon 'gro bas// dri zhim pa yi chus bkang ste// 'bras
281a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi so ba mon sran gre'u// nas dang glo dang til dag dang // mu tog glaser dang rin chen dang // byu ru dngul ni dri ma med// bya g+h+ri sed g+h+ri ha sa dang // ha sa de ba kar Ni ka/ me tog kha dog lnga po dang // ga pur gur kum tsan dan dang // tsan dan dmar po
281a5(rgyud 'grel): gla rtsi rnams// sngags bzlas nas ni byug par bya// kha dog lnga yis srang bu dang // mgrin pa gos zung mchog gis dikri/ 'dab bcas me tog 'bras ldan po'o// lcug ma yis ni kha brgyan te// pad+ma'i dbus su rigs kyi mtshan// rang rang
281a6(rgyud 'grel): bum pa brgyan par bya// me tog phreng sogs mdzes byas te// brgyad ni sgo mtshams la dgod do// bum pa dgu pa dbus su bzhag/ shar ng+ga ya~M ni g.yon lo rigs su// las kun byed pa rab tu dgong // dri yi dung ni rnam rgyal te/ rgyal
281b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i steng du dgod par bya// rdo rje spyi bor rab bzhag nas// srad bu yis ni kun du sbrel// bsangs te stong pa'i rang bzhin las// bum lhas bum pa gzhal yas 'gyur// dang por sbyor bas lha bskyed la// las kun byed par las bdag nyid//
281b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur mthar thug mchod de bzlas// bdud rtsi yi ni rnam rgyal dag/ mthar ni rgyal sogs zhu bar bya// las kun byed pa bka' bsgo ste// brtan pa'i sems su gnas par bya// bum pa lhag par gnas pa'o// de nas slob ma rjes bzung ba/
281b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid bzang dang ldan gyur pa'i// mkhas pas slob ma gcig dag gam// gsum mam yang na lho 'am ni// bdun nam nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bar// zung du ma them yongs su bzung // de las lhag pa'i slob ma dag/ yongs su gzung bar mi shes/
281b4(rgyud 'grel): mdor na slob ma phan tshun du// nang mi gshin pa mi gzung ngo // tha ma sdom pa lngas gzung nas// gzhan rnams lam la gzung bar bya// bgegs la gtor ma sbyin byas te// zhal bzhi pa yi sngags bzlas shing // chang bu dang ni mar mes
281b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyang// gu glul yungs kor gyis bgegs bsal// til la sdig pa'i gzugs dmigs nas// oM badz+ra T+Ta ka ka khAD+D+h+ya g+h+raM Sh+TA hU~M sAr+tha b+h+rU~M byAd+ya hAHs+t+wa~M kA ru swA hA// rjes brjod g.yas dang g.yon pa yis// g.yas g.yon du ni yongs bsgo
281b6(rgyud 'grel): seM dang rlol sgrums par bya// las su byed pas ma na// sems langs // byanas kyi sa gyid mam/ 'dzin kyil lakhor 'dug pa byed // dalas gan 'angs 'od/
282a1(rgyud 'grel): dag 'jig rten gzhan don gnyer// 'jig rten pha rol don gnyer ba'i// dad pa mang du byed pa yis// blo ldan dkyil 'khor 'jug bya yi// tshe 'di'i 'bras bu 'dod mi bya// tshe 'di 'dod par gyur pa la// 'jig
282a2(rgyud 'grel): rten pha rol mi don 'byung // 'jig rten pha rol don gnyer skyes// tshe 'di'i 'bras bu rab tu rgyas// slob dpon gyis ni rab tu brjid// bsdus byas rang gi lus nong du// sbyang bya khang skor maN+Dal bya// phul nas gsol ba 'das btab bo//
282a3(rgyud 'grel): dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa pas// slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol// byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa// mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo// dam tshig de nyid bdog la gsol// byang chub sems kyang bdag la gsol/
282a4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la gsol// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal// de ltar lan gsum gsol ba dang // slob ma'i gtso bo la dmyigs te// bu
282a5(rgyud 'grel): tshur theg pa chen po yo// khyod ni tshul tshon snod yin te// gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni// khyod la yang dag bstan par bya// rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas gang 'dis dang // de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang // da ltar byung ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas
282a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro la phan par bzhugs pa rnams// de dag kun gyis gsang sngags kyi// cho ga bzang po 'od mkhyen nas// dga' bos byang chub shing drung du// thams cod mkhyen pa mtshan med brnyes// gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med nges// sgrub pa shAkya so
282b1(rgyud 'grel): ge yis// bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa// dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom// 'jig rten mthun par gshegs nas su// 'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das// de bas kun mkhyen pa thob bya'i phyir// bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig/ de nas slob
282b2(rgyud 'grel): mthul sbyar to// gsum la skyabs 'gro nas brtsams nas// smon lam gyi ni bar du bya// rdo rje slob dpon sems dge bas// slob ma la ni tshi ga 'di brjod// gong nas gong du sdom pa ni// bu khyod kyis ni gzung bar bya// 'khor ba las ni bsgo
282b3(rgyud 'grel): ba yis// thabs ni de las gzhan med pas// de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis// sdom pa rtag tu bskyang bar gyis// des ni gnod pa rnams bsal nas// byang chub bde ba des thob 'gyur// slob ma sdom la gnas nus na// lag
282b4(rgyud 'grel): na me tog 'dzin pa yis// dpa' bo'i spyan sngar dam bcas te// sangs rgyas sres bcas thams cad dang // dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams kun// bdag la dgongs par mdzad du gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba
282b5(rgyud 'grel): ni dus ni 'di nas gzung nas su// byang chub snying por mchis kyi bar// ji ltar dus gsum mgron po rnams// byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i// byang chub sems ni bla na med// dam pa bdag gis bskyed
282b6(rgyud 'grel): par bgyi sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la// tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang // dge ba'i chos ni sdus pa dang // sems can don byang tshulo khrims gsum// bdag gis brtan par gzung bar bgyi// sangs rgyas
283a1(rgyud 'grel): chos dang dge 'dun te// bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum// deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bya// nam du yang ni mi spang ngo // rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yi// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dag/ snang dag nyid du
283a2(rgyud 'grel): gzung bar bgyi// slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi// rin chen rigs mchog tshon po yi// dam tshig yid du 'ong bya la// nyin re bzhin du dus drug tu// sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin// byang chub chen po las byung ba'i// pad+ma'i
283a3(rgyud 'grel): rigs chen dag pa la// phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum// dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar bgyi// las kyi rigs mchog chen po la// sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni// yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi// mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus
283a4(rgyud 'grel): bgyis bla na med pa'i byang chub sems// dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyid nas// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// ba shA gi sdom pa ma lus gzung // mA bsgral ba rnams bsgral bu byAgyi// ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol//
283a5(rgyud 'grel): dbugs ma phyin pa dbu gos phyung ste// sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod// de ltar sdom pa gzung gnas pa'i// snying ka mgrin pa dpral ba ru// g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshul gyis// dri yi thig le byas nas kyang // yi ge gsum gyis
283a6(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlab// las kun byed pas bsrungs nas ni// dus 'di nas ni gzung nas su// 'khor ba'i nyes pas ma gos par// mchod pa thams cad dang ldan pas// dus kun tu ni bde bar mnos// rang rang sngags kyi me tog spos//
283b1(rgyud 'grel): mar me dri rnams dbul bar bya// so shing sor ni bcu gnyis pa// srin bu ma zos bug mdzer med// drang zhing dri yi legs bsgos pa// skud dmar me tog phreng gis brgyan// las kun byed pa bzlas nas ni// shar ram byang shar kha bltas
283b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sa slob ma la ni sbyin par bya// ma gas par bca' skyon dag nas// mdun du drang por dor bar bya// bdag la blta na mchog yin te// 'greng na kha spyod thur du bltas// sa 'og des 'grub phyogs dang mtshams// rang ring gi ni lha zhes bya//
283b3(rgyud 'grel): dmar ram dmar ser tshad ldan pa'i// srung skud mdud pa gsum ldan pa// dpung pa la ni bcings te bsrung // de nas ngag gi skyon sel ba// sngags 'dis khyor chu lan gsum blud// oM hrIHba shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHsarba pA ba ni tsA s+ya saM sho d+ha ya/
283b4(rgyud 'grel): sarba bi kalpaM a pa na ya hUM/ de nas slob ma rnar blags te// dga' bskyed spro ba'i chos bshad bya// 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen dag/ u duM bA ra'i me tog bzhin// brgya lam ni ni res 'ga' zhig/ 'ibyung 'gyur na yang mi 'byung ngo // gsang
283b5(rgyud 'grel): sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba// de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste// gang gis mnyam med sems can don// mya ngan mi 'ba' byed pa nus// bskal pa bye ba du ma ru// sdig pa byas par gyur pa gang // de kun dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra ba//
283b6(rgyud 'grel): mthong bas byung bar 'gyur lags na// grags pa mtha' yas sngags spyod pa'i// tshul la gnas pa smos ci dgos// skyob pa'i gsang sngags bzlas nas ni// go 'phang bla na med par 'gyur// gang dag mchod pa mchog 'di la//
284a1(rgyud 'grel): blo gros brtan zhing mi g.yo ba// de dag gi ni ngan 'gro'i rgyun// sdug bsngal kun 'byung rab tu bcad// bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis// rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed// gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas pa//
284a2(rgyud 'grel): bdago nyid chen po kun gyi ni// bsten pa 'di la byed rnams kun// yongs su gzung ste skyo bzhin par// de phyir khyed rnams theg chen la// sang ni rab tu skyo bar 'gyur// theg pa chen po cher 'thung ba'i// lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan//
284a3(rgyud 'grel): khyed rnams der ni dngas pas nI// rang 'byung bskal ba chen po bas// 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur// don bshad bsrung ba byas nas ni// sngags kyis sbyangs pa'i ku sha dag/ stan
284a4(rgyud 'grel): dang sngas su sbyin par bya// rmi lam dge ba 'am mi dge ba// nang par nga la 'ang rab tu zlos// sdig pa las kun byed pas gzhom// slob dpon la ni mi dge ba'i// ltas dag mthong na langs nas ni// zhing skyong mkha' 'gro thams
284a5(rgyud 'grel): cad le// gtor mcho gau bzhin du sbyin// yi ge brgya pas brtan byas shing // srung ba'i 'khor los kun tu sbyang // dpa' bo'i zhal gyi sngags la sogs// thams cad kyang ni bzlas byas te// go chas bdog nyid bsrung ba dang //
284a6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams la// gsol btab rkyen sogs nga rgyal blang // mi'i las la kun brtson pa// bgegs rnams thams cad zhi bar bya// lhag par gnas pa'i tshi ga'o// / dpa' bos na
284b1(rgyud 'grel): par sngar langs te// khrus byas shugs kyis brgya bcings la// gnas bcas lha ni nam mkhar dgod// bum sogs gdan la legs gzhag nas// zhal bzhi pas ni thams cad bsrung // dri zhim pa yi chus gtor
284b2(rgyud 'grel): nas// shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin gyi// grogs dang lhan cig thig gladab bo// ma nyams rul bal gtsang ma las// rang gi shes rab lhan cig tu// kha dog lngar bcos srad bu bsgril// nyes 'gyur du ni tshad byas
284b3(rgyud 'grel): te/ sgo yi nyi shu cha nyid do// ma snyoms pa ni rnams bsal te/ grims dang mdud pa'i skyon bral ba/ shar dang nug tu khra bltas pa'i// sgrub pa pos ni rab tu brkyang // ye shes lnga lngas byung ba yi// srad bu lnga lngar
284b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam phye ste// rang nyid he ru kar byas pa'i// mig gnyis nyi zlar dzaM yi 'od// 'bar ba'i lta bos ye shes dgug/ gnyis med gnyis med gsing sngags kyis// lnga po legs par bsgril bar bya// pad+ma'i snod du
284b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhag nas kyang // sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'gro dang // dpal chen snying po yongs bzlas nas// mchod de spris ni dbul bar bya// khrag chen gyis ni spangs pa yi// sum sgril skud pa ched ldan po// bdud rtsi tsin dan
284b6(rgyud 'grel): dkar po yis// legs par byugs te thig gdab bya// oM badz+ra sa ma ya sU tra mA ti kra ma hUM/ sngags des thig skud legs btang la// grogs kyis dza gsum mngon brjod nas// skud pa rab tu brkyang bar bya//
285a1(rgyud 'grel): shar dang nu tu la bltas la// g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur byas// ts+tsha ba ya~M ni phyogs gzung nas// sleb dben rnga d+ha dang bcas shing // dang par tshangs pa'i thig gdab bo// lhas ngan byung na dngos mi 'grug// chang bas
285a2(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon 'chi 'gyur zhing // ring 'thung khyer na nad kyis 'debs// phyogs 'khrugs slob ma nyon mongs 'gyur// de bas 'debs pa thams cad kyis// rab tu bsgrims te gdab par bya// byang dang lho yi sgor gnas te// tshangs thig gnyis pa
285a3(rgyud 'grel): gdab par bya// ma lus 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i// sangs rgyas la sogs khyed rnams kyis// 'gro don mdzad pa'i dus yin te// thig gi sgras ni bskul bar bsam// g.yon nos bskor ba'i sbyor ba yis// rnam pa kun tu thig gdab bya//
285a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshams kyi cha ni g.yas su ste// me dang rlung gi phyogs gnas nas// mtshams kyi thog ni yang dag brtsam// srin po 'byung po'i phyogs 'dug nas// gnyis pa yang ni de bzhin no// me yi mtshams nas byang du blta// shar gyi thig ni gdab par bya//
285a5(rgyud 'grel): rlung nas lho ru kha bltas te// nub tu skad bus gdong par bya'o// slob dpon rlung nas shar du blta// byang du thig ni yang dag bri// ma nas nub phyogs kha bltas pas// lho yi thig kyang de bzhin ni// ye shes thig ni brgyad kyi rjes// mtshan nyid bzang po
285a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams bsam nas// cha ni rnam par dbye bar bya// tshangs pa'i thig ni ngos re ru// re re lngar bya nyi shur gdang // pho brang la gnyis ge sar gi tsog/ gsum gsum gyis ni 'khor lo rnams// ka ba rdo rje gri gug rdo rje phyeng // pad+ma 'khor lo re re bya// gcag
285b1(rgyud 'grel): gcig gis phyi yi khyams yin te// bsdus pa'i tshul la pad+ma dag/ pho brang gi ni nyis 'gyur te// thams cad snga ma lta bur shes// sgo ni 'khor lo'i brgyad char 'dod// sgo khyud khyams dang 'dra ba yis// mkhas pas cha yi phyed du bya// rtsig pa dang ni ba ku li//
285b2(rgyud 'grel): Sha ka ni de yi phyed// dgu yis rta babs ka bar bcas// mdzes par chen gyis bya ste// tshan gyi sa yi nyis 'gyur du// phyi rol 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bya// 'khor lo de yi phyi rol du// shing la sogs pa'i dur khrod bya// nye 'khor mchod pa'i sar byas te//
285b3(rgyud 'grel): ye shes thig ni de nas kyang // thig gi rim pa'o// // rin chen nam ni khams chen nam// 'bras sogs khams kyi legs sbyangs dang // yang na sa 'am thal ba 'am// lo ma rnams kyis bri byi ste// kha dog lnga po thams cad ni// phyag rgya
285b4(rgyud 'grel): drug pa dang ldan bya// thig las ji ltar 'byung ba bzhin// lnga po lha ni rnam sprul te// mtshon ni rab tu gnas par bya// dpa' bos dbus kyi sar gnas te// shar du kha bltas g.yon pa yi// khu tshu re gyis ni gzung nas su// bden pa brjod cing
285b5(rgyud 'grel): bri bar bya// 'di ni me long dag pa ste// sems can khams ni sgrol byed pa// dpal ldan bde chen rgyal po ste// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// oM badz+ra tsi tra sa ma ye hUM/ lan lnga ru ni brjed par bya// sar ni bcu gnyis tshad ldan par//
285b6(rgyud 'grel): drang zhing mthe la snyoms pa dang // nas gang gi ni ma 'dres pas// ri mo kun tu bri bar bya// sbom pos nas bskyed phra bas ni// nor rnams rab tu brlag par byed// 'dres pa yis ni r-ims 'byung zhing // yo bos rnam 'gras chad pa yis// slob
286a1(rgyud 'grel): dpon dang ni slob ma dag/ 'chi ba nyid du shes par bya// de nas tshad dang ldan pa ru// rab tu 'bad de bri bar bya// rim pas dkar po ser po dang // de bzhin du ni dmar dang ljang // nag po nang du shes bya ste// shar
286a2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su ni sngon po che// lho ni ser te nub ni dmar// byang du ljang gus rnam par mdzes// lte ba dmar zhing ge sar ser// sna tshogs mdog pad gri gug sngo// ljang gu dkar dang dmar ba yi// gzhi la sngo dmar dgar ba yi// 'khor

286a4(rgyud 'grel): dang nyi zla dang // rnga mdar dang 'phan la sogs// rgyan ni sna tshogs bri bar bya// khyams la gzugs sogs mchod pa ni// bzhi bcu ru ni chang bar dgod// rdo rje gri gug gri gug dang // bum pa dkar po pad+ma snod ldan// dbus kyi pho brang dag la
286a5(rgyud 'grel): dgod// rdo rje pad+ma 'khor lo dag/ gri gug dang ni ldan byebya zhing // mthar ni gri gug yang dag dgod// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pas// rnam pa kun tu mdzes par bya// slob dpon gyi ni las mthong nas// 'di dag kun tu spyad par rigs//
286a6(rgyud 'grel): rdul tshon gyi rim par phye ba ste bdun pa'o// // rdo rje dril 'dzin dpa' bo yis// lan gsum du ni yongs bskor nas// dkyil 'khor skyon rnams legs brtags te// yi ge brgyus ni kun tu sbyang // rgyan rnams kyis ni mdzes byas
286b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i nga rgyal dang kun byed bum pa dag/ shar sgo'i g.yas g.yon dag tu dgod// sgo dang mtshams su brgyad po ste// rdo rje ra ba'i phyi rol tu// bgegs skyer 'gyur bas mi dgod do// ma dag pa ni de las gzhan// me tog spos dang mar me dang // dri
286b2(rgyud 'grel): dang bza' ba rol mo dang // gos dang ku sha rgyan la sogs// nye 'khor du ni dgod par bya// chang dang sha rlon gtor ma dang // 'du ba yi ni rjes rnams kun// de yo phyi rol dag tu bzhag dar dang bla re gdugs dang ni// rgyal mtshan rnams kyis gnas

286b4(rgyud 'grel): po legs sbyar bas// bsangs te lha nyid rnam par bsam// nA mkha'i lha rnams phab nas kyang // ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te// drug po ro gcig gyur par bya// go cha tshogs kyis byin brlab nas// sngon bzhin lha rnams sbyang byas te/

286b6(rgyud 'grel): rab yi ge dag/ lha yi grangs dang mnyam par bzlas// mthar ni myos byed kyis mchod nas// slob dpon bdag nyid 'jug par bya// dang po phyag ni sngon 'gro bas// sems bskyed nas ni rjes gan ngo mthar// dbang ni rim pa bzhin blangs te//

287b1(rgyud 'grel): di med mthong bar shog/ lan gsuM d+h+ya nI rab brjod nas// slob ma 'jug pa'i las rnams bya// de nas las kyi rdo rje yis// kun byed bum pas bkrus nas kyang // gos dmar gyis ni gdong yang dag pa// dkyil 'khor me tog lag 'dzin pa//

288a2(rgyud 'grel): nyams par gyur ta re// snying kar rdo rje rab blazhag ste// he ru ka dpal deng khyod kyi// snying la yang dag zhugs par gyur// gal te tshul 'di smras na ni// do ma thag tu dral te gshegs// thod pa'i bdud rtsi legs sbyangs te// 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu

289b3(rgyud 'grel): mang gI dbang bskur bas// rtag pa'i rdo rje rabazhugs te// mi shig rdo rje mong ldan pas// bu khyod de rang dbang bskur ro// oM badz+ra satwa tAM/ oM b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ badz+rA nA ma a d+hi She ka tAHrang rig las byung ming rnams ni// dpal dang rdo rje sgra ldan par// slob dpon/
