289b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag la stsal du gsol// yon phul nas ni lan gsum brjod// seng ge rdo rje 'khor lo yi// khri la gdugs dang mchod bcas 'dug/ rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig mchog/ gsum ni legs par gzung bar bya// hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje ni// dpa' bo rnal 'byor
290a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan la sbyin// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad de// h+ye ru ka dpal lag na gnas// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu gzung // he ru ka dpal brdul zhugs brtan// oM sar+b+ba tathA ga ta sa~Md+d+hi badz+ra sa ma ya// tiSh+Tha e Sha Thad+ha/
290a2(rgyud 'grel): rayA mi hIHhi hI hi hi hUM/ sngags ngo slob ma'i lag tu gtang // thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje snyims tshul bdag po'i bdag/ bcom ldan 'das dpal mchog dang
290a3(rgyud 'grel): po'i skyes bu'o// oM ma hA badz+ra hUM/ dril bu a las rab bskyed de// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed// chog des dril bu sbyin par bya//
290a4(rgyud 'grel): srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ rang bzhin gyis ni dngos med byas// rang bzhin dag pa'i sems ldan pa// snying pa'i mchog tu byed par 'gyur// oM badz+ra g+har+b+ha AHsngags des rab tu dkrol bar bya// he ru ka dpal brtan byas te/ yid kyi lus su brtan byed pa
290a5(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig phyag rgyar grags pa yi// skur ni nye bar gnas kyis la// phyag rgya rtag tu brtan par gyis// de nas dpa' bo mchod de yis// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// dbang bskor bar ni rab dmigs la// rdo rje dril bu legs 'khyud nas//
290a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ched dril grotsho// zung shig rdo rje'i byin brlabs nas// de mi slob dpon phyir// slob ma'i tshigs rnams bsdu bar gyi// de ltar dpo che ge brtan bya ste// rjes su gnang po sbyin par bya// khi ts+tsha ga dang / ma ru// btsug ni lha'-i sku// shes rab ma
290b1(rgyud 'grel): ya s+tha// khan+da rdo rje dang bcas shing // dril bu sal sol sgra sgrogs pa// tshangs phyi'i skud thogs rnal 'byor bdag/ khaT+Ta ka dang rnal 'byor snong // dpa' bo chen po blang bar gyis// spyong ba'i rjes su gnang ba'o// deng nas brtsams te rdzogs sangs rgyas// sras
290b2(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa rnam rol cing // rdo rje snyems ma'i rnal 'byor gyis// dga' ston bde ba'i mchod pa gyis// A sgeg pa'o// sgeg dbo bcas pa'i phreng ba 'phang // sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya// de ni bcom ldan bral mi 'gyur// phreng ba de yi rgyan
290b3(rgyud 'grel): yin no// oM phreng ba'o// lus can kun la dam chos kyi// khyod kyis glu ni blang bar gyis// de yis bde gshegs dngos grub kyi// bde ba myur du myong bar 'gyur// gI glu'i'o// de nyid thal mo gar gyis ni// sangs rgyas thams cad chags par bya//
290b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas 'dul ba'i phrin las kyis// gar mkhan tshul du bsgyur bar gyis// ho/ gar ro// rdzogs sangs rgyas la spos phul bas// brtul zhugs bzang pos legs tshim gyis// lus can bde gshegs cha lugs su// ye shes kyis
290b5(rgyud 'grel): ni tshim par gyis// A/ bdug pa'o// sangs rgyas rnams la me tog gtor// byang chub yan lag tshogs gyur nas// mtshan dang dpe byad ldan par ni// bde gshegs sku ni thob par gyis// b+h+rUM me tog go// sems can ma rig ldongs pa la/
290b6(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi me ni legs sbar nas// rdo rje chos dang 'dra ba ru// chos kyi rnam par 'bar bar gyis// bre mar me'o// khyod kyis rgyal la dril phul bas// tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab dang // rnam grol ye shes mthong ba yi// byang chub lus can
291a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams la bsgos/ ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis// 'jig rten ling tog bsal ba ltar// bu khyod kyi ni mi shes pa'i// rab rab rgyal ba rnams kyi bsal// rgyal rnams kyis ni thur mas so// chos rnams gzugs
291a2(rgyud 'grel): brnyan lta bu ste// dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med// gzung du med cing brjod du med// rgyu dang las las kun tu byung // rang bzhin med cing gnas med pa// de ltar ches rnams shes gyis la// sems can don ni mnyam med byos// 'on kyang
291a3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas sras su skye// me long rab tu bstan par bya// a yis sbyangs pa'i dril bu ni// rna ba'i drung du bsgrags par bya// thams cad na mkha'i mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' la ni mtshan nyid med// nam mkha' dang ni mnyam sbyor bas//
291a4(rgyud 'grel): kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsal// ho yis sbyangs pa'i mnga' gzhu dag/ slob ma'i lag tu byin nas nAM// phyogs bzhir 'phen pa'i tshul byed la// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su chags par gyis shig ces bsgo'o// rdo rje
291a5(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' rab brjod pa'i// me long slob ma la bstan nas// rdo rje sems dpa' me long lhoraro// dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med// bu khyod kyis ni snying la bzhugs// rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid gtso// tshig des rang bdag shes
291a6(rgyud 'grel): par bya// zhi rgyas dbang dang dgug pa dang // bskrad pa dang ni gsang la sogs// phan dang tshar gcad byed pa yi// las rnams khyod kyis bsgrub par gyis// ral gri sa 'og mig sman dang // rkang mgyogs bcud len mkha' la 'gro
291b1(rgyud 'grel): mo snang la sogs grub pa'i tshogs// ci dga' bar ni bsgrub par gyis// lus dang srog la ltos med byar// dam tshig sdom pa kun bskyangs te// nyin dang mtshan mo lanA gsum du// don ldan rtag tu bzlas par bya// dkun zla 'bru
291b2(rgyud 'grel): las brtsams te// zla ba re re mngon bya ba// 'khor lor gnyis med tshul gnas pa// tshes bcu lnga ni de rab mchog/ rkang pas 'khor l-i lag g.yas dung // lag gnyis po ti drol byin nas// de nas brtsams tAM sems bskyeng pa/
291b3(rgyud 'grel): gyis chos kyi 'khor la bskor// khyo kyi the tshom dog med par// yid gnyis med pa'i sems kyis su// chos kyi dung ni bla med pa// dri med kun tu gang bar gyis// gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga rnams// skye bo yongs su lo rtag tu
291b4(rgyud 'grel): shodas/ de ltar byas na sangs rgyas lo// phan 'dogs drin du gzo zhes bya// rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun kyang // khyod la rtag tu bsrung bar mdzad// de ring rdo rje slob dpon 'gyur// sngags dang rgyud ni 'dzin gyur pas// sangs rgyas byang
291b5(rgyud 'grel): chub sems rnams dang // lha rnams kun gyis mthun par gsungs// sems can kun la rjes brtse bas// khyod kyis dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin// nan tan bskyed de bri bar bya// sgrub pa po rnams rgyud la sbyor// 'khor lo rdo rje sogs
291b6(rgyud 'grel): byin nas// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad tu// ji ltar chags ni 'dul 'gyur ba// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// rdo rje rin chen pad+mo dang // las kyi 'khor lo rab tu brjod// shar gyi sgo drung rab
292a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i// lus ni sa la phab pa'i phyag/ byas te mgo bo ma bteg par// sngags dang rgyud rnams 'dzin gyur pa'i// slob ma 'di ni phul ba lags// las kyi rdo rjes rab bslang nas// gdugs
292a2(rgyud 'grel): ni gzhan du byas nas kyang // dpa' bo chos gos 'dzin pa dang // mtshog gam mi 'jigs sbyin pa yis// shAkya'i gzugs su rab dmigs te// oM 'dir ni khyod la ngas lung bstan// rdo rje slob dpon de bzhin gsheg/ srid pa
292a3(rgyud 'grel): shin tu dge bo'i phyir// srid dang ngan 'gro rnams las bton// kye che ge mo zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa grub pas gsum gyi bdag por 'gyur ro// gang la tshig 'dir lung bstan pa// de la sangs rgyas byang chub sems/
292a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dang bcas pa mgrin gcig tu// byang chub chen por lung ston te// phyag rgya sngogs 'di'i mthu yin zhes// slob ma dang ba rab tu bskyed// de nas slob ma gzengs bstod de// mchog gsang dkyil 'khor dam po 'dir// zhugs pa
292a5(rgyud 'grel): dang ni mthong ba yis// sdig pa kun las rnam grol nas// de rang khyed rnams bde bar gnas// bde chen theg pa 'di la ni// phyin chad 'chi ba yod min te// mi thub tshug smra pa yod min pas// cis kyang ma 'jigs dga' bar gyis//
292a6(rgyud 'grel): srid pa shin tu dag pa'i phyir// srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyod 'ongs// gang zhig skyes pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas nyid du dogs med pa'i// byang chub sems ni spang mi bya/ dam chos smad par mi bya ste// nam yang bor
292b1(rgyud 'grel): bar mi rung ngo // mi shes pa 'am rmongs pa la// gsang ba de nyid bstan mi bya// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang // sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs gyur pa'i// slob dpon smad par mi bya ste// rang bdag yongs su spangs pa yi// dka' thub kyis
292b2(rgyud 'grel): ni gdung mi bya// ji ltar bde bar bde gzung nas// 'di ni ma 'ongs rdzogs sangs rgyas// slob dpon gyis ni brjod thos nas// slob ma gus par zhabs btud de// gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa// de dag thams cad bdag gis bgyi//
292b3(rgyud 'grel): bsgo ba thams cad khas blangs nas// shin tu gus par 'dug pa la// shwar sgo yi ni phyogs nyid nas// de nyid rab tu bstan par bya// thams cad dngos po gcig nyid du// sbrul sku'i mdzad pa rdzogs gyur pa// dur khrod yin te lus su
292b4(rgyud 'grel): dag/ ye shes snang bas kun khyab cing // bdud btsam 'od dang rdo rje ldan// mi mnyam med po zur bzhi pa// 'phags pa'i bden pa ngos bzhi nyid// dran nas dbang po sgo bzhi ste// bsam gtan rnams kyi rta babs nyid// tshon sna lnga po sangs rgyas te
292b5(rgyud 'grel): dge ba'i spyod pa shiR+Shi ka/ dra sogs byang chub yan lag bdun// ba dan dril bu gsung rab sgra// ting nge 'dzin gyi kha khyer te// gzungs ni 'dod pa'i lha mo'o// pad+ma 'dam gyis ma gos te// gcod byed 'khor lo rnams yin no// ye shes thugs dang
292b6(rgyud 'grel): gsung gi sku'i// 'khor lo bskor ba phreng ba bzhin// rnam thar brgyad kyi ka ba ste// sna tshoDa chos 'khor rgyal po'i gnas// 'khor lo gdags kyi rnam par mdzes// chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig phyir// rtse mo rdo rjes brgyan pa nyid// ji ltar lha
293a1(rgyud 'grel): yi dag pa ni// longs spyod chos sku lta bur shes// de nyid mthong ba'i slob ma yis// maN+Dal mchod pa rnams phul nas// dga' ba de yis ni gnas par bya// de nas gsang ba'i dbang gi phyir// mdog dmar
293a2(rgyud 'grel): maN+Dal legs phul nas// sman dang khams kyi rin chen dag/ ji ltar 'byor pa dbul bar bya// 'dod pas nye bar mnyes byas pa'i// phyag rgya mchog ni nyer brtags nas// gdong bcing dra ba'i phyi rol nas// gus pas gsol ba gdab par bya// bcom
293a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan zhi ba chen po kye// rdo rje sbyor las yang dag byung // mi phyed phyag rgyar rab tu bsgrubs// rdo rje rnal 'byor las byung ba// bdag nyid chen po khyod bzhin du// gtso bos bdag kyang mdzad du gsol// 'khor ba'i 'dam gyi tshogs nang du// bying po skyabs
293a4(rgyud 'grel): meng bdag la skyobs// lan gsum du ni gsol btab nas// thal sbyor kha sgor 'dug pa la// slob dpon phyag rgyar ldan pa yis// rnal 'byor brtan par dmigs nas ni// ji srid thig le ldan pa ru// snyoms par zhugs te chos bdag la// byang
293a5(rgyud 'grel): chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la// dbang tshon dbang bskur stsal ba bzhin// bzang po byang chub sems kyis ni// de rong bu khyod dbang bskur ro// tshig des lce la bzhag par bya// phyag rgyas kyang ni de bzhin te// yang na tshig gis las kyis ni// grol ba'i
293a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid byin par bya// a ho su kha zhes brjod nas// lus kun bde bas gang bar bya// dag pa yang ni rab tu brjod// de nas maN+Dal phyag byas nas// nor bu rin chen kun gyi mchog/ sngon bzhin gsol ba btab nas ni// rdo rje'i bdag nyid byas pa
293b1(rgyud 'grel): la// srung ba dag ni byas nas kyang // lag par lag pa legs byin te// spyi bo nas ni gzung nas su// dga' ster gnas te lha mo 'di// sna tshogs gzugs ldan yid 'ong ma// zung zhig zung zhig sems dpa' che// gzung nas mchod pa rab tu byang
293b2(rgyud 'grel): thabs gzhan sangs rgyas mi rnyed do// 'gro ba gsum ni ngag byeng pa// de bso khyod kyis 'di dang ni// nam yang 'bral bar mi bya'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rig pa'i brtul zhugs bla na med/ blun po gang gis 'di spangs nas// de la mchog
293b3(rgyud 'grel): gi bde ba med/ slob dpon gyis ni brjod pa dang // skrab shig gos dang bral byas nas// bshang gci dag ni za ba dang // khrag dang khu ba de bzhin te// sha chen bsten par bu spro 'am// bud med rnams la gus pa dang // b+ha ga'i pad+mar 'o byed
293b4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ bu khyod ji ltar dga' ba smros// de ltar phyag rgyas brjod thos nas// lha mo ci phyir bdag mi spro// khu khrag la sogs bza' ba dang // bud med rnams la rtag tu gus shing // b+ha ga'i pad+mar lo bgyid do// pad+ma rab tu rgyas byas shing // dri zhim pas ni
293b5(rgyud 'grel): la phye ste// slob ma la ni mngon bltas nas// oM ma pa yi pad+ma 'di// bde ba kun dang yang dag ldan// ji ste cho ga bzhin bsten na// de yi mdun na nga gnas te// sangs rgyas brnyen pa la sogs pa'i// bya ba thams cad pad+mas byed// bde chen rgyal po rang nyid
293b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di nyid du ni yang dag gnas// b+hAny+dza mok+Shaho// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje 'dra legs sbyangs nas// bla mas chog brjod byas te// sbyor sbyangs drug po'i mngon 'gro bas// phra bas ye shes bskyed par bya// ye shes thig la brtan pa dang /

294a2(rgyud 'grel): bas 'dod la chags bral bar// nam du yang ni mi bya'o// ma hA sa ma ya hUM phaT// de nas tshul bzhin gnas pa la// dag pa yang ni rab tu brjod// 'bras bu rnams ni phul nas kyang // zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te// khyod zhabs pad+ma'i bka' drin gyis//

295b1(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig mig ser gos ljang ser// kham nag byor tshugs mi bskyod 'dzin// rdo rje bgrang phreng dril pang ldan// zhi la dkar zhing pad+ma dkar dang // shel phreng spyi blugs chu spyod 'dzin// rgyus la dkar ser 'khor lo dang // mu tig phreng bar spyi blugs

295b3(rgyud 'grel): chen gzhu dang dang me long 'dzin// 'dod chags rin chen 'byung ldan 'chang // dgug pa lcags kyu rin chen dang // rdo rje zhags pa me long nyid// rmongs la mdog ser sbrul dbyug dang // 'khor lo tho ba rnam snang bskur// rengs la lcags sgrog thob dang /

295b5(rgyud 'grel): chen po 'bar ba'i stan la bzhugs// badz+ra d+hi Adz+nyA pA ya ti swA hA// bsangs te dgug gzhug bcing sogs bya// oM dang swA hA bar gnas pos// mchod yon me tog le sogs pa// bzhi yi snong du dbul bar bya// mchod sogs rdzas rnams thams cad
295b6(rgyud 'grel): nid/ zhi rgyas dri zhim dkar ba nyid// dbang dgug dri zhimi dmar ba'i rdzas// bsang bskrang dbye la dri nga nag/ rengs rmongs ser na'i bri ba pa// zhi la 'o ma rgyas la zho// dbang la mngar dmar dgug pa la// til mar rab tu shis pa yin// gsang la mchin pa
296a1(rgyud 'grel): bskrang la sha/ rmongs la sran chung rengs pa la// nya dang tsa na ka nyid shis// zhi la lhor gnas srin por rgyas// chu la gsad pa bskrang dbye rlung // dbang la nor sbyin dbang ldan dgug/ me la rengs pa shar du rmongs// zhi
296a2(rgyud 'grel): ma zla ba rgyas// gsang sdang bskrad la spen pa ste// pa ba sangs kyis dbang du gyur// dgug la phur bu lag la rmongs// rengs la mig dmar dus kyi me// los rnams thams cad byed par gsungs// dngul lam gser ram zangs sam
296a3(rgyud 'grel): lcags// ra gan mi rus las byung ba'i// mchod sbyin snod ni legs par brtag/ dgang gzar blugs gzar yu ba khru// sor drug rdo rje rin chen bcas// gru bzhi sor bzhi lte ba zlum// sor gnyis ser gcig rdo rje mdzes// pad 'dab mthe bong lho/
296a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i tshad// sor bzhi rtse gsum mthab chung chung // cho go mthong bas shes par bya// snyoms su mthe bo'i ched byas nas// rang rang gi ni dris bsgos te/ shin tu dag po'i bdag nyid bya// shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin gyis// nam du yang ni bral mi bya// rang
296a5(rgyud 'grel): rang gi ni thab khrung dang // dbyibs 'dra de yo mtshan mar bcas// so so'i las la de yang shing // mthe bos mtheng chung mnan pa dang // ser mo lnga ni legs gnabs pa'o// g.yas dang g.yon gyi lag pa 'am// ci bde bar yang sbyang par gsungs//
296a6(rgyud 'grel): spyad 'os par ni gzar bu s+ho// gzhan rnams kun bu lags pas so// 'jigs sogs g.yeng ba phyir bsal te// sems ni las gang sgrub pa yis// bsam gtan la ni rtse gcig pas// me ni 'bar ba yongs shes nas// oM a~Mg+na ye swA hA/
296b1(rgyud 'grel): sngags de snga mar gyi sreg blugs dag/ gsum mam lnga 'am bdun du dbul// me yi ltas ni yongs shes shing // bgegs bsal me la sreg blugs dbul// oM badz+ra a na la ma hA b+hU te dz+wa la ye// sarba b+hismiM ku ru sarba big+h+nAM hUM phaT// a mu
296b2(rgyud 'grel): ke s+ya shA ta~M ku ru swA hUM// yam shing legs par dbul bar bya// oM sarba pA baM da ha na badz+ra ya// sarba pA paM shan+tiM ku ru swA hA// til ni sdig pazhi phyir dbul// yungs kar 'bras chan zho dang zan// ku sha d+harbi nas dang gro/ 'bris dang ma
296b3(rgyud 'grel): so bar bcas// shing tig me tog la sogs pa// sngar bzhini sngags kyis dbul bar bya// kun byed la sogs 'jam pa yi// las la 'di shis gsang sogs bzhin// las mthang so so'i sngags shes nas// so so'i 'dug stangs la sogs
296b4(rgyud 'grel): ba8/ mkhas pas man ngag ltar shes nas// cho ga kun tu spyad par bya// chang dang sha rlon bdud rtsi dag/ kun la rab tu sbyar bar bya// me ni rab tu tshim byas nas// mchod de rab tu bsad byas nas// 'bar ba'i bdag nyid bsam par bya// ji skad bshad
296b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i cho ga yis// dpal ldan khrag 'thung sogs bskyed nas// las kyi rgyan sogs dang ldan pa'i// ye shes me ni spyan drangs te// zhabs bsal mchod yon 'thor 'thung sbyar// me tog bshos kyis mthar thug par// dang por rdzog par spyad de mchod
296b6(rgyud 'grel): de nas pus mo'i nang chud pa re// leg lo gnyis rdo rje khu tshur gyis// gzer bu legs pa gzung byas la// lan bdud du mi dgang blugs dbul// de nas rtsa ba'i snying po yis// stong nas nyi shu gcig gi bar// tsi nus par ni dbul bar bya// de nas nang
297a1(rgyud 'grel): gi mchod pa dang // dgang blugs gsum ni dngul bar bya// 'joms ma yi ni mthar thug par// thams cad la yang bdun bdun te// sna cho gsum chad pas kun mchang nas// la ge bdun 'i sngags kyus ni// dgang blugs bdun du
297a2(rgyud 'grel): phul nas kyang // rol mo rnams ni brdung ba dang // me tog dor zhing bkra shis brjod// bstod de 'dod pa'i don blangs nas// bzod pa gsol te dpa' bo dag/ oM dang kr-i te ba la sogs// muHyi yaM ges gshegs su gsol// de nas
297a3(rgyud 'grel): bsangs te sngar bzhin du// rang 'dod las la me yi lha// lan bdun du ni mchod par bya// dgang blugs dag par phul nas kyang // mchod bstod gsol ba la sogs byas// las bcol gtor ma rab tu sbyin// gsheg+sa te bdag nyid bsrung
297a4(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// dngos grub kyi ni las rnams la// rgyud lnga ji skad bshad pa yi// rdzas dang rang gi sngags shes nas// sbyin sreg rab tu spyad par bya// sbyin sreg gi rim par phye ba'o// / gzhan yang rdo rje slob dpon gyi//
297a5(rgyud 'grel): las kyi chog rnams phye ba// rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga mchog/ 'byor pa shes nas bya bar gsungs// lha mtsham sa rgyal la sogs pa yo// ba'i dang sgyur ma yang po brtags te// bzang pos dad pas mngon bris pa'i// mnyam pa
297a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan nas nog med// lcog chad 'khrul pa spangs pa yi// sku gzugaso la sogs legs bltas nas// yid 'ong bgegs bral sa gzhi la// dkyil 'khor gyi ni tshad ldan par// khru gang gru bzhi byas nas kyang // bla bre gdugs dang me tog phreng //
297b1(rgyud 'grel): dud dang rnga chen sogs pas brgyan// ser po'i gos kyis legs g.yog te// sngon bzhin du ni sbyang bar bya// dngos sam yang na gzugs brnyan la// ba yi rnam lngas legs bskus te// dur ba'i phon gyis rab tu blung // 'bru mar gyis ni bskus nas su// shing
297b2(rgyud 'grel): shun ma sha la sogs phyes// sku ni rab tu phyi bar bya// skyu ru la sogs 'dag chal lngas// bkrus shing shis pa yang brjod nas// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bi sho d+ha ne badz+ra swA hA// sngags de rab tu brjod byas nas// phyi dang nang gi khrus bya'o// phyis de dri yis/
297b3(rgyud 'grel): phyug nas su// mchod pa kun gyis rab po mchod nas// snying mgrin mtshogs ma dpung gtsug tu// nye reg dag ni sbyin bya ste// sngon bzhin snyan gsan dbab par bya// stong sogs gcig gsum bzhi 'am ni// lnga yis rang lha'i bdag nyid bsam// sgra
297b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams gsung gi rdo rje ste// lha khang mchod rten sogs sku nyid// rdo rje phur bu la sogs thugs// mang po de yi cho ga dgo/ sgrub pos gang zhig mi shes na// rdo rje 'chang chen bdag nyid bya// phyogs rnams kun na bzhugs pa yi// mgon po rab bskul dgug
297b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs bya// dbang bskur mchod pa'i mthar byas nas// de yi snying po brgya rtsa brgyad// ma yangs dga' ba'i sems kyis bzlas// de nas gshegs te rab tu bsrung // rdzing dang khron po la sogs pa// mdog dkar chu lha'i bdag nyid de// srad dang zam pa ri
297b6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs// mdog ser so so'i lhar bskyed bya// rdo dang sa bzhi la sogs pa// sa yi lha mo yongs shes bya// gnod sbyin sogs gzugs rang nyid shis// mchod la sogs pa rang rang tshul// mkhas pas yang dag shes par bya// lan mang du ni b+hur bsal
298a1(rgyud 'grel): ba8/ rab gnas la ni yongs su bsngags// de ltar lhag par gnas byas nas// snga dro yi ni dus mchog la// mchod sogs 'byor pa kun ldan pas// dpa' bas rnal 'bar rdzogs byas te// mchod de lha la gangs par
298a2(rgyud 'grel): gsol// snga ma bzhin du kun spyad nas// me tog phreng ba yongs btags te// rgyas pa'i phyir mi sbyin sreg dbul// me long la ni khrus byas te// gser gyis thur ma g.yas thogs nas// oM tsak+Shu tsik+Shu sa man+ta tsik+Shu bi d+ha she d+ha ni badz+ra swA hA// rgyal rnam
298a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi ni spyan phye nas// sngags 'odas tshogs kyi rdzas rnams dbul// oM AHdI bya an+d+ra sa mA d+hi d+hA na pr-i NaM ne swA hA// de nas slong ma dang ldan pas// khyim pa 'ang rab tu byung ba yi// gos dang phreng ba rgyan la sogs// mkhe ba'i yo byad kun sogs te//
298a4(rgyud 'grel): shis pa rab tu brjod byas nA// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// oM su pra tiSh+Tha badz+ra swA hA// sdigs nges brtan par byas nas kyang // tsA ru'i mchong bas yang dag bya// rdo rje slob dpon langs nas kyang // tsA ru'i bza' ba lag thogs te// shis pa
298a5(rgyud 'grel): rab tu brjod byas nas// de bzhin gshegs pas gsol pa yi// lhag ma sdig pa sbyang phyir dang // bkra shis rnam pa sna tshogs phyir// dga' ba'i sems kyis rab tu zo// tshig des yongs su bsgo ba dang // longs spyod lha la
298a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshang sogs bya// de nas slob dpon sems dge bas// 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang // gnod sbyin sde dpon rnams mchod nas// bstan pa yun ring gnas bya'i phyir// ma lus pa ni rab bsgo zhing /
298b1(rgyud 'grel): gcig la nges par gtad par bya// de nas bkra shis nges byas nas// rang rang gi ni gzugs su bya// de ltar cho ga kun byas nas// dge 'dun la sogs mchod par bya// slob dpon yongs su man+tas b+h+ya
298b2(rgyud 'grel): nas/ lha la rgyas pa'i mchod pa bya// rab tu gnas pa mdor bsdus pa ste/ dgu pa'o// / bla ma las thos gzhung mang mthong ba dang // gzhan la rnam brtses 'khor lo sdom
298b3(rgyud 'grel): shrI/ las gsung bsnar de las dgi bzhig/ theb bya sa mi / rnams sangs rgyas shoH/ dpal ldan 'khor lo sdom pa 'chag de khon nyid la 'jug pa zhes bya ba/
298b4(rgyud 'grel): dpon rigs pa'i brtul zhugs pa dpal dA ri kA pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ku mA ra badz+ra dang / lo
298b5(rgyud 'grel): ba dge slong nyi ma rdo rje dang / spyil cig gi tho gar dge mdzes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// // 'jig rten 'di la brtson 'grus dang ldan pas/ 'khor lo
298b6(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa'i chos la dad pa rab tu skyeso// 'jig rten 'di da phyi ma ngon rtogs nas// yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub dam pa rtogs par shog/
299a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i bstod pa du rin pas mdzad pa bzhug so//
299b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI tsakra sr-i ba ra sto tra sarba ar+tha sid+d+hi bi shud+d+ha NAM Da ma Ni nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dastod pa/ don thams cad 'grub pa rnam ngag gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba/
299b2(rgyud 'grel): dpal bde mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// thugs rje dbyangs las gzhengs pa'i sku mchog ni// nyon mongs rnam dag ye shes sku brnyes shing // srid pa sbyor mdzad nyon mongs gdung ba sel// sgyu ma sprul pas 'gro don sgrub mdzad pa'o// 'khor lo
299b3(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa mkha' 'gro kun gyi gtso// 'jigs mdzad dpa' bo bskal po'i me ltar 'bar// sna tshogs 'phrin las rigs lngas yongs mtshon pa'i// ral pa'i thor tshugs sna tshogs rdo rjes mdzes// byang chub sems mchog chos rnams rab gsungs pa'i//
299b4(rgyud 'grel): spyi bor zla chos cod pan 'khor los brgyan// zhal gdangs khro gnyer smin ma glog lta 'gyu// skye shi rtsad gcod keng rus mche ba gtsigs// tshad med bzhi ldan dpa' bo zhal bzhi la// mi bskyod rigs mtshon ye shes lnga ldan pa'i// rdo rje
299b5(rgyud 'grel): phreng dang thod pa lnga lngas brgyan// stong nyid snying rje rab tu 'dres gyur pa'o// 'od zer 'phro ba sna tshogs du ma las// sangs rgyas tshogs kyis kun tu sbyin 'phro ba'i// sku gsum dpa' bo ye shes lnga bdag nyid// sgeg pa la sogs rol po'i nyams
299b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis mdzes// snying rje'i spyan dmar bcu gnyis me bzhin 'jigs// he ru ka dpal bde michog sprul po'i sku// 'chang byed tshes dang nyan pa'i tshogs ldan pa'i// nyan thos reng sangs bla med rgyal ba dang // 'jig rten rab gnas 'jig rten 'das pa yi//
300a1(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin nyid ni khyod las gzhan ma mchis// gsang ba'i bde mchog bdud bral ye shes sku// pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya drug gis mdzes// a la la zhes dur khrod gar dang ldan// pheM ga sgra sgrogs mkha' 'gro'i chog
300a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams sdud// 'du byed rnam dag mgo bo'i phreng bas brgyan// drag po kun 'dul stag gi sham thabs can// rdo rje'i rta gang khams gsum bsdogs mdzad cing // ma rig la sogs rten 'brel rnam dag pa// byams pa'i thugs mnga' bcu gnyis
300a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag dang ldan// g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje rtse lnga ni// ye shes lnga ldan dug lnga rnam par 'joms// phyag g.yon dang po dril bu rnam 'dzin pa// rtog pa rnam spangs shes rab rang bzhin ldan// de 'og phyag gnyis gti mug rnam dag pI'o// glang
300a4(rgyud 'grel): chen ko rlon dpa' bo'i gos su mnapas// chos rnams sgrogs pa'i Da ma ru bsnams shing // lha sku rnam dag kha T+wAM rdo rjes mtshan// gri gug 'bar bas nyon mongs 'ching ba gcong // 'dod chags rnam dag thod pa khrag chen 'dzin// thugs
300a5(rgyud 'grel): rje'i dgra stas drag po'i lha rnams 'joms// sdig mdzub zhags pas bdud dung ga shin rje 'dul// tri shul rtse gsum skyes bu phug cing 'phyar// bdud bzhi las rgyal lha chen rnams bsad cing // tshangs pa'i mgo bcang dpa' bo'i
300a6(rgyud 'grel): lag ni 'dzin// rtag chad spangs phyir sna tshogs pad+ma ngo // nyi mi'i dbus ni bgegs chen dum gzir// 'jogs byeng dros mo tshon g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis mnon// ha ha sgra sgrogs phag ma'i sku la 'khril// khros pa'i dpung
300b1(rgyud 'grel): chen bdud dgra rlag par byed// gsang ba'i mgon po rang nyid la lus shing // dasteng rdzogs la gnas gsang ba'i mchog la dgyes// brtan po'i blo can dngon po'i rnal 'byor ba// dngos grub mchog stsol he ru ka la 'dud// gsang
300b2(rgyud 'grel): kun ldan rdo rje phag mo ni// bde mchog 'khor lo 'jigs byed rgyal po'i yum// 'dod pa'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas mkha' 'gre cha// hi hi bzhang cing ba gshegs sku lo 'khril// bdud 'dul rgyal mo skal ldan dbang phyug ma// sku
300b3(rgyud 'grel): mdog dmar mo thong pi'i phreng ba can// gri gug sdigs mdzub gdug pa bsreg mdzad cing // thong po khrag can he ru ka la 'khyung // mche ba gtsigs shing drag shul 'jigs ldan ma// dman pas 'grub 'gyur mkha' 'gro dbang du bsdung
300b4(rgyud 'grel): chags ltar rtog med zhal gnyis ldan pa yis// rdo rje rnal 'byor stong nyid snying rje che// bdudu 'dul mkha' 'gro dbang phyug ye shes sku// gsung ba'i lha mo 'gro ba'i don mdzad ma// ye shes me dpung klong ma glog ltar 'gyur// mkhar
300b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro phag mo 'bar ba'i gzi brjid can// 'jigs pa'i cha byang bdud bzhi kun skrag byed// 'khor los dbu rgyan rdo rje'i rno cha can// mgul rgyan do shal spyi gtsug nor bu dang // dpung rgyan lag gdung se ral khar byas shing // dum bu'i sku
300b6(rgyud 'grel): rags sol sil sgra dang ldan// zhabs gnyis brkyang bsum gnyis med 'khrol ba'o tshul// bdo bo'i rang bzhon legs pa'i chos dbyings ldan// dbu skra grol zhing thugs rjes kun khyab pas// i rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod la sogs dang /
301a1(rgyud 'grel): grub chen brgyad sogs sgrub po la ster zhing // ye shes spyan gsum dus gsum gdul bya gzigs// rang ba'i sems kyis 'jigs dus khyod dran na// sdug bsngal kun sel dngos grub mchog stsol zhing // longs spyod
301a2(rgyud 'grel): sprul pa sna tshogs skur ston pa'i// sgrub po'i don mdzad rnal 'byor ma la 'dud // bde chen 'khor lo sna tshogs pad+ma ya// 'dab brgyad phyogs nas mA ma kI sogs gnas// zhal bzhi la phyogs dngos grub ster ba yi// gsang ba'i dbang phyug dpa'
301a3(rgyud 'grel): mo bzhi la 'dud// me long ye shes las skyes thong phreng can// in+d+ra nI la'i mdog can gtum pa mo// gsang ba'i lha mo dpal ldan dbang phyug sku// g.yas brkyang dpa' mo ro yi steng na gnas// phyag bzhi nag mo 'jigs pa'i glu len ma// gra
301a4(rgyud 'grel): gug thod pa kha d+h+r-i cang te'u bsnams// lus rjes dran pa'i ngo bo chu rang bzhin// rdo rje mkha' 'gro che la phyag 'tshalo// bya ba nan tan ye shes dpal ldan ma// sems ma rdo rje dam tshig sgrol ma'i mchog/ 'khor lo la sogs phyag rgya lnga yis
301a5(rgyud 'grel): brgyan// DA ma ru sgras gtso mo skul byed cing // kha T+wAM ga bsnams 'jigs po'i pham sgra sgrogs// tshor rjes dran pa'i rang bzhin rlung bdag nyid// ljang gu'i mdog can gri grag thod pa 'dzin// lngas rigs mkha' 'gro lA mo mel 'dud//
301a6(rgyud 'grel): so sor kun rtog ye shes dbyings phyug ma// rA ga'i mdog can gar gyi stobs ldan ma// Da ma ru 'khrol kha T+wAM g.yon na bsnams// gri gug thod khrag dgra bgegs zhal du gsol// chos rjes dran pa'i gcer bu spyan gsum ma// me yi bdag
301b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro che// sku mdog dmar mo ma rungs gsod pa yi// khaN+Da ro he che la phyag 'tshalo// mnyam nyid ye shes rang bzhin las skyes shing // bdud 'dul dpa' mo rus pa'i rgyan 'dzin cing // me dpung nang bzhugs mgo phreng ngo shal
301b2(rgyud 'grel): can// gr-i gug gcod mdzad thod pa'i khrag 'thung ma// kha T+wAM ga bsnams ser mo cang ti'u 'khrol// sems rjes dran pa'i mkha' 'gro kun gyi gtso// rigs chen mkha' 'gro sa yi bdag nyid ma// gzugs can dbang phyug ma la phyag
301b3(rgyud 'grel): 'tshalo// snying rje'i sems kyis bdud ba ni tshur gcod cing // dam tshig can la dngos grub mchog gsol byed// dam tshig nyams par sngags pa gsod lnga brtson// ye shes mkha' 'gro bzhi la phyag 'tshalo// mchims kyi pad+ma rin chen
301b4(rgyud 'grel): bum bi'i stangs// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnam dag pa'i// dngos grub dang ldan mtshan bzang ka pA la// bdud rtsi lnga ldan bde ba che la 'dud// pul+lI ra dmar dpa' bo thong dum ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi sen mo sau la gnas//
301b5(rgyud 'grel): rab tu gtum mo 'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul rkang // gcer bu myu gor gnas ma la phyag 'tsha lo// dzA lam+bA ra ra ma hA kaM ka la// mkha' la sbyong byed skra spu la gnas dang // gtum pa'i mig can brtson pa'i rdzu 'phrul rkang // spyi gtsug la gnas
301b6(rgyud 'grel): khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// oM D+yan la gnas dpa' bo kaM ka la// pags pa dri ma rnams ngag sa la 'dul// 'od ldan ma ni dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul ting // rna g.yas la gnas khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// arbu dar gnas mche ba rnam par
302a1(rgyud 'grel): gcags// lha rnams 'dul zhing sha la rnam par gnas// skya chen man sems kyi rdzu 'phrul chang // rgyab la gnas gyur mkha' 'gro khyod phyag 'tshal// gA dA ba rim su ra bA ra na// rgyus pa rnam dag g.yas brkyang /
302a2(rgyud 'grel): zhabs kyis gnas// dad pa'i dbang po brtan pa'i blo can ma// rna ba g.yon pa la gnas khyod phyag 'tshal// 'od dpag med ni rus pa'i khams dag cing // brkyang bskum tshul gyis rA me shwa rir gnas// smin me'i dbus gnas brtson
302a3(rgyud 'grel): dbang mi'u thung ma// snyoms las rab spangs mkha' 'gro khyod phyag 'tshal// mtshan pa rnam dag de wi ko Ti ru// rdo rje 'od ni 'byung kun 'dul bas gnas// dran pa'i dbang po lam ka'i dbang phyug ma// mig gnyis la gnas mkha'
302a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro khyod phyag 'tshal mA la ber gnas dpa' bo rdo rje'i sku// snying la rab gnas drag po 'jigs byed 'dul// shing gribi ma ni ting nge 'dzini dbang po ste// phrag pa gnyis gnas mkha' 'gro khyod phyag 'tshal// thugs kyi 'khor lo
302a5(rgyud 'grel): mkha'i lo rnam spyod cing // rnam thar brgyad ldan rtsibs brgyang sngon po ste// rdo rje'i rigs mtshon rdo rje'i phreng bas mdzes// zhe sdang can 'dul rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal// myu gu can ni kA mo ru gnas shing // mig gnyis rnam
302a6(rgyud 'grel): ngag a ra ba to mdzes// sa srung ma ni shes rab dbang po ste// mtshan khung rnam dag mkha' 'gro khyod phyag 'tshal// oM drer gnas pa'i rdo rje ral po cano// mkhris pa rnam dag rdo rje rol po'i zhabs// dad pa'i stobs ni 'jigs
302b1(rgyud 'grel): byeng chen mo ste// nu ma n+yas ngag mkha' 'gro khyud phyug 'tshal// d+hI sha ku ner dpa' bo chen po chang // glo bzlum dag rab tu 'jogs pa'i gzug/ sa// rlung gi shugs can brtson 'grus stobs rang bzhin// lnga bar
302b2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dpa' mo khyod phyag 'tshal// kau sa lo ni rdo rje hUM mdzad do// rgyu ma rnam dag phem gi sgra sgrogs shing // dran pa'i stobs ni chang 'thung dpa' mo ste// sna rtse la gnas dpa' mo khyod phyag 'tshal// ka ling+gir gnas
302b3(rgyud 'grel): rab tu bzang po ni// gtso ma l-i gnas dngos grub kun ster ba'o// ljang lha ma ni ting 'dzin stobs ldan zhing // kha yi nang gnas mkha' 'gre khyod phyag 'tshal// lam bA kar gnas rdo rje bzong po ste// grong pa rnam dag dpa' bo
302b4(rgyud 'grel): chen po ste// shes rab stobs mi shin tu bzang mo yon// mgrin pa la gnas mkha' 'gro khyod phyag 'tshal// kAny+tsi'i gnas su 'jigs byed chen po ste// zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum chu so la gnas shing // rta nA ma ni ting 'dzin yan
302b5(rgyud 'grel): lag ste// sgying ka la gnas mkha' 'gro khyod phyag 'tshal// hrI mA la ni dpa' bo mgo mi bzang // skra mtshams la gnas hA hi'i sgo sgrogs shing // brtson 'grus yan lag bya gdong chen mo ste// 'dom par la gnas
302b6(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro khyong la phyag 'tshal// gsung gi lokhor lo sa sbyangs longs spyar cing // rnam par brgyad ldan rdzobs brgyad dmar ba ste// gsung gi rigs mtshan d+ma'i phreng bas mdzes// 'did chags can 'dul pad+ma kyang phyana'
303a1(rgyud 'grel): pre ta pu rir dpa' bo bstobs chen ni// bad kan rnam dag phyag bzhi rnam par brgyan// dga' ba byang chub yan lag 'khor lo'i shugs// mtshan ma la gnas mkha' 'gro khyod phyag 'tshal// gr-i
303a2(rgyud 'grel): ha bde bar rin chen rdo rje ni// sna tshogs dag la g.yas brkyang rol pas bzhugs// shin tu sbyangs pa'i yan lag dum skyes ma// bshed lam la gnas mkha' 'gro khyod phyag 'tshal// sau rAny+dza ra rta mgrin rgyal po ni// khrag la gnas
303a3(rgyud 'grel): shing drag po kun 'dul ba// chos rnams rab 'byed yan lag blang snga ma// brla gnyis la gnas mkha' 'gro khyod phyag 'tshal// su war+N+Na d+hI nam mkha'i snying po ste// 'jigs byed dpa' bo rdul tshogs rnam dag cing // dran pa yan
303a4(rgyud 'grel): lag 'khor lo'i gau cha ma// byin pa la glanas mkha' 'gro khyod phyag 'tshal// na ga ra gnas dpal ldan ho ru ko/ tshil khrag rnam dag phyag rgya drug gis mdzes// shin tu dpa' mo btang snyems yan lag ste// sor mo la
303a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas mkha' 'gro khyod phyag 'tshal// sa~M d+hu'i gnas su pad+ma gar dbang phyug/ mchi ma rnam dag 'jigs mdzad dpa' bo che// stobs chen dpa' mo yang dag lta ba ste// rkang pa'i bo la gnas mkha' 'gro khyod phyag 'tshal// ma ro'i
303a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas su rnam par snang mdzad tshe// mchil ma rnam dag dbang phyug chen po'i sku// 'khor lo sgyur ma yang dag rtog pa ste// mthe bong la gnas mkha' 'gro khyod phyag 'tshal// ku lu tAr gnas rdo rje sems dpa' ni// 'gro ba'i
303b1(rgyud 'grel): mgon po snabs sogs rnam dag pa// brtson 'grus chen mo yang dag ngag ldan zhing // pus mo la gnas mkha' 'gro khyod phyag 'tshal// sku yi 'khor los 'og la gnas shing // rnam thar brgyad ldan rtsibs brgyad dkar
303b2(rgyud 'grel): po ste// sku yi rigs mtshon 'khor lo'i phreng bas mdzes// gti mug can 'dul 'khor lo khyod phyag 'tshal// 'gro ba'i don la thugs rje sprul pa'i gnas// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs ldan nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru// sku gsung thugs
303b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas bsgrub la brtser dgongs pa'i// 'khor lo'i lha la rtag par phyag 'tshalo// ma rungs 'dul mdzad rnam rgyal la sogs rnams// gdul bya'i dbang gis khro mo'i skur ston cing // sgo mtshams dag na ma rungs phyogs bdag
303b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dul// khre gdong la sogs sprul pa'i mkha' 'gro gnas// bya rog gdong can mkha' 'gro 'jigs pa'i gzugs// zhal gyi nga res 'brug stong bdud las rgyal// gar gyi sbyor ldan gcer bu phyag bzhi ma// nag mo 'jigs byed
303b5(rgyud 'grel): ma le phyag 'tshalo// shar gyi sgo srungs yi dgas gdan la bzhugs// dpa' mo spyan gsum phyag rgya lnga yis mdzes// kha nas khrag 'dzag A la la zhes sgrogs// yang dag las mthe'i dpa' mo khyod phyag 'tshal// 'ug pa'i
303b6(rgyud 'grel): gdong tson bshegs tshogs bsreg mdzad ma// kha nas lce 'dril mche ba rnam par gtsigs// ho ha rgod cing spyan mig glog ltar 'gyu// dgra bgegs tshar gtsang ma la phyag 'tshalo// byang gi sgro srungs ljang dmar 'od ldan ma// mkha'
304a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro mo srun rus po'i rgyan dang ldan// sku mdog dmar ljang grI gug thong ba 'dzin// yang dag 'cha 'i dpa' mo khyod phyug 'tsha'// khyu yi gdong can thong po'i rgyan ldan ma// sku mdog dmar mo phaT
304a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi sgra sgrogs shing // spyan gsum snang mig dus mtha'i me bzhin 'jigs// sgrub pa'i don mdzad ma la phyag 'tshalo// nub kyi sgo srung dpa' mo stobs ldan ma// zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum 'byung po zil gyis gnon// mkha'
304a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro mgo bo'i phreng bas di shal byas// yang dag rtsol ba'i ngo bo khyod phyag 'tshal// phag gi gdong can gsang ba'i dbang phyug ma// bdud 'dul mkha' 'gro phyag rgya gar gyis bskyod// rna che mgul rgyan spyi gtsug nor bus brgyan/
304a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs byed khrag 'thung ma la phyag 'tshalo// lho yi sgro srungs sor mi 'jigs pa'i gzugs// zhal nas me 'bar dud kyi dpung rnams bsreg/ Da ma ru khro l-i kha T+wAM g.yon na bsgong // yang dag dran pa'i dpa' mo khyod phyag 'tshal//
304a5(rgyud 'grel): shar lhor dbang sgyur gshin rje brtan ma ni// g.yas sde g.yon ser brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs// rgyan rnams kun gyi rib mdzes mkha' 'gro ma// dbang phyug gsang ba'i lha la phyag 'tshalo// rdo rje mkha' 'gro sems can don brtson
304a6(rgyud 'grel): pad/ rus pa'i ska rags khrag gi thig le can// dpal ldan mkha' 'gro dur khrod tshad kyis brgyan// dge chos yang dag bskyed la phyag 'tshalo// lho nub dri med gshin rje pho nya mo// g.yos ser g.yon dmar mkha' 'gro gzugs mdzes ma/
304b1(rgyud 'grel): ha ha'i sgra sgrogs gsod byed mthu rtsal can// mkha' 'gro dgos 'dod skyong la phyag 'tshalo// thabs dang shes rab mnyam nyid rol pa'i sku// bde chen mnyam nyid mkha' 'gro kun gyi gtso// kha nas khrag 'dzag gri gug thod
304b2(rgyud 'grel): ba 'dzin// dge chos yang dog bsrung la phyag 'tshalo// nub byang mkha' 'gro gshin rje mche ba mo// g.yas dmar g.yon sngo spyan bgrang 'jigs pa'i gzugs// gsang ba'i lha mo rdo rje'i glu lan ma// stobs chen mkha' 'gro ma la
304b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshalo// rus pa'i dum bu khrag gis thig les brgyan// tshangs skud mgo bo'i phreng bas rab brgyan pas// rus pa'i ska ragasil sil sgra dang ldan// mi dge yang dag spong la phyag 'tshi lo// byang shar gsang ba'i gshin rje 'jom
304b4(rgyud 'grel): byed ma// g.yas ljang g.yon sngo 'gying zhing rol pa'i sku// zhal cig phyag bzhi g.yas brkyang gdan la bzhugs// mkha' 'gro dbyings phyug ma la phyag 'tsha lo// nyon mongs 'khrug byed 'bar ba'i 'od ldan ma// khro gnyer
304b5(rgyud 'grel): mche gtsigs dgra bgegs zhal du gsol// bsnyen sgrub byang la gsang ba'i dngos grub ster// mi dge skyes mi byed la phyag 'tshalo// dam tshig 'khor lo mi 'am ci sogs 'dul// phyogs bzhi gdong can mtshams bzhi phyed
304b6(rgyud 'grel): gzugs ma// las kyi rigs mtshon sna tshogs rdo rjes mdzes// phrag dog can 'dul 'khor lo khyod phyag 'tshal// sku gsum ye shes lnga ldan 'jig rten gsum// phyi nang brtan g.yo'i dngos po khyod rang bzhin// khyod kyi srid
305a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum rang bzhin lhan cig skyes// khyod 'dab phyogs bzhir yum bzhi mtshams du ma thong // rim gsum dpa' bo bzhi bcu brgyad// sgo mtshams lha mo brgyad de drug cu gnyis// sgrub la brtser dgongs
305a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo lngar gnas pa'i// lha tshogs la ni gus pas phyog 'tsho lo// he ru kA dpal gsang ba'i grong khyer mchog/ dkyil 'khor bde chen sdig pa rab 'joms pa'i// nyon mongs zhi bas pade nyi zlum por gnas// mi shes
305a3(rgyud 'grel): gcod phyir gr-i gug phreng bas mdzes// lha rnams mchod phyir yon tan kun ldan pa'i// bum pa sna tshogs bdud rtsis rab bkang nas// 'dod yon snam bur lha mo kun ldan zhing // pany+tsa rA ga rin chen pha gur ldan// dra ba dra phyeng rin chen
305a4(rgyud 'grel): nyi zla dang // me rtag phreng dang gser gyi dril bu dbyangs// brtson 'grus rlung bskyong dam pa'i chas sgra sgrogs// ra ru ka sogs mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan// yon tan rgyas phyir gru bzhi sgo bzhis mdzes// rin chen rta babs chos 'khor
305a5(rgyud 'grel): gdugs kyis phub// yid 'ong ri dgas pa dan bcu drug ldan// rin chen ka bi tA ra Na bzhis mdzes// ba so pad+ma bkra shis bum pa dang // thod pa'i phreng ba rdo rje ra bas mdzes// legs pa'i sgo khyud dpal ldan phyogs bzhir gnas// mi
305a6(rgyud 'grel): dge rnams bsrung sna tshogs pad+ma'i phyir// rdo rje'i sa gzhir ra ba bla bre gur// mnga' yi dra ba 'jigs pa'i me dpung 'bar// lha klu gnod sbyin srin po gshin rje dang // drag po sreg byed tsha chi kar ltar 'phro// tshogs brgyad dag phyir
305b1(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod rab 'jigs byed/ shi ri Sha sogs byang chub shing brgyad la// khwa gdong la sogs shing lha sprin dang bcas// klu dang gnod sbyin lha chen brgyad por ldan// dbang po me dang gshin rje srin po dang // chu bdag rlung lha nor bdag 'byung por
305b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan// sa yi lha mo ny-i zla tshangs pa dang // drag po zhing skyong phyogs mtshams kun na gnas// mchod rten brag sogs chu dang me brgyad dang // nyi shu rtsa bzhi mkha' 'gro gnas pa'i sa// 'byung po 'dus pa tsa sbyang sgra sgrogs shing //
305b3(rgyud 'grel): sha za ro langs 'phra men ma brgyad dang // u ma dus mtshan dur khrod bdag mer bcas// rgyal chen bzhi sogs 'jig rten dbang phyug ldan// grub chen brgyad sogs phyag rgya mchog ldan shing // grub pa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa
305b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams mdzes pa'i// sgrub pa'i rten gyur bde gshegs kun gyis gnas// snod bcud dag la gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ yon tan kun ldan thar pa'i grong mchog la// bdag ni rab gus dang bso phyag
305b5(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin bde mchog ni// 'khor lo lnga sogs dur khrid bcas bstod pa'i// dge ba gang byung des ni 'gro ba ma lus pa// bde mchog la gnas myur du sangs rgyas nyid thog shog/
305b6(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan 'khor lo sdom pa'i bstod pa don thams cad grub pa rnam dag gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba rgyal po mchog gi dngos grub thob pa// slob dpon dA ri ka pas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
306a1(rgyud 'grel): yul kha che'i mkhan po d+har+m+ma badz+ra dang / bod kyi lo tsaM brgya brtson 'grus seng ges bsgyur ba'o// / slad kyi rgyu gar gyi mkhan po thun mong gi dngos grub brnyes
306a2(rgyud 'grel): pi'i paN+Di ta mu ku mA ra badz+ra dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong nyi ma'i rdo rjes rgya gar shar phyogs kyi grong khyer mnga' ldan du bsgyur cing zhus te dag par byas so//
306a3(rgyud 'grel): sa rdzamangal
307a1(rgyud 'grel):  dpal 'khor lo sdom po'i dbang gi bya ba mdor bsdus pa bzhugs/
307b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar sbrang du/ Sh+T+rI tsakra si ba ra She ka pra kr-i ya u pA daM shU nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dbang gi bya ba mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal
307b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo suM rtul 'byor nyid// glang gis sems can khams gsum gnas// rdo rje can gyi gnas thod pa'o// dbang bskur cho ga'i rim pa bshad// dbang bskur dkyil 'khor sngon 'gro bar// rdo rje 'chang gis bshad pa ste// 'on
307b3(rgyud 'grel): kyang+ga dkyil 'khor de di bzhin// ci yin de ni 'di ltar bshad// ri m+bo gnas pa'i las dang ni// thig las tshon dgye'i rim pas bstam 'gro ba 'di nyid rang bzhin gyis// grub pa'i dkyir ginyis mI pa'i bcos ma nyid kyi ngo bo gang // de ni gdul
307b4(rgyud 'grel): bya'i dbang las 'dod// mkhas pa'i bsgrub bya de min te// yang dag don mthong grol phyir ro// 'khor lo gsum gyi dkyil 'khor grub// dkyil 'khor lha rnams grub pa'o// daM yis dbang bskur la sogs rim// ci nas ma grub
307b5(rgyud 'grel): yauHgrub byed// de yis rang bzhin maMchi k+SheHsau rnams/ snong du bya bar bzhed pa ste// dbang bskur sogs rim kun rdzob tu// mngo ma sum du ni sgrub pa po// slob dpon la sogs dbye ba yis// dbang bskur rnam pa bzhir bshad de// chu
307b6(rgyud 'grel): yi dbang sogs dbye ba yis// bzhi po des ni bcu bzhi'o// dang por re shig 'khor lo gsum// bdag nyid rdo rje slob dpon rang // de nas slob ma bdag 'drar bsam// de nas thams cad bsgrub par bya// 'di ni bu khyod bdud rtsi ste// ma srungs
308a1(rgyud 'grel): sreg par byed pas dug/ bsrungs nas dngos grub 'gyur ba ste// bdud rtsi lha yis chus grub pa'o// oM pany+tsa a mr-i ta ud ka Na hUM// thod par gnas pa de la sbyin// khyod kyis smad par mi bya zhing //
308a2(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig dang 'gal mi bya ste// dmyal la sogs par 'gro 'gyur ro// de nas dbab par bya ba ste// de la 'di yi rim pa ni// bshang gci sogs pas yang dag sngags// zla mtshan ldan pa 'doms dkris ras// byi la'i brun gyis spags
308a3(rgyud 'grel): pa yi// gu gul dang ni bsris te btog/ yi dgas me ni rab blangs la// de la pad+ma'i snod bzhag byas// der ni de dag thams cad de// rkang pa g.yon brkyang la gnas pas// 'khor lo gsum bdag khro bo 'babs// 'khor lo gsum
308a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag de mdun du// rdo rje ldan pas bsreg de nas// bdugs de 'bab par the tshom mod// tISh+Tha ma hA kr-i d+ha A be sha ya hUM/ shrI he ru kA ya bid+me haM bid+yA rA dz+nyA ya/ d+hi ma hA swA hA// zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis dpa' bo bskul bar bya'o// de nas
308a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor nye bar bstan par bya ste// rang bzhin gyis ni dag pa'i bdag/ lus kyi rang bzhin dri ma mang // dpa' bo dpa' mo dbang po'i gnas// dkyil 'khor la ni bu khyed ltos// de nas gnas dang nye gnas sogs// bdag nyid dkyil
308a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lus dkyil 'khor// l-i gnas byang chub phyogs kyi chos// sum cu rtsa bdun rang bzhin te// rtsa ni sum cu rtsa bdun po// lha yi 'khor lo dkyil 'khor ba'o// dpal ni he ru ka yi ni// yan lag nying lag nyer bstan bya// de nas
308b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid kun btud de// rtswa ma mgon la gsol ba gad bya// chosna bden bdag nyid bsam mi khyab// bdag la dbang ni bskur bar mdzod// slob mas gsol bya btab ma thag/ rnam rgyal sogs pa'i bum pa dang // pad+ma'i snod las
308b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i chu// hU~M yig rdo rje las byung ba// mi bskyod pa ni rdo rje yi// slob dpon gyis rab bsgom par bya// ye shes sems dpa'i rang bzhin gyi// sa bon 'od zer gyis bskul brtson// ye shes de nyid gzhug par bya// de bzhin
308b3(rgyud 'grel): rab mchog chu blang bya// de nyid mi bskyod gzugs kyis ni// rnam shes phung po'i ngo bo ste// brtse chen ston pa dpa' bo yi// dbang bskur 'di ni spyi bor sbyin// oM tsakra bI ra tAM a b+hi Shony+tsi ya mi zhes pa ste chu'i 'o// thos pa la sogs dbu
308b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyun yang // 'od lhur rin chen 'dzin mo bon// AM lA.A rdo rje nyi ma zhes// bshad par bsgrub cing yang dug mchod// de ni snga ma bzhin du'o// de nyid dbu rgyun rnam pa ste// 'di ni tshor ba'i bdag nyid do// bsams shing bsgrub te rdo rje can
308b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje mkha' 'gro spyi bor te// oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye// badz+ra war+N+Na ni ye hu~M hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags dang / de bzhin du sngags gzhon yang brjod do// dbu rgyan no// ji pang rdo rje las byung ba// 'du shes de bzhin gshegs pa ni//
308b6(rgyud 'grel): snang ba mtha' yas rdo rjer bsgrubs// yang rig gzungs pas sbyin par bya// log pa g.yas dang snying gar ro/ a d+hi pa ti traM a b+hi Shany+tsi pra tAM bI ra shrI he ru ka d+hi bi/ oM d+ha rung sarba bud+d+ha trAM gr-ih+Na badz+ri su bi d+ha ye rdo rje'o// khaM yig ral gri yang
309a1(rgyud 'grel): dag 'byung // don yod grub pa'i gzugs can te// 'du byed ngo bo dril bu ni// lag pa g.yon par sbyin par bya// 'di ni rnal 'byor ma kun gyi// dril bu'i sgra kun rjes 'gror bshad// khyod
309a2(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyis ni rtag tu bcang // byang chub mchog tu rgyal bas bzhed// dpa' bo lag tu rdo rje dril// gzung de 'khor lo gsum gyi bdag/ rang bzhin gyis mdzes dga' ba ni// phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlab// bdag po'o// slob
309a3(rgyud 'grel): ma'i spyi bor lag pa sbyin// 'brum las rnam snang mdzad kyi gzugs// rdo rje can gzugs phung ngo bo// ming gi dbang ni bskur bar bya// oM shrI tsakra a d+hi pa ti shrI he ru ka bI ra hA a b+hi Shony+tsi yA mi// khyed ni rdo rje che ge mo zhes
309a4(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ ming ngos dbang bskur lnga thob rgyud las ni// sangs rgyas lnga po 'di rnams dag/ ma rig pa dang bral ba las// ye shes lnga ni thob par byed// yi ge nyi su gnyis sngags kyiso// sngags kyi dbang bskur de nas sbyin// 'di
309a5(rgyud 'grel): do sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dpal he ru ka'i phyag na bsnams// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // dpal he ru ka'i brtul zhugs brtan// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+ha badz+re sA ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha trai d+ha rA ya mi aM ha ha ha hI/ rdo rje
309a6(rgyud 'grel): brtul zhugs so// kha T+wAM cang te'u lhung bzed dag/ dpa' nges byin pa blangs nas ni// dpal he ru ka'i phyag rgya 'di// phyi dang nang du yang dag pa// rdor bcas lag pa g.yon pa yis// chos gos grwa nas bzung nas su// g.yas pas
309b1(rgyud 'grel): mi 'jigs sbyin byas la// slob ma dbugs dbyung sbyin par bya// 'di ltar nga yis lung bstan te// 'khor lo gsum gyi bdag nyid khyod// rang nyid sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin// he ru ka dpal zhes bya ba'i// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid
309b2(rgyud 'grel): yin no// shrI ha~M ru kA DA ki nI na maHsarba ti thA ga ta~M sid+d+hoHsA ma ya trAM b+hUr+N+Na ba sa khams gsum gyi ni rgyal srid che// dpal ldan yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas// bdud sogs kun las rnam rgyal zhing // grong khyer mchog tu zhugs pa yin/
309b3(rgyud 'grel): lung bstan pa'o// de nas yang gsol ba gdab par bya ste// phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur che// dpa' bo chen po bdag la stsol// 'gro ba mtshan ma med byed pa// de ni de 'dir mdzad du gsol// de nas 'khor lo gsum bdag po// ston pa ye
309b4(rgyud 'grel): shes sems dpa' yi// rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyis// yang dag bskul bar rim gyis ni// bkug ste dpa' bo dpa' mo rnams// mchod dang bsnyen bkur bzang po yis// de bzhin ye shes chus gang ba'i// bum gnas de bzhin gshegs
309b5(rgyud 'grel): de dag/ rdo rje 'chang dbang dbang bskur bar// dpa' bo rnam par bsam par bya// dbang bskur rdo rje chen po la// khams gsum pa yi phyag byas pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi// dpa' bo dag ni rnal 'byor gnas// ji ltar 'dod
309b6(rgyud 'grel): pas mchod par bya// gnas las byung ba sbyin par bya// sngags kyang bzlas so// de nas mi bskyod pa dbu rgyan du byas te// dpa' bo dang lha mo rnams de la lhag par gnas par bya'o// oM su pra tiSh+Tha badz+re swA hA// zhes bzlas so// de nas me
310a1(rgyud 'grel): tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams kyis kun nus mchod de// dpa' bo chen po dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi ji ltar 'dod par 'gyur ro// de nas rdo rje can gyi bka' nod par bya
310a2(rgyud 'grel): ste ra de nyid rig pal rnal 'byor pas// mi bya ba ni cung zad med/ de nyid shes nA de nas ni dpa' bos 'dod pa lnga spyod// bdag nyid dang po kun gyi dngos// bdag nyid lha mo kun gyis dngos// de phyir bdag gis thams cad bya// bdag nyid he ru ka mchod bya/
310a3(rgyud 'grel): rten cing 'brel par 'byung choso can// sems can sgra ma'i rang bzhin no// khams gsum da ltar shes nas ni// sems can don ni mnyam med byos// bya ba byas pa'i slob ma yis// de nas gtso la yon phul te// skye bo dam pa
310a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dus pa la// bdag nyid kun gyis bstod phyag bya// phyir mi ldog pa'o// 'khor lo mdun du bya ba byas// 'khor lo'i spyan ni bla ma che// dpa' bo de nyid la phyog 'tshalo// de nas gsang ston don gnyer bya// skyob med skyob pa skyabs
310a5(rgyud 'grel): med skyabs// dpal ni 'khor lo bde ba'i mchog/ rgyu med par ni thugs rje che// mgon med bdag gi mgon mdzod cig/ bdag nyid che khyod ji lta bar// gtso bos bdag kyang de 'drar mdzod// 'khor ba'i 'dam gyi tshogs su ni// bying ba
310a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag la skyabs mdzod cig/ de la 'dir phyag rgya'i rim pa ni sa bon lnga'i rigs kyi rang bzhin dag pa'i phyag rgya las dang chos dang chen po dang // dam tshig rnams thams cad ni bud med du 'dod pa'o// 'di ltar rdo rje slob dpon dpal snying rje chen
310b1(rgyud 'grel): po'i stobs kyis// mtshan mo chen mo la gnas khang dben par gang yang rung ba'i mngon par gsang ba'i lha mo dam tshig dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya rnyed pa ni// snyoms par zhugs pa las gang yang rung ba skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin te// dpa' bo
310b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad yang dag 'dus// lha mo thams cad mnyam par phrad// kun rdzob pa yi byang chub sems// gsang ba gang yin de dbang bsku ro// 'di de'i dpa' bo lha mo rnams// dam tshig rmad byung chen po ste// khams lnga ldan pa ro rtogs byed//
310b3(rgyud 'grel): bde ba de gang myang bar bya// pad+mar gnas te yang dag spyad // kye ma bde ba chen po zhes// ston pa la ni zhu zhing brjod// slob mas kyang ni rtog pa bcom// ji ltar rdo rje 'chang sogs kyis// sngon chad sras ni dbang bskur ba// de bzhin du ni
310b4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems// bzang pos bu khyod dbang bskuraro// gsang ba'o// de'i rjes la rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rig pa 'am// gzhan gyi gzhung ltar gzhan yang dang zhes bya ste// ston pas byin te/ de yis dam pa sgrub par byed do// lha mo 'di
310b5(rgyud 'grel): ni phyag rgya che mtha' yas bde ba sbyin pa mo// rnam pa kun tu phyag rgya long // bu yisau bla med mchod pa gyis// shes rab po// de nas lha mo nges// dpa' bo bla na mong pa la bka' gsol bar byed de// dpa' bo byang chub sems bza' bar
310b6(rgyud 'grel): khyod ni spro ba yin nam ci// rigs lnga las ni rab 'byung po// rig ma mchod pa la gus sam// dri chen dri chu stobs dang khrag/ sogs bza' da lta yid ches sam// rjes su mthun smra ngam tshig bzang // ji ltar dga' ba smros shig bu/
311a1(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar gsungs pa'i dam tshigs sngags// lha mo bdag ni ces mi sgra// bung mang rtag gus ces mi bya// pad+ma mchod par ches ma bskyed// de nas lha ma de dga' // sgra ni grol zhing gis dang bral//
311a2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma rgyas par byas nas ni// bstan te b+hany+tsa pad+ma ho// pad+ma'i dbus na gnas pa'i rtsa// bde ba 'bab pa bstan bya ste// sor mos so sor bskyal ba dang // lce yi ro myang la gnas te// de nas grub par smra ba ni// lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba byed/
311a3(rgyud 'grel): nyams su myong ba mchog dga' ba// 'byung ste de yi bde ba myong // de nas bcom ldan 'das ma de dga' ba ston cing zab pa bsngags smra ba'o// lag pa g.yon pa spyi bor bzhag la// rjes su gnang bar lung bstan par bya'o// de nas bzung ste/
311a4(rgyud 'grel): bu khyod kyis// ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar// rmi 'drar sems can thams cad kyi// don ni bdag nyid kun gyis kyis// shes rab ye shes so// rim pa gsum pa de'i bla ma// man ngag gis ni 'dir shes bya// 'di ni rang nyid
311a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pa ste// phyi rol yul ni spangs pa'o// rig 'di bor nas de nas ni// gzhan pa'i thabs kyis sangs rgyas med// rig ma brtul zhugs spyod cig pu// brtul zhugs rnams kyis bla ma'i bla// rig ma yi ni brtul zhugs so// chu
311a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs phyir mi ldog pa'i mtha'// slob dpon dbang du bshad pa ste// 'od dag phyi rol bstan pa gang // thams cad nang du gnas pa'o// dpa' bo kun spyod rim phye ba// man ngag nyid kyis shes par bya// dbang bskur bzhi po bstan pa rnams
311b1(rgyud 'grel): gang tshe brtul zhugs dbang bskur 'gyur// bsam med chos ni thob phyir te// de tshe de nyid ces bya 'di// phyi dang nang du yang dag bshad// phyi dang nang gi nang bzhin bshad// chos rnams kun gyi ngo bo ste// bsam gyis mi khyab ces
311b2(rgyud 'grel): bshad do// snang med rab rdzogs gnas med pa// de nyid lnga pa rdzogs pa'i rim// lhon cig smyos pa mi bzad pas// bsam gyi mi khyab mtha' yas sogs// de ni brtan g.yo 'gro bdag nyid// bdag maud kyis
311b3(rgyud 'grel): ni bdag tu gnas// dpa' bo bde ba chen po rdzogs// 'di ni de kho na'i man ngag go// dpal 'khor lo bde mchog gi dbang bskur bar bya ba'i rim pa mdor bsdus pa/ slob dpon rdo rje dril bu pa'i zhabs kyis mdzad
311b4(rgyud 'grel): ba rdzogs so// / shrI phan phi gu pi'i brgyud pa mnor ba'i bshad pa'o// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po par+N+Na ta kr-iSh+Na dang / bong gyi
311b5(rgyud 'grel): lo rtsa ban+de chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o// sarba man
312a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal 'khom la sdom pa'i sgrub thabs bzhugs//
312b1(rgyud 'grel): d+h+ya kagar skad du/ shrI tsakra sa~M bA ra sA d+hA na/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshalo// 'gro kun don la rab gzhal ba'i/
312b2(rgyud 'grel): rang rgyud sngags dang rnal 'byor shes// phyi rol rnam dag spangs nas ni// dam tshig mnyam nyid rnal 'byor che// nang par sang ba dang mal nas langs te/ rnal 'byor rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su/ sten bde ba la 'dug nas// bdun
312b3(rgyud 'grel): rtsi'i rol bu khar bcug la shrI he ru ka zhes bya ba'i don dran par byas te/ snying kar zla ba la dpal mchog dang po'i yi ge ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin can 'od zer dang bcas pa'o// des sgo gsum gyi dri ma'ang sbyang ngo // 'od zer 'phro bas
312b4(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub pa// bskul nas phyag btsal rang lus gzhug/ rkang pa gsum mdo lte snying ga/ rlung dang me chu sa yin no// skal tshigs ri rgyal de bzhin te// lus ni mnyam pa sgo bzhi rlung // rgyan rnams rab mdzes he ru ka'i// lus ni
312b5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor du 'dod de// oMn+d+ra nI la mtshungs pa'i mdog/ zhal bzhi ra re spyan gsum pa// rtsa ba'i lus mdog ljang dang dmar// gser gyi 'od ltar gtsigs pa po// ral pa'i thor tshugs zla bas brgyan// thod phreng sna tshogs rdo rje
312b6(rgyud 'grel): bcas// rdo rje dril bus yang dag 'khyud// gnyis kyis glang po'i pags pa bsnams// g.yas kyi lag na Da ma ru// dgra sta gri gug rtse gsum pa// g.yon na kha T+wAM ga thod pa// zhags pa tshangs pa'i mgo bo bsnams// g.yas
313a1(rgyud 'grel): brkyang ba yi gar gyis ni// 'jigs byed dus mtshan mnyam par mnan// sngags ljags bsnams dkris mgo phyeng can// nyams dgu rgyan drug gis btang ba'o// pa~M las 'khyud pa'i
313a2(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan yum// zhal cig spyan gsum dmar 'bar ba// skra grol dum bu'i rgyun gyis brgyan// byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khyud // g.yon pas 'khyud cing thaMd pa dag/ gdug pa bdud kyi khrag gis gang // g.yas
313a3(rgyud 'grel): ba rtag tu sdigs mdzub dang // mo rungs pa yi gri gug bsnams// bde chen thugs rje'i rang bzhin can// kha sbyor phye nyid legs shes pas// thugs su a bi d+hA tI hUM/ ma bcos nang gi bdag nyid de// mkha' 'gro lA ma
313a4(rgyud 'grel): dum skyes me// gzugs can ma ste bzhi rnams kyang // zhal mdog dang mtshungs kha T+wAM snod// gri dang phyag rgya lnga yi so brgyan// mchod pa bzhi yi rang bzhin rtsa// phyogs bral bde chen 'khor lo ste// maM laM paM taM hUM brgyad kyang
313a5(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig cig car bshad pa yin// pu dz+nyA o aHgau rA dwe mA kA/ o trid+ya koHka la kA hiHpre gr-iHsau/ suHnan+tasi ma ku/ 'di dag gnas su rnal 'byor ma// rtsa yin dpa' bo nyi shu bzhi// lus kyi kham su brtag
313a6(rgyud 'grel): par byad/ de dag kyang gang zhe na/ go rim ji lta bar// spyi bor khaN+Da ka pA li dang rab tu gtum mo// spyi gtsug tu ma hA kaM ka la dang gtum pa'i mig can ma'o// rno ba g.yas par kang+ka la dang // 'od ldan ma'o// ltag par mche ba
313b1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par gtsigs pa dang // sna chen ma ste gnas so// rna ba g.yon par su ra bai ri dang // brtan pa'i blo can ma'o// smin ma'i mtshams su a mi tA b+ha dang mi thung ma'o// mig tu rdo rje'i 'od dang lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o// phrag par rdo rje'i sku
313b2(rgyud 'grel): dang / shing grib ni nye ba'i gnas te/ thugs kyi 'khor lo na mkha' la spyod pa mdog sngon po'o// mchan khung du myu gu can dang sa srungs ma'o// nu mar rdo rje ral pa can dang // 'jigs byed chen mo ste zhing ngo // lte bar dpa' bo
313b3(rgyud 'grel): chen po dang rlung gis shugs can ma'o// sna rtse ra badz+ra hUM ka ra dang // chang 'thung ma ste nye ba'i zhing ngo // khar rab tu bzang po dang sh+yA me do bi'o// mgrin par rdo rje bzang po dang / shin tu bzang mau ste tshan+do ha'o// snying gar 'jigs byed
313b4(rgyud 'grel): chen po dang rta rna ma'o// 'dom par mig mi bzang dang / bya gdong ma ste nye ba'i mtshan do ha ste gsung gi 'khor los la spyod pa mdog dmar po'o// mtshan ma la stobs po che dang / tsakra be ge'o// bshang lam du rin chen rdo rje dang khaN+Da ro
313b5(rgyud 'grel): ha ste 'dus pa can no// brlar rta mgrin dang / shauN+Di ni'o// byin par nam mkha'i snying po dang / tsakra warmi NI ste nye ba'i 'dus pa can no// sor mo rnams la shrI he ru kaM dang shin tu dpal mo'o// bol gong du pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang stobs
313b6(rgyud 'grel): chen ma ste/ dur khrod do// mthe bong la rnam par snang byed dang tsakra warti ni'o// pus mo gnyis la rdo rje sems dpa' dang // brtson 'grus chen mo ni nye ba'i dur khrod do// sku ya 'khor los 'og na spyod pa ste// mdog dkar po'o// khaN+Da
314a1(rgyud 'grel): klu ba la la sags pa'i das ba rnams bam ldan 'das kyi rnam pa ji lta ba bzhin te/ 'an thang ga rgyagasas phyug gnyis pa'o// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams nirdo rje pag ma'i rnam pa l+h+wa banan d+ha/
314a2(rgyud 'grel): dAn+tu yongs su dag pa rnam so// khA da dang 'ug pa dang / khyi dang phag gi gdong ba can rnams dang / gshin rje brtan ma dang / pho nya mo dang // mche ba can dang 'joms ma ste/ 'di dag kyang phyogs dang mchims su mkha' 'gro ma la
314a3(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin te/ mtshams kyi lha mo rnams ni 'on kyang gzugs gnyis ma'o// byang chub phyogs kyi rang bzhin can// me long gzugs brnyan bzhin gsal blta// de nas go che gnyis shes nas// ye shes
314a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo rnam par bsgom// snying ga mgo bo spyi gtsug dang // phrag pa mig dang yan lag la// rdor sems snang mdzad gar dbang phyug/ khrag 'thung nyi ma rta mchog bsam// lte ba snying ga kha spyi bo// spyi gtsug yan
314a5(rgyud 'grel): lag thams cad la// phag mo gshin rje rmongs byed ma// sbyin byed skrag byed gtum ma'o// aM he nA ma hiHswAh+ma hu gai Sha Ta hUM hUM hrI haM phaT haM/ aM bau haM yai hri maM hreM/ tr-i/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ sngags dang phyag rgya sbyor
314a6(rgyud 'grel): ba yis/ spyan drangs mchod nas rang lus gzhug/ de bzhin rgyun ni dbang bskur nas// cod pan dang ni lhag pa'i lha// dzaHhUM ba~M hoHoM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka sa ma ya shrI ye hUM/ oM shrI badz+ra he he ru ru kaM huM hUM phaT phaT DA ki ni dz+nyA
314b1(rgyud 'grel): la sI d+ha ra swAhA/ oM hrIHha ha huM hUM phaT/ snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra bai ro tsa nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye badz+ra war+N+Na nA ye huM hUM phaT/ bcom ldan 'das ma'i snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po'o// rab tu 'bad nas mchod
314b2(rgyud 'grel): nas ni// dung chen phreng ba blang bya ste// ji srid skyo bar ma gyur pa// de srid du ni rab tu bzlas// bsam gtan mi nus rnal 'byor pas// go che che la sogs bsrungs te// rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas// sems can kun las rab brtag bya
314b3(rgyud 'grel): rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags bzlas shing / tshangs par spyod pa rtag tu bsam// zas kyi rdo rje sems sogs dang // snying ga'i dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg bya// zhi ba'i btu ba bzhi myangs pas// rtog pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// dam
314b4(rgyud 'grel): tshig legs so legs gnas pas// mtshan phyed gyur nas gtor ma sbyin// oM a ral+li hoHdzaMHhUM baM hoHbadz+ra DA kaM ni sa ma yo s+t+waM dr-i sh+ya heHoM AHhUM/ oM kha kha khA hi khA hi sarba yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa b+hU ta pre ta bi shA
314b5(rgyud 'grel): tsen+ma da a ba s+phA ra/ badz+ra DA ka DA kin+na dA ya/ oM mi gai ling gr-ih+Na tu sa ma yaM rak+Sha nu ma ma sar+b+ba sid+d+him+me pA yats+tshin tu/ ya thai baM ya theSh+To b+huny+dza tha/ dzi gra tha pi ba tha mA ti kr-i ma tha ma ma sarba karta ya sar+b+ba khaM bi shud+d+ha yai saM ha yaM ka b+ha ban+d+ha
314b6(rgyud 'grel): huM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ rtag tu snying la gnas pa yi// thig le gcig la 'gyur med de/ de sgom byed pa'i skye bo la// nges par ye shes skye bar 'gyur// kha T+wA~M ga ni lha yi sku/ shes rab Da ma ru yi s+thi// nyin mo bcom ldan
315a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje can// rnal 'byor ma ni mtshan mo bshad// gnyis med ye shes sems ldan la// mi bya ba ni ci yang med// 'jigs pa thams cad rnam spangs te// dpa' bo seng ge bzhin du spyod//
315a2(rgyud 'grel): mya ngan 'das byung dpa' bo rnams// sdug pa yid kyi sprul pa ste// dag pa chos kyi sprul pa ni// phag me'i gzugs su bstan pa yon// sems la rnam gnas rnal 'byor pa// mya ngan 'das pa mi ston to// gal te 'pho 'gyur
315a3(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pa// mkhas spyod pa yi gnas su khrid// de lta'i dpa' bo chen po dang // rnal 'byor ma ni sa steng dkon// cho ga sna tshogs nyams dga' ba// bsam pa sna tshogs gzung ba'i phyir// rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs pa'i
315a4(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ oMde nyid med na 'ching 'gyur la// gang zhig de nyid yod gyur na// de dag thams cad dgrol ba'i rgyu// dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi man ngag/ phyag rgya chen po grub pa// dpal dril bu zhabs kyis mdzad
315a5(rgyud 'grel): pa rdzogs so// / paN+Di ta pradz+nyA b+ha dra dang / lo tsa ba mal gyo blo gros grags kyi bsgyur ba'o// @/ rgya gar skad du/ shAM tsakra sa~M bar pany+tsa k+Sha ma/ bod skad du
315a6(rgyud 'grel): dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i rim pa lnga pa/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// bla ma'i byin rlabs tsam gyi sa ni/ skad cig nyid la 'byung gang nyid// 'khor lo sdom par sbas pa yi/ byin rlabs rim par bshad par bya/
315b1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs kun gyi// snying po sdom pa bla ma nyid// bgrang phyed bzlas pa 'dir med de// bsam gtan lha mchod yod ma yin// chos grangs med cing nges par med// sbyin sreg yang dag gnas pa med// klog dang 'dod pa yod ma
315b2(rgyud 'grel): yin/ rnam par rtog med 'jigs bral ba'i// slob ma gus pa kun mkhyen gyi// spyod yul ye shes gang zhig ni// skyes pa tsam gyi mchog tu ni// dag pa dang ni ldan gyur zhing // mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan// de nyid sa chu nyid dang ni//
315b3(rgyud 'grel): mkhAl 'gro dang rdzu 'phrul dang // mi snang khyad par du thob cang // skye ba dran dang khamos gsum pa'i// gnas kyi sems dang rig pa yis// 'das dang ma 'ongs pa dang ni// da ltar byung ba shes pa'o// mgal ma bskyod pa'i rnam pa can//
315b4(rgyud 'grel): sems ni yul lo rab tu rgyug/ de ni de la rnam bzlog nas// mtshon du med par mtshon par byed// sgra dang thig le ldan pa'i sems// snying gar bzhag bya de nas 'di'i// rmongs pa'i rab rib 'joms mdzad ni// mnga' bdag bcom
315b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'byung 'gyur te// drag po 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs// he ru kar grags cher 'byung nyid// lhan cig skyes pa'i dur khrod na// rol cing bdud rnams thams cad 'joms// bde ba rnams kyi rnam pa ni// skad cig de la gsol mdzad
315b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// byon brlabs pa'i yi skad cig la// slob ma la yang gang 'pho ba// sa bon med 'od skad cig ma// gcig la mngon byang chub par mdzod// ces bya ba ni 'khor lo sdom par bla ma rnal 'byor ma'i sbas pa las ji ltar rnyed pa'i byin
316a1(rgyud 'grel): gyis rlob pa nges par bstan pa'o// byin rlabs kyi rim pa'o// / slar yang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa gnyis pa brjod do// rtag tu snying la gnas pa yi// thig le gcig la 'gyur med
316a2(rgyud 'grel): de sgom byed pa'i skye bo la// nges par ye shes skye bar 'gyur// 'di'i don brjed par bya ste// mig dang rna ba dang pags pa'i phyogs la gnas pa'i shes pa rnams kyis kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi sems la rnam par shes
316a3(rgyud 'grel): pa lnga po de dag yang dag par gzhag cing mi g.yo bar byas te// yid snying gar gzhog nas gnas pa'i thig le'i gzugs su 'gyur ro// de mthong ba las ye shes te/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes skye bar 'gyur te/ rim gyis sangs
316a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro// da ni sa bon med pa'i rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa brjod par bya'o// nyi ma zla ba'i bdag nyid can gyi lam// steng pa nyid kyi rang bzhin na mkha' stong pa'i ngo bo gang nas kyang bar chad med par rlung 'jug pa dang /
316a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i lam der rlung dang lhan cig sbyar te/ gocig tu byas pa'i sems gzung bar bya'o// sems kyi bzhon par gyur pa'i rlung nges kyang blo'i gzhi rang khyim du 'gyur ro// shes rab blo thabs sems dang gcig tu 'gyur te/
316a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su meng pa'i rang bzhin nyid du son po mo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skyeng byed kyi rang bzhin rdo rje 'chang nyid sgrub byed pa yin no// 'das pa dang ma 'ongs dang da ltar byung ba'i ngon shes shing / 'khor ba'i thog ma dang tha ma mya ngan las 'das
316b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rang bzhin gyi lha'i mig gis mthong ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa rnams su sems can rnams kyi sgra rnams thos shing // dri rnams snom/ ro rnams myong / reg bya rnams la longs spyod par byed la/ shes rab
316b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa chen po la rol par yang byed do// rang byin gyis brlab pa'o// / sna tshogs rdo rje'i bzhir gnas pa'i rdo rje dang / rdo rje rtse mo drang po mchog go spyir gnas pa// zla bo lta bur dri med lus ldan
316b3(rgyud 'grel): thig le ni// bsgom par byed de bdag nyid rdo rje dbang bskor nyid// sa bon dang bcas sna tshogs rdo rje'i rim pa'o// de nas mig la bkod cing sems brtan par gyur pas ni 'jig rten gsum mthong ba'o// de bzhin du rna ba dag la gzhag par
316b4(rgyud 'grel): sems brtan par gyur pas ni 'jig rten gsum na gnas pa'i sgra thos shing // 'gro ba drug na gnas pa'i skad kyang shes so// de bzhin du sna la gzhag pa'i sems brtan par gyur pas 'jig rten gsum na gnas pa'i dro snom mo// de bzhin
316b5(rgyud 'grel): du lce la bzhag pa'i sems brtan par gyur pas ni// 'jig rten gsum na gnas pa'i ro myong bar byed do// de bzhin du pags pa la sems brtan par byas pas ni/ 'jig rten gsum na gnas pa'i reg bya la longs spyong ngo // de bzhin du snying
316b6(rgyud 'grel): ga chos kyi 'khor lo la sems brtan par byas pas ni mngon par shes pa drug 'thob par 'gyur ro// spyi bo bde ba chen po la sems gzhag pas ni/ lha yi tshogs mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du mgrin pa longs spyod kyi 'khor lor sems
317a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhag pas ni/ bstan bcos thams cad shes so// sgrub pa'i 'khor lor sems gzhag pa la brtan par gyur pas ni lha'i mchog las skyes pa'i bu mo la longs spyod par 'gyur ro// rnam pa sna
317a2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i rim pa'o// da ni sa bon med pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i rim pa brjod par bya ste// mdzod spur 'god pa'i sems ni nyi ma'i gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur ro// de'i steng du zla ba'i gzugs bkod pa la/ nga'i sta
317a3(rgyud 'grel): du zla ba'i gzugs bkang pa la// de'i steng du skar ma'i gzugs bkod pa ste/ de ltar sems dmigs pa med pa la brtan par gyur pas ni sangs rgyas nyid 'grub par byed do// da ni nor bu 'gengs pa'i rim pas brjod par bya ste/ dam tshig
317a4(rgyud 'grel): gi phyag rgya dang sbyor ba'i cho gas rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mor byang chub kyi sems son pa bde ba ci 'dra ba zhig skye ba de yang dag par nye bar brtags shing / brtan byas nas de'i bdag nyid du gyur pa la ni tshe 'di nyid la rdo rje 'chang nyid sbyang pa med par
317a5(rgyud 'grel): nges pa nyid du skye bar 'gyur ro// rim pa gnyis pa yang lag pa zhes bya ba phyag rgya'i sgo nas snga ma nye bar brtags te brtan par gyur pa kun rdzob pa'i rang bzhin gyi byang chub kyi sems don dam pa'i rang bzhin gyi sems don dam pa'i rang bzhin
317a6(rgyud 'grel): rnam par mi rtog pa'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pas na rdo rje 'chang nyid du 'grub par byed do// rim pa gsum pa sngon nyams su myong ba dran pa bskyed pa/ chos kyi phyag rgya yid las byung ba'i phyag rgya las rab tu byung bar yang dag par brtan pas rdo
317b1(rgyud 'grel): rje 'chang ba nyid bskyed par byed pa'o// nor bu 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i rim pa bzhi pa yang brjod pa/ thams cad du son zhing rten dang bral ba brtan pa dang / g.yo ba mtha' dag gi ngo bo nyid du gyur pa'i sems khams gsum pa
317b2(rgyud 'grel): khyab pa'i stong pa nyid/ phyag rgya chen po dang 'khyud pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin can bla mi'i bka' drin las skyes pa'i brtan par byas pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid sgrub par byed cing / phyag rgya chen po dang 'khyud pa'i bde ba
317b3(rgyud 'grel): chen po dang thams cad bskyod par byed pa'o// di nI dzA lan+d+ha ra'i rim pa brjod par bya'o// lte ba la chu so'i mtshams su ni// mdog lnga ldan pa'i thig le ni// sangs rgyas lnga rnams kyis mtshon pa// 'khor lo grub gsum dkar dmar ni
317b4(rgyud 'grel): srog 'gog lhan cig bsgom byas nas// skad cig de las 'bar gyur pas// 'jig rten khams su mchod bya ba// rdo rje 'dzin pa dngos su 'gyur// bu gra gzhan nas 'byung 'gyur zhing // mkha' gzhan nas ni myur du 'jug/ gang tshe
317b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pa brtan gyur pa// snang po dngos su thob par 'gyur// 'bar ba brtan par gyur pa ni// lce rtsa nas ni rnam par gnas// ji srid 'dod pa de srod du// lnga ni 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang // dpung pa'i rtsa bar son pa'i rlung // kun tu 'gro bas
317b6(rgyud 'grel): lus bskyod tsang // khams gsum pa ni thams cad du// rnam par lta ba la sogs byed// ces bya ba ni dz+nyA lan+d+ha ra'i rim pa'o// // rim pa lnga pa brjod par bya ste// gzugs rnams kyi grangs 'gyur te// ngo bo nyid kyis gang
318a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yo ba'i// sems ni snying gar brtan byas nas// blo dang lhan cig dbang du bya// gzung 'dzin dang ni bral ngas na// dmigs pa kun dang bral ba'i sems// bsam du med pa'i rang bzhin phy-ir//
318a2(rgyud 'grel): ci yang bsam par mi bya'o// sems ni stong nyid la gzhug cing // stong pa sems su rnam gzhug bya// stong dang stong min la sogs pa// kun rtog rab spangs mkha' mnyam 'gyur// rten dang brten pa yod min dang // dpe med bzhi ni yod
318a3(rgyud 'grel): ma yin// de nyid lnga pa rdzogs rim ni// zang med ldan cig skyes pa ni// shing dang tsher ma lcug ma sogs// khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyur bcas// de bzhin bdag gi de nyid dang // rjes su mthun pa mdor bsgom bya// ngo bo nyid kyi bsgom
318a4(rgyud 'grel): byed kyang // de rtogs par ni byed ma yin// gal te de ni kun rtogs na// 'gro ba'i spyod ba 'jigs par 'gyur// rnal 'byor gnyid dang ldan pa yi// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di rtogs mdzad// des na rang 'byung rang nyid ni// rdzogs sangs
318a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas zhes brjod pa yin// mtha' bzhi las ni grol ba yin// dus gsum sangs rgyas rang bzhin nyid// sgom pa de ni ring bo nyid// mo thogs rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur// dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i rim pa lnga pa/ slob dpon rgya
318a6(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pa rdo rje dril bu pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta kiny+dza pa dang / dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur/ phyis bla ma su ma ti kIrti dang / dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bcas pa'o// dpal pham mthing po'i rgyud
318b1(rgyud 'grel): ba ma nor ba'i bshad pa'o// /
319a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i rim pa lnga'i 'brel pa bzhugs
319b1(rgyud 'grel): bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan 'khor lo sdom pa yi// rnal 'byor lus kyi dkyil 'khor ni// sems can rang bzhin yongs shes shing // rdzogs pa'i las la 'jug
319b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams la'o// dang po tshogs pa kun ldan pas// bla maung don 'byung dga' bas nyal// bzhi yis nyer bskul zhal bzhi pa// bdud 'dul dpa' bo chen po bzhengs// khrus byas bde ba'i stan la gnas// ri lu khar bcug snying ka hUM/
319b3(rgyud 'grel): sngon po'i 'od kyis rang lus sbyangs// paM spu la spros kha dog lngas// 'gro kun lus sbyang sgo gsum dag/ sprin 'dra'i 'od kyis rang mdun du// mkha' la bla ma'i 'khor lol-i dang // phyogs dbang mig gi lha rnams ni// gsal
319b4(rgyud 'grel): gdab rten dang brten par byas// phyag dang mchod sogs byas nas ni// mdzod spu'i gnas nas rang lus bzhug/ lus la rten dang brten pa yi// 'khor lo gsal gdab nye bar dmigs// rtog dang spros pa dga' 'gyur na// chos
319b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ler 'dab ma bzhi// mdog gsal hUM las lte ba ru// thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid bsam// phyogs 'dab rigs kyi sa bon las// snying po'i rnal 'byor ma bzhi bsnyeng // steng 'og lus kyi cha shes la// pu dzA
319b6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs nyi shu bzhis// 'khor lo gsum gyi bdag nyid dran// chos 'khor phyi yi 'dab brgyad la// ring po'-i hUM las khro mo brgyad // de ltar lha rnams thams cad ni// me long nang gi gzugs brnyan bzhin// phyi yi dkyil 'khor lha
320a1(rgyud 'grel): bur dmigs// mi gsal rtsa yig thams cad la// dag pa'i lha nyid mos shing dran// phyag rgya sngags kyi don ldan pas// ye shes spyan drangs legs mchod nas// yi ge bzhi yis rang gnas 'jug/
320a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas gsum byin brlabs go cha bcing // sangs rgyas dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma// thams cad nam mkhar nyer dmigs to// dbang bskur yid kyis gsol ba gdab// bdud rtsis dbang bskur thams cad la// rdo rje mtshan ma 'dzin pa'o//
320a3(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo ma zhi khro mo dang // sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo la// mo bskyod rin tshan don yod dang // rtag pa gar dbang thugs rdo rjes// rim pa bzhin du spyi bor mtshan// bsdus lam bsdus pa'i dbu rgyan nyid// de nas sngags rnams
320a4(rgyud 'grel): rim gyis mchod// bdud rtsis nye bar tsho mi byas nas// dgyes pa bsdogs kyi sgra byung bsam// bdud rtsi myangs la bstod chen bya// lha rnams rang gnas thim byas te// bsam gtan chen po las kyi lam// rdzogs pa'i rim pa legs
320a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas bya// de nas gtor ma'i las rim dang // smon lam btab ste ldang bar bya// slob dpon chen po rdo rje dril bu pa'i man ngag lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mngon par mngon par rtogs pa rdzogs so//
320a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI tsakra saM ba ra pany+tsa kra ma br-it+ti/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i rim pa lnga pa'i 'grel pa/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag 'tshalo// snying ga'i hUM las 'od zer spros la// a ba d+hU tI nas gre bar byung
320b1(rgyud 'grel): nas sna bug g.yas pa nas byung ste sa la babs pa tsam gyis hUM du gyur te/ hUM zhu ba las sna tshogs rdo rje dbus dang / shar dang / byang dang / nub dang / lho sgo rim bzhin du mthong ga dang sngon po dang / ljang gu dang / dmar po dang / ser po'i rdo/
320b2(rgyud 'grel): rje rtse mo lnga ru gyur par bsgom mo// de las 'od zer phyogs bzhir byung bar bsems nas/ shar dang byang dang nub dang / lhor rim pa bzhin du rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa sngon po dang / ljang gu dang / dmar po dang / ser po'i thams pas rlung yang
320b3(rgyud 'grel): mi thar bar gyur par bsam mo// rdo rje de dag gi rtse mo l-is 'od 'phros pas shar phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / lho phyogs kyi steng gi cha rdo rje rtse lnga pa sngon po dang / ljang gu dang / dmar po dang ser po'i thams pas mig
320b4(rgyud 'grel): mangs rigs su gnas pas rlung yang mi thar bar gyur par bsams te/ de ni rdo rje'i gur ro// sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbus kyi lte bar hU~M de zhu ba las sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad par bsam/ de'i lte bar shar dang byang dang nub dang /
320b5(rgyud 'grel): lhor shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi dus su nyams su myong ba bde ba tsam dang bcas pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le dkar ba/ 'tshir ba/ gsal ba/ gzi mdangs dang ldan pa mthing ka dang / sngon po dang / ljang gu dang / dmar po
320b6(rgyud 'grel): dang ser po rnams chu las nya 'phar ba bzhin du sran mo sbom po'i tshad tsam pa lnga bsams la/ de zhu ba las he ru ka zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa g.yas rdo rje g.yon dril bu mtshan khung na kha T+wAM ga bsnams// zhabs g.yas
321a1(rgyud 'grel): brkyang bas bzhugs pa/ g.yon bskum pa/ dbu skra ser po gyen du brdzes pa/ zla ba phyed pas dbul brgyan pa/ spyan gsum pa/ smin ma kham pa/ phyag rgya drug dang ldan par bdag nyid gyur par bsam mo//
321a2(rgyud 'grel): thig le sngon po dang / ljang gu dang / dmar po dang ser po zhu ba las rim pa bzhin badz+ra DA ki nI dang / lA ma dang / kha~MN+Da ro ha/ rU pi Ni rnams sngon po dang / ljang gu dang / dmar po dang / ser po rnams lha mo bzhir gyur par bsam/ lha
321a3(rgyud 'grel): mo rnams kyang zhal gcig pa/ spyan gsum pa/ dbu skra ser po gyen du brdzes pa/ zla ba phyed pas dbu brgyan pa/ gcer bu g.yon brkyang bas bzhugs pa/ phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa/ g.yas na gri gug/ g.yon na thod pa bsnams
321a4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ lha lnga kar yang ro'i gdan lo bzhugs pa/ mtshams kyi 'dab ma bzhi la rin po che'i bum pa bzhi'o// steng du rang bzhin gyi bdud rtsi rnam lngas bkang ba'i kA pA la bzhi bzhag pa skad cig gis bsgom ste/ de ni gnas dang
321a5(rgyud 'grel): lus dang / longs spyod phun sum tshogs pas bsdus pas bskyed pa'i rim pa'o// rdzogs pa'i rim pa gang bsgom yang rung / thog mar bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom par bya ste/ de'i rjes la rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa
321a6(rgyud 'grel): la gsum ste/ hUM la dmigs pa dang / thig le la dmigaso pa dang / nA da s+pha ris phra mo sor gcig la dmigs pa'o// de la hUM la dmigs pa bsgom pa ni/ snying khong stong gi nang du/ 'og tu nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro// de
321b1(rgyud 'grel): steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam mo// nyi ma dang zla ba'i bar du thig le'i rgyal po yi ge hUM rgun 'bru'i sa bon gyi tshad tsam mam/ sran ma 'am/ yungs dkar sbom po'i tshad tsam shes rab kyi dbang gi dus su nyams su myong ba'i
321b2(rgyud 'grel): bde ba de nyid dran par bya zhing / 'og gi rlung yang bskum pa dang / rgyu zhabs kyi nang na yar drangs pa dang / lce yang rkan la sbyar ba'i sbyor ba yang bya ste/ thig le'i rgyal po yi ge hUM snga ma'i tshad tsam du byas la/ dkar la 'tsher
321b3(rgyud 'grel): ba bde ba dang bcas pa gzi mdangs dang ldan pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis bu gur chun 'bru'i sa bon gyi tshad tsam mam/ yongs kar-i sbom po'i tshad tsam du dmigs par bya'o// de nas hUM las 'od zer 'phros pas ma dag pa'i
321b4(rgyud 'grel): snod dang bcud la reg pa tsam gyis lan tshwa la chus phog pa bzhin du 'od kyi gong bur bzhu ste dag po'i snod bcud la bstim// ngag bi'i snod bcud kyang bdag la bsdu// bdag nyid kyang zhu ste/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la
321b5(rgyud 'grel): bstim/ zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yang zhu ste/ hUM la bstim/ hU~M yig kyang zhabs kyu la bstim/ zhabs kyu ha la bstim/ ha zla tshes la bsgom/ zla tshes thig l-i la/ thig le nA da skA ris tsam phra mo la thim pa'o// nA da ska ras
