321b6(rgyud 'grel): phra mo yang nam mkha' la thim mo// thim pa de nyid la sems bstad nas/ de nas chu la nya 'phar ba bzhin du 'am/ nam mkha' la glog 'byung ba ltar/ skad cig tsam gyis snga ma ltar dran te/ snang la rang bzhin med pa'i lha'i
322a1(rgyud 'grel): skur bsams te/ mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid dang / dzi na dzaM ka dang / badz+rA d+h+r-i ka dang / rat+na dzA ka dang / pradz+nyA d+h+r-i ka dang / badz+ra satwa dang / sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjer
322a2(rgyud 'grel): mos pa bya ste/ mnyam par ma bzhag po'i spyod pas gnas par bya'o// thog le la gnas pa ni bskyed pa'i rim po'i gnas dang / lus dang / longs spyod phun sum tshogs pas bsdus pa bsgom pa snga ma dang 'dra'o// nyi ma dang zla
322a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi bar du byang chub kyi sems kyi bde ba'i thig le dkar la 'chor ba gzi mdangs dang ldan pa/ shes rab ye shes kyis dus su myong ba'i bde ba de nyid dran par bya ste/ 'og gi rlung bskum mo// 'og gi rlung
322a4(rgyud 'grel): bskum pa dang / rgyu zhabs kyi sha yar drangs pa dang / lce yang rkan la sbyar ba'i sbyor ba byas nas/ zla ba'i bu gu rgun 'bru'i sa bon tsam mam/ sran mo tsam mam/ yungs kar tsam nas snga ma'i thig le mu 'bru'i thig le tsam mam//
322a5(rgyud 'grel): sran ma 'am yung sa kar tsam la rnams par shes pa'i tshogs lnga cha ro bkug lo/ kun gzhi rnam par shes pa los bsdus te bstang par bya'o// thig le la sems zin cing gzhan du mi 'phro ba'i don dus su rlung 'gags shing
322a6(rgyud 'grel): bde ba'i ye shes kyang chos nyid kho nas skye bar 'gyur ro// nA da s+pha ris phra ma la dmigs pa ni gnas dang longs spyod dang lus phun sum tshogs pas bsdus pa'i bskyed pa'i rig pa snga ma dang 'dra'o// rdzogs po'i rim pa ni snying
322b1(rgyud 'grel): khong stong 'od gsal ba'i gnas nA da skA ris phra mo sor gcig pa la sbom phra skra'i nyag ma tsam la byang chub kyi sems dkar la 'tsher ba gzi mdangs dang ldan pa bde ba dang bcas pa 'og gi rlung bskum pa dang / rgyu zhabs kyi sha yar
322b2(rgyud 'grel): drangs pa dang / lce rkan la sbyar bas sbyor zhing shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi dus su myong ba'i bde ba de nyid dran par byas la nA da sgra ros phra mo la dmigs par bya'o// nA da ska ris phra mo la rtsa gnyis zug ste/ gnas pa las sna bug
322b3(rgyud 'grel): gang nas dbugs 'byung ba brtags te/ gang nas dbugs rgyu ba zhig nas nA da sgo ras la rlung dang sems 'dres pa'i bde ba dang bcas pa dkar la 'tsher ba/ gzi mdangs dang ldan pa'i phyir byung ba la dmigs so// de nyid nang du 'jug
322b4(rgyud 'grel): pa la dmigs te/ 'byung ba dang 'jug pa yun bsdu zhing gnas pa la yun ring du sems bstad cing gnas par bya'o// de'i rjes la nA da skA ris phra mo dang bcas pa'i chos thams cad cir yang ma grub par bsgom par bya'o// de nas skad
322b5(rgyud 'grel): cig tsam gyi sgyu ma lta bu'o skur bsams la/ dbang po drug dang lus ngag yid gsum sangs rgyas drug dang sku gsung thugasu bsam zhing shes par bya ste/ mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i spyod pas gnas pa bya'o// de tsam gyis ni bdag
322b6(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim po'i man ngag bstan zin to// / sna tshogs rdo rje dri med kyi rim pa la gnyis te/ 'jig rten po'i dngos grub sgrub pa'i rim pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub bsgom pa'i
323a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa'o// dang po 'jig rten pa'i dngos grung sgrub pa'i dam pa la gnyis te/ bskyeng po'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o// bsgreng ba'i rim pa bsgos pa la gnyis te/ na rdo rje'i gur dang pad+ma bsgom pa dang /
323a2(rgyud 'grel): bsten pa la bsgom pa'o// rten bsgom pa snga ma dang mthun no// brten pa lha bsgom pa ni pad+ma'i dbus su hUM bsam mo// hUM zhu ba las rdo rje bsam mo// rdo rje zhu ba las he ru ka zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa dbu sgra ser po gyen du brdzes pa/
323a3(rgyud 'grel): smin ma kham pa/ thod pa lnga yis dbu brgyan pa/ zla ba phyed pas dbu la mdzes pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa/ sku mdog sngon po dang dmar po gang yang rung ba'o// dbu la dang po'i sangs rgyas kyis brgyan pa/ g.yas
323a4(rgyud 'grel): brkyang ba/ g.yon bskum la phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa/ mi mgro rnon po'i rdo shal can nyi ma phyed pa'i 'od dang ldan pa'i rdo rje dang phyug gi skur bsgom par bya'o// de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o// rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa ni/ mag stong pa nyid du
323a5(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pa dang / mig gi nang du byang chub kyi sems kyi bde ba'i thig le sran ma tsam dkar la 'chor ba gzi mdangs dang ldan pa bde ba dang bcas pa la sems bstad par bya'o// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang lus rnams stong pa
323a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid du bsgom la/ rna ba la sogs pa rnams su byang chub kyi sems kyi bde ba'i thig le dkar la 'tshar la ba snum la 'dril ba gzi mngangs dang ldan pa bde ba dang bcas pa re re nas yul rnams la sems bstad par bya'o// snying gar byang chub
323b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi sems kyi bde ba'i thig le sran ma tsam dkar la 'chor ba gzi mdangs dang ldan pa bde ba dang bcas pa sran ma sbom po'i tshad tsam la sems bstad par bya'o// mgo bo bde ba chen po'i 'khor khror byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le gong ma dang
323b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dra ba la sems bstad par bya'o// mgrin pa longs spyod kyi 'khor lor byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le snga ma dang 'dra ba la sems bstad par bya'o// lto ba sprul pa'i 'khor lor byang chub kyi thig le snga ma dang 'dra ba la sems bstud par
323b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// 'jig rten las 'das po'i dngos grub sgrub pa'i rim pa la gnyis te/ bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o// bskyed pa'i rim pa la snga ma dang 'dra'o// rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa'i mdzod spar bde ba'i thig le dkar
323b4(rgyud 'grel): pau 'tsher ba dang bde ba dang ldan pa sran ma sbom po 'i tshad tsam la sems bstad par bya'o// de la sems brtan pa thob pa dang / dam rau ting pa'i rtags 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de byung ba dang dpral ba'i nang du bde ba'i thig le dkar la 'tsher ba
323b5(rgyud 'grel): gzi mdangs dang ldan pa sran ma sbom po'i tshad tsam la bsdad par bya'o// de la sems brtan pa thog pa'i mtshan ma ni dkar ting pa 'byung ngo // de'i rjes la mchogs ma'i gnas su bde ba'i thig le gnag la 'chor ba gzi
323b6(rgyud 'grel): mdangs dang ldan pa bde ba dang bcas pa sran ma sbom po'i tshad tsam pa la sems bstad par bya'o// de la sems brten pa thob pa'i mtshan ma ni nag ting ba 'byung ngo // de'i rjes la rtog pa dang bral ba'i bde ba chen po rang rig gnyis su
324a1(rgyud 'grel): med biSh+Ta ye shes rang gis skyes pa ni yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma ste/ de la sras sangs rgyas 'khrungs par de ni sna tshogs rdo rje dri med kyi rim pa ste gnyis pa'o//
324a2(rgyud 'grel): nor bu dgang ba'i rim pa la bzhi ste/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya la brten pa dang / wa kyi phyag rgya la brten pa dang / tshwa kyai phyag rgyal ban pa dang phyag rgya chen po la brten pa'o// de la dam tshig gi phyag rgya la brten pa ni legs par brlabs pa'i mi'i yo shi d+ha'i
324a3(rgyud 'grel): rigs dang / spyod pas nye ba dang / ma sring ltar snying brtse bas dga' bas gnas pa dang / sngags dang phyag rgya 'dzin po'i nus pa dang ldan pa dang / lo bcu gnyis nas nyi shu'i bar smin pI lam gyis smin par byas pas dbang bskur dang
324a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa nyer bsdogs byas te/ gnas yid du 'ong bar me tog dmar pos gcal du bkram pa'i bar du lus kyi dring ba mi tshor ba tsam du gos mdzes pa gon zhing stan 'jam pa la gnas te// bza' ba'i dam tshig zhag bdun gyi bar du'o/
324a5(rgyud 'grel): me dang / ka ra gnyis sbyar ba'i btung ba dang / lug gzhon nu ma'i shwa sar pa mi drag pa tsam du gtang bar byas te/ chags pa'i mig gi phan tshun du blta zhing gnas par bya'o// de nas mnyam par sbyor ba'i dus su bdag dang
324a6(rgyud 'grel): shes rab he ru kA dang bdog med mar nga rgyal bskyed la/ shes rab kyi mgo bo dang / lkog ma dang / snying kau dang / lte ba dang / gsang ba dang / brla rnams su yi be dgod do// oM AHhUM ho hik+Sha swA hA/ zhes pa rnams bkod
324b1(rgyud 'grel): la rdo rje dang pad+ma byin gyis brlabs te/ rol rtse dam chu bzhib pa dang / tsum+ba bya ba dang / rtsa rme ba dang / gnas dgur sen mo gdab pa la sogs pa de ltar byas la// de'i rjes su phan tshun 'khyud cing chags pa'i nga rgyal bya'o// de nas gol
324b2(rgyud 'grel): che ba'i lag pas a ba d+hU tAM brung bcing gsal bar bya'o// a ba d+hU tA dang gol che ba'i lag pa phrad pa'i dus su bzhin 'gyur ba dang / shes skad 'byin pa dang / snying 'dar ba la sogs pa'i rtags blo la bzhag ste/ rdo rje dang pad+ma
324b3(rgyud 'grel): mnyam par sbyor ba'i dus su sngar gyi rtags lta bur 'byung ba'i dus su rdo rje de nyid sbyar te/ gcer bu kha sbyar gyi sbyor ba 'khor lo lta bu bsrub cing bsrub par bya'athabs dang shes rab kyi thur sel gyi rlung dang / srog dang rtsol ba'i rlung
324b4(rgyud 'grel): sdom zhing 'khrul 'khor gyi sbyor ba yang bya'o// rgyu zhabs nas yar sbyar/ lce yang rkan la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang bya'o// tang ku li'i sbyor ba yang bya'o// de ni 'khrul 'khor gyi sbyor ba'o// sman gyi sbyor ba ni tsa tra ka dang / arga dkar
324b5(rgyud 'grel): bo'i rtse ba dang / rdo rje'i 'o mas 'jub mnyam du bsres pa'i ri lu sran ma'i tshad tsam dang ming la/ sems 'byung 'dod pa'i dus su smon gyi ri lu de gsum las mnyam pa gcig kyang med par bya'o// rdo rje 'o ma dang ba'i 'o ma gnyis sbyar bas
324b6(rgyud 'grel): rkang mthil gnyis kyang bsku bar bya'o// bi nu kan ta'i rtsa ba dang pad+ma dkar po nang na dkar po nar nar po gnyis bskur bar bya ste/ rked pa bcing bar bya'o// de ni d+ha ra a sho ka zhes bya ba sems 'dzin pa'i sman no// mnyam par sbyor po gzung
325a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dus su 'gron drug 'gron bu lkugs pa'i nang du dang lta chus bkadra pa'i se kA'i phyogs sgra tshil gyis bkag ste/ sne rtswar bzhag la sems 'byung 'dod pa'i dus su lkugs pa'i lce car sbyar bar bya'o// de ni na
325a2(rgyud 'grel): bu rin po che lkugs pas sems gzung ba'i thabs so// shes rab kyi 'phongs su glong gzhug ste/ rang gi rdo rje'i tshong bas sor gcig pas ring ba'i phying ba'i dra ba byas la sna tshal gyis gtum par bya'o// shes rab kyi rkeng pa dor gyis ba
325a3(rgyud 'grel): zhing gsang ba'i pad+ma'i nang rdo rje'i gzugs sor gcig tsam bcug la rked pa yar gyi cung zhig bsdam mo// sor gnyis tsam zhugs pa dang / cung zad kyang bsdam mo// de bzhin du rdo rje cung zhig bcug cing rkang pa bsdam par bya'o// sor gcig
325a4(rgyud 'grel): lus lus kyi bar du btsug cing de yang shin tu bsdam mo// sor gcig po shes rab nyid kyis gyen du btsugs pas pad+ma phyir log ste/ a ba d+hU tI sor gcig pas phyir byung bas rdo rje'i bug par bcug cing 'khor lo lta bu'i sbyor thabs kyis
325a5(rgyud 'grel): gtsub cing gtsub par bya'o// man ngag de rnams kyis stobs kyis dpe'i lhan cig skyes pa'i me tog lta bu'i bde ba chen po'i rang rig gnyis su med pa'i ye shes nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// de'i rjes la 'khor lo 'am/ thig le
325a6(rgyud 'grel): 'am kha sbyor ram ma ning gi bzlas pa 'am/ man ngag de bzhi las gang yang rung ba cog la sems bstod tsang sngar gyi bde ba dran zhing don gyi lhan cig skyes pa'i me tog gi dril bu'i bde ba chen po'i rang gi gnyis su med pa'i ye shes
325b1(rgyud 'grel): la bslab par bya'o// mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i skabs su yang bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa'i skabs su rang gi sems kyi mtshan nyid bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du ci mthong ba thams cad la mos par bya ste/ ngam mthong ba 'gro ma mthong //
325b2(rgyud 'grel): sa gsum po yang nga las skyes/ badre ba ser po bde ba dkar/ bde ba dmar mo bde ba ljang / de bzhin kun tu ru skyes bde/ zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o// yon tan dang ldan pa'i shes rab dgug par 'dod na 'bras bu
325b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum dang / bil ba dang / bal po'i si'u dang / star ka dang / po so 'cha' dang / da tri ga dang / ba li ka dang / shu klo rnams gnyis te/ sman sna bcu gcig po che monyam par bsres pa'i lde gus bskus pa'i me tog bsnol du gzhug go//
325b4(rgyud 'grel): khyi'o rus pa dang / mi rus pa dang / bya rgod kyi rtug pa gsum sbyar te bdag nyid kyi dpral bar bsku'o// gzhan gyi sems mi bsgyur ba'i thabs ni pha wang tshes bzhi'i rgongs ka btags la de'i ril ma btags pas bdag nyid kyi gsang
325b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rdo rje'i rtse mo la bskus nas snyoms 'jug byas na gzhan gyis sems bsgyur bar mi 'gyur ro// 'khor ba mi spel bi'i man ngag ni lag pa'i mthil dag par bkrus pa'i steng du dngul chu srin lag ngag pa la bskus la 'bru
325b6(rgyud 'grel): mar mi che ba bsdus te blangs la lag pa chang gi nang du bcug ste/ bskams tsam ni dpral ba la bskus te/ yo shi ti ldan du bzhag go// yang na mtshal smag po zhe gnyis zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma snga dro'i dus su chang zhim po dang sngur
326a1(rgyud 'grel): la blud do// lcags kyi lcug la sU pi ka'i rtsa bas bkris pa thogs su gzhug go// yang s+phu pi ka'i rtsabs rked pa dkri bar bya'o// lcags kyi khu bas srod kyi dus su pad+ma bkru bar bya'o// bu ram dang
326a2(rgyud 'grel): til mar dang / lan tshwa dang rgya shug gi 'bras bu dang / 'bras dang / nas rnams 'o ma dang bskol te/ til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa'i nang du srin lag bcug ste/ pad+ma'i nang du bcug la yun ring du bkrugs par bya'o// ro rtsa'i
326a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni nga ru ra'i rtsa ba dang / ga pur dang / sbyar ba rdo rje la bsku bar bya'o// sha kha ra dang ba'i mar srung phyed sbyar ba zas zos pa'i 'og tu bza'o// mchil pa'i sha zhag gcig lon pa mtshams kyis dus su zos la 'o ma bskol
326a4(rgyud 'grel): 'a tshang du btung bar bya'o// til mar dang mon sran gre'u'i phye ma'i ma dang bsres pa bza' bar bya'o// go tsho dang ba'i 'o ma dang shing mngar rnams mar dang sbyar ba btung bar bya'o// ba 'am ra'i 'o ma'i nang du dbang po lag pa'i phye ma
326a5(rgyud 'grel): rang ka ri'i phyi ma zhib tu btags pa btab ste btung bar bya'o// dam tshig mi nyams pa'i man ngago ni dge slong gi so sor thar pa'i sdom pa'i tshul khrims byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i dus su byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrim su
326a6(rgyud 'grel): gyur te gnaso// spyir gsang sngags kyi dam tshig nyams na sdom pa gsum 'jig par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa dang / gsang sngags kyi dam tshig gi lugs kyi kha na mo tho ba gnyis te/ rang bzhin gyi kha na
326b1(rgyud 'grel): ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i kha na ma thob gnyis so// de la yang rang bzhin gyi kha na ma tho ba ni srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / de bzhi las dang po gnyis dang /
326b2(rgyud 'grel): ma ni rig pa 'dzin pa'i sde snod la nyams su blang bar bya ste/ 'di ru ma bshad do// 'dod pas log par g.yem pa ni rang bzhin gyi kha na ma tho bar rtogs pas nyam su blang bar 'di ru ma bshad do// mi tshangs pa spyod pa ni bcas
326b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i kha na ma tho ba yin pas de ni de bzhin nyid kyi bdag nyid can gyis shes par spyod cig/ don chen po yod pas gdams ngag yod pa na mi 'gal bar rtsa ba'i rgyud rnams su bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad do// 'dod pas log par
326b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yem pa ni rang bzhin gyi kha na ma tho ba yin pa'i phyir dang / gzhan gyi lus bsrungs pa yod pa'i phyir nyams su blang bar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ru maM bshad// mi tshangs par spyod pa ni nyams su blang bar gsungs te/ de
326b5(rgyud 'grel): yang lo bcu gnyis pa 'am bcu drug pa 'am/ lo nyi shu tshun chad kyi gzhon nu ma zhes gsungs pos ni ma 'gal lo// de yang gzhan gyi dbang ma byas pa dang mnyam par sbyor ba snang ngo // 'dir yang don chen po yod pas dus
326b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa bzhir nyams su blang bar bya'o// dus bzhi ni byang chub kyi sems kyi bde ba mchod pa'i dus dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha sgrub pa'i dus dang / slob ma la gsang dbang bskor ba'i dus dang / shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur
327a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dus so// mtshad bas n-i lha mnyes pas dngos grub rnam pa gnyis thab pa'i don chen po yod phyi'i phyir dang / dkyil 'khor bsgrub pas ni sku gsung thugs dang / mas kyus 'gro ba'i ngamarnan
327a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pas chos kyi thob pa'i 'gro ba'i don chen po yod pa'i phyir dang / gsang ba'i dbang bskur bas ni slob ma theg pa chen po'i snod du rung ba'i phyir mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i don chen po yod pa'i phyir ro// shes rab
327a3(rgyud 'grel): ye shes kyi dbang bskur bas ni/ rang gi sems kyi mtshan nyid bde ba chen po rang rig pa'i ye shes gnyis su med pa'i ye shes spros pa thams cad kyi mtha' dang bral bar nyam su myong ba'i phyir don chen po yod pas 'dor dam tshig
327a4(rgyud 'grel): las mi 'gal bar bstan to// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mdzad pa'i 'grel par shes par bya'o// mkhas pa nga rgyal dang ldan pas byas pa la ni ma yin no// de ni spros pa dang bcos pa'i spyod pa dang / spros pa med pa'i
327a5(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa'o// shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa la ni dngos po la reg pa med pas nyes par mi bzhag go/ m-i dad pa sprang po'i mAn ngag ni// ga pur gla rtswa gur gum/ tsan dan/ ma se shu kra bsres pa'i lde gus dpral bar bsku bar
327a6(rgyud 'grel): byo'o// de ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya la rten po'i nor bu dgang ba'i rim pa'o// las kyi phyag rgya la brten pa'i nor bu dgang ba'i rim pa ni gnas kyi dam tshig dang / bza' ba'i dam tshig dang / spyod lam gyi man ngag ni snga ma dang 'dra'o//
327b1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pa gan rgyal du gnas te/ rkang pa'i mthe bong gnyis na mkha' la bsgrengs te/ gnas pas sor mo lhag ma thur du bskums la bzhag go// tang ku la'i sbyor ba yang bya ste/ 'og gi rlung bskum pa dang / rgya zhabs kyi sha yar
327b2(rgyud 'grel): la drang ba dang / lce rkan la sbyar ba'i sbyor ba yang byas te/ lag pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i sbyor ba'i bye brag gis brung pa'i sbyor ba byas la bde ba rtog pa med pa'i ye shes nyamasu myong bar bya'o// chos kyi phyag rgya la brten pa'i
327b3(rgyud 'grel): nor bu dgang ba'i rim pa ni sems kyi snang ba'i lha mo bsams te/ snga mo'i man ngag gis shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi dus kyi bde ba dran par byas la/ 'khor lo 'am/ thig le 'am/ kha sbyor ram ma ning gi bzlas pa'i man
327b4(rgyud 'grel): ngag la sems gtad par bya'o// phyag rgya chen po lnga brten pa'i nor bu dgrang ba'i rim pa ni sngar skyes pa'i bde ba de nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du bsgom pa'o// de ni nor bu dgang ba'i rim pa'o// dzA lan+d+ha ra'i rim pa la
327b5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis te/ bskyed pa'i rim pa dang / rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o// bskyed pa'i rim pa ni sngur dang 'dra'o// rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa ni rang gi lte ba'i 'ogu chu so'i gong du chos 'byung gi phyag rgya/ gru gu su myaM dkar la dmar
327b6(rgyud 'grel): chags pa bsams la/ de'i nang du 'khor lo dkar la dmar chags pa/ rtsibs bzhi dbus kyi lte ba la bsams te/ dbus su bde ba'i thig la dkar po dang phyogs bzhor sngon po dang dmar po dang / sor po dang / ljang gu dang /
328a1(rgyud 'grel): sran ma'i tshad tsam bsams la/ de nyid sangs rgyas lngar mos pa bya ste/ 'og sgo dang steng ske'i rlung bkag pas thig le lnga'i 'od zer 'phros te sna'i bu gi'am ma ldan byung ba dbyur ga nas rgyu ba'i sna bug na sor
328a2(rgyud 'grel): bcu gnyis kyi bar du 'byung ste/ slar nang du bcug ste/ thig le lnga la thim/ sgom pa'i dus phyis 'byung ba dang / nang du 'jug pa'i dus na yang je thung je thung la grangs kyang je nyung je nyung ngu bya zhing / nang na gnas pa la yun yang je ring je ring du
328a3(rgyud 'grel): sems brtan par bya'o// mig gis mthong ba bas thog le lnga gsal bar mthong ba de srid du bsgoms la de nas lce dang dpung pa dang mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang lce la snga ma'i thig le de nyid bsams na 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub ji ltar 'dod
328a4(rgyud 'grel): ba 'grub par 'gyur ro// bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rim pa la gnyis te/ bskyed pa'i rim pa dang / rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o// bskyed pa'i rim pa ni snga ma dang 'dra'o// rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni sems yul rnams la bzlog ste/ chos thams
328a5(rgyud 'grel): cad sems tsam du bsgoms te/ sems de nyid bde ba rtogs pa med par mos par bya ste/ shes pa de nyid kyang stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o// mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i spyod pa ni snga ma dang 'dra'o// slob dpon chen po rdo rje dril bu pas
328a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i rim pa lnga pa'i 'grel pa paN+Di ta su ma tI kIrti dang / lo tsa ba mar ba ban+de chos kyi dbang phyug gis bsgyur ba'o// rdzogs so// / @#// rgya gar skad du/ sa ha dza saM ba ra swa
328b1(rgyud 'grel): d+han/ bod skad du/ bde mchog lhan cig skyes pa'i sgrub thabs/ 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag 'tshal lo// shes bya rnal 'byor chog gsum// byin gyis rlob dang rab tu rtog/ bsam bral gzugs brnyan yongs su rdzogs// sangs rgyas kyis
328b2(rgyud 'grel): gsungs rnal 'byor du// sems can rdzus te skyes bya bzhi ni// gang zhig skud cig sbyor ba yis// sa bon med par rnam par bsgom// rang nyid rdo rje mkha' 'gror gyur// zla ba phyed pa spyi bor 'dzin// dpral bar thod pa'i phreng ba bsnams//
328b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya drug ldan mgo bo'i phreng // spyan gsumo sna tshogs rdo rje can// sna tshogs pod+ma nyi mar gnas// 'jigs byed dus mtshan bcas par dgod// g.yas brkyang ba yis zhibs kyis gcibs// rdo rje dril bu ral bar ldan// gnag
328b4(rgyud 'grel): tsong mo bskyod spyi bo'i gtsug/ stag gi sngags pas yang dag bcings// dpa' bo rdo rje phag mo ni// spyan gsum domar zhing mgo phreng ldan// rdo rje thod pa khrag gis bkang // rkeng rgyun dum bus mtshan pa 'dzin// phyogs kyi gol phyag
328b5(rgyud 'grel): rgya lnga// do'u sgo grol zhing sangs rgyas gtsug/ 'di ltar skad cig gis rdzogs pa'i// bdag nyid lus ni bsgom par bya// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin gzugs// sangs rgyas 'od zer rnar spro// spyod yul gcig gis sems kyis
328b6(rgyud 'grel): su de/ 'di nyid kho na yun rings sam// go 'phang 'di la sems can dgod// chos dbyings rgyal mtshan yang dag sbyor// gnyis gnyis sbyor ba bde las byung // dga' ba zag pa'i phun tshogs kyis// rang rig dga' bas yongasu
329a1(rgyud 'grel): khengs// zag pas skyed par byed pa gang // des ni rgya chen yid la byed// 'dus byas spros pa'i rgyun 'di ni// 'di ltar rtag tu sgom pa pos// 'od gsal
329a2(rgyud 'grel): rjes su dran par bya// sna tshogs pad+ma nyi ma dang // 'jigs byung dang nau dus mtshan mo// sdug ma bdag mo mkha' nor bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga yi 'og/ sku dang la yan
329a3(rgyud 'grel): lag mchog dang ni/ zla ba thig lA~M nA rnams/ 'di rnams rnam gyis ma snang gzhuji ltar ma long dbus kyi rlung // thams cang thim par gyur pa ltar// yang dag pa
329a4(rgyud 'grel): ru yang nas yang // de bzhin rnal 'byor rab tu gzhug/ grub thob rdo rje dril bu pas mdzad pa'o// bde mchog ldan skyes kyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
329a5(rgyud 'grel): paN+Di ta rdo rje gangan pa ni sa ka laM ka'i zhal snga nas/ dmyal lo tsa ba dpal chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//
329a6(rgyud 'grel): sarba ma
330a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal 'khor lo bde mchog sgrub pa'i nor bu bshugs//
330b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI b+ha ga bAn tsakra suM ba ra sA d+ha nA rat+na tsan+d+ra mA Ni nA ma/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das dpal 'khor lo bde mchog sgrub pa'i thabs rin po che yid bzhin gyi
330b2(rgyud 'grel): nor bu zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// shrI chu rgya mtsho tha dad me bzhin he 'dus ma byas na mkha' bzhin// ru lha'i rnga ltar gtso 'khor longs spyod ka/ ni yid nor ltar dgod 'dod
330b3(rgyud 'grel): skong dang rnam par thar zhing dus gsum bdud bzhi rten 'brel bcu gnyis bden gnyis sogs// de bzhin ye shes lnga yaM bdag nyid b+ha gar zhugs la phyag 'tshalo// blo nor ldan pas gsol btab pas// 'khor lo bde/
330b4(rgyud 'grel): mchog sgrub pa'i thabs// ji skad gsungs pa'i don bzhin du// bdag gis legs par bshad par bya// ri bong tshang tshing sman ljongs dang // chu bo chen po'i ngogs dag dang // gdod nas grub pa'i dud khrod du// der ni dkyil
330b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor brtsam par bya// rnal 'byor pa nyid bsod nams mchog/ dag byed sdig pa 'jig byed pa// gsang sngags zlos pa'i bzlas brjod dang // bsam gtan gyis kyang 'grub par 'gyur// mchod bzhi dpa' bo chen po ni//
330b6(rgyud 'grel): yid la 'dod pa byed pa ste// rgyud 'di ru ni dbang bskur na// thams cad kyis ni sgrub por gsungs// bltas dang rgod dang lag 'dzin dang // 'khyud dang gnyis sprod la sogs la// dbang bskur bar ni gyur pa yin// rgyud rnams kun
331a1(rgyud 'grel): gyi dam pa yin// nang par sngar langs sems bdag nyid// lus gnas brjod cing lus ngag bya// rang gi sa bor 'od zer gyis// bla ma dang ni dkyil 'khor lha// sangs rgyas byang chub sems sogs kun// nam
331a2(rgyud 'grel): mkha' kun gang mdun nas blta// lus sna tshogs kyis phyag 'tshal zhing // de dag 'gro ba'i don du dbul// hUM gis 'od zer las byung ba'i// gzugs ma sgra ma dri ro ma// reg ma chos ma zhi ba ma// dkar sngo ser dmar ljang dkar mo//
331a3(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig phyag bzhi g.yon thod ts+tsha// g.yas rnams mo long pi wang dang // dri mchog ro mchog na bza' dang // chos 'byung dang ni Da ma ru// oM AHbadz+ra A daR+Ye hUM/ oM AHbadz+ra bi Ne hUM/ oM AHbadz+ra g+haN+De hUM/ oM AHbadz+ra rAM se hUM/
331a4(rgyud 'grel): oM AHbadz+ri s+phar+ye hUM/ oM AHbadz+ra d+harme hUM/ 'og nas 'chang ba'i lha mo yos// bdud rtsi lnga yis lha yid gang // snyoms 'jug lhan cig skyes dga' yan// lha mo rnams dang mchod pas dgyes// sdig pa bshags bsdams rdzas
331a5(rgyud 'grel): yi rang // dge ba yongs bsngo skyabs 'gro bya// chos 'khor bskor bskul bzhugs gsol gdab// byang chub smon 'jug sems bskyed gshegs// khyad 'phags bde sbyor byams pa ste// sdug bsngal rgyu bral snying rje che// bde ba mi
331a6(rgyud 'grel): 'bral 'dod dga' ba// nyon mongs nye bral btang snyoms so// chos sku ngo bo nyid med pa// kun rtog sgyu ma lta bur shes// e swa b+ha ba shud+haHsarba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+hoHhaM/ sa bon 'od kyis brtan g.yo sbyangs// thig le sngags kyis
331b1(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pa med// oM shu n+ya d+hu dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ chos kun rab tu gnas med pa// 'od gsal na mkha' dri ma meng // yi ge e las chos 'byung ste// hUM gyur pad chen phyag gnyis pa// shar sogs lugs dang ma
331b2(rgyud 'grel): mthun dang // lugs mthun pa yon mdzub saM gol gtog/ oM suM b+hU ni su d+ha hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM A na ya ho b+ha ga byAn badz+ra hUM hUM phaT/ khwa gdongs ma sogs
331b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis ma// dmar mo g.yon brkyang nyi ma'i gdan// rang 'dra stong phur g.yon pa na// g.yas pa thob thogs pa'o// rdo rje ra ba sa gzhi gur// bla re mnga' yi dra ba bya// oM badz+ra prA ko ra hUM paM hUM/ oM mang ni badz+ra b+ha ba badz+ra
331b4(rgyud 'grel): ban+d+ha hUM/ oM badz+ra pany+tsa ra hUM baM hUM/ oM badz+ra bi dA na hUM khaM hUM/ oM badz+ra sa ra dz+wA la traM saM traM hUM gyur dong po brgyad nang du// bgegs rnams bcug la phur bu gzugs// oM g+haHg+haHg+ha ta ya g+hA ta ya sar+b+ba duSh+To na hUM hUM phaT/ kI la ya kI la
331b5(rgyud 'grel): ya sar+b+ba pA paM hUM hUM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badz+ra kI la ya badz+ra d+ha ra Adz+nyA pa ya ti k+Sha ya bAk+tsit+ta badz+ra kI la ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra mung+ga ra badz+ra kI la ya A ko Ta hUM phaT/ tho bas brdungs te phur pas btab// bgegs rna mas rdzogs pa'i byang chub
331b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ mo 'ong gyur lus 'phros la// rdo rje pad+ma 'khor lo me// aM badz+ra pA kA ra hUM/ oM bidz+ra thA kA ra nA/ oM tsa~Mb prA kA ra hU~M/ oM badz+ri dz+wa la a ra larbA d+hA d+h+r-i nA/ ba lang gnas dang lteng lding dang // lhag ma skam po rtsi ngan sa/
332a1(rgyud 'grel): dung chen pa yi rang bzhin bya// yang na du sbrul dag ga'o// ra rab kyi steng sna chags pad+ma'i lta bar hUM yongs su gyur pa las// rin po che sna tshogs pa las grub pa'i khang pa brtsegs ma gru ba'i pa
332a2(rgyud 'grel): la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan// ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes// pi wang sogs lha stegs bur 'khod// rgyan phreng sogs pa bdun gyis brgyan// ba dan bcu gnyis rlung bskyod sgra// gnas phyogs shing zhing
332a3(rgyud 'grel): rlung sbyin dang // mchod rnal dur khrod brgyad kyis bkod// khang nang sna tshogs pad 'dab brgyad// mtha' ma gri gug phreng 'khor gsum// pad steng 'dzegs byed dus mtshan brtsegs// snying gar nyon mo'i dbang phyug gdan/
332a4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs 'dab srogs song snying ri bong // mtshams steng zla bum thod bdud brtsi// ri steng sna tshogs pad+ma yi// lte bar A li kA li skyes// dkar ma bdag po rnam gnon cing // rdo rje dril bus sku la 'khyud// nyi shu rtsa bzhis phyed
332a5(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'i// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshogs can// shrI he ru ka rgyal po chen po'o'i// go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya// bcom ldan 'khor lo bde mchog ni// sku mdog sngon po zhal bzhi pa// drug gnyis phyag gis rnam par
332a6(rgyud 'grel): brgyan/ g.yas brkyang ba yis gom pas bzhugs// rtsa bo'i zhal ni mthing nag 'bar// g.yon pa pad+mo ra ga'i mdog/ g.yas pa gser du 'bar ba ste// steng zhal mar ke tar 'bar// dmar zlum spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs//
332b1(rgyud 'grel): ral pa thor tshugs dar dpangs can// thod pa lnga yis dbu la brgyan// zla phyed sna tshogs rdo rje mdzes// dus min 'chi ba las rgyal ba// yan lag kha T+wAM ga dang sbyar// thong pa'i mchod yom snong du ni// zhal du mtshan tshangs par sbyar//
332b2(rgyud 'grel): lang tsho gzhon pa 'gying bag can// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang zhing // dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus brgyan// sgeg pa la sogs nyams dgu ldan// stag gi spags pa'i sham thabs can// phyag rgya drug gos rab tu mdzes// mgo
332b3(rgyud 'grel): phreng ngo shal chen po can// steng nas gdugs dkar legs par 'dzin// de mdun gnas pa'i lha mo ni// rdo rje phag mo rab 'jigs ma// he ru ka dpal phyogs byas nas// spyan gsum drag mo'i gzugs can ma// ka pA la ni
332b4(rgyud 'grel): an+d+ras bkang // kha nas ru tI ra 'dzag cing // lha dang lha mon mir bcas pa// phyogs kun du ni sdigs mdzub byed// sku mdog dmar mo cher 'bar ma// zhal gcog ma la phyag gnyis ma// phyag g.yon thong khrag thabs la 'khyud/
332b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa rdo rje gri gug 'dzin// skra grol rnam mdzes rkyen lnga ldan// sgeg cing nA ma 'bur la mkhrang // g.yon brkya 'gom pa thabs dang sbyar// g.yas pa yab kyi brla steng 'khyung // thug kar shes rab rab 'gyur nyung // sna tshogs
332b6(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma nyid rdor hUM// sku gsung thugs rdo rjer byin brlab// gsum gsum de ni yi ge gsum// gang dag rab sgrub byeng pa'i sngags// de yi dbye ba rim bzhin bshad/ phan tshun brgyus pa'i gsang sngags ni// yul nyid kyi
333a1(rgyud 'grel): na pye byA'o// kha sbyar sbyar bar gyur pa dang // rdo rje lu gu rgyang bcings pabya'o// la sde brgyad pa'i sa bon+d+ha dang // de bzhin+ya grag+hA skyed bcu gnyis kyi// yi ge bar ma dor byas la// yan lag drug+ha he ru kar brjod//
333a2(rgyud 'grel): yi ge re res yang dag gnas// oM na mA swA hU~M baM ShoT/ hU~M hU~M phaT dang yang dag ldan// phaT hUM hraM hriM hU~M a~M rnams/ yi ge baM dang yoM dang ni// yi ge mo dang nyid dang // hUM dang phaT ces sbyar ba ni// rnal 'byor ma ni drug tu bshad// thabs
333a3(rgyud 'grel): dang shes rab go cha yin// mkha' 'gro ma ni ri ri yang // bye ba grangs med pa yis bskor// mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang // dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma// dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub mo// pad+ma'i phyogs kyi gnas la dgod// sngon mo
333a4(rgyud 'grel): ljang gu dmar mo ser// zhal gcig skra grol phyag bzhi ma// g.yon pa thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ g.yas pa gri gug Da ma ru// spyan gsum lang tsho gzhon nu rgyas// khro mo ral pa mche ba gtsigs// de nas gzhan yang lus dran pa nye bar gzhig pa
333a5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma// tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa lA ma// chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dum skyes ma/ sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gzug ma can ma// yang dag pi'i ting nge 'dzin dpal he ru ka rdo rje'o// snying ga ri hUM gi 'od zer gyis// ye
333a6(rgyud 'grel): shes dkyil 'khor dbang bskur lha// phyi gsang mchod pa'i lha mo rnams// spyan drang bgegs bskrad mchod yon dbul// oM ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes bya bas/ dgug dang bzhug dang bcing dang mnyes// de bzhin gshegs pa
333b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bdagu la dbang bskur du gsol zhes gsol ba gdab pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rin po che'i bum pa bdud rtsi lnga'i khu bas gang bas// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka sa ma ya shrI ye hUM zhes dbang bskur ba dang /
333b2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gtso la rdo rje sems dpa'i rgya// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la mi bskyod pa// mkha' 'gro lA ma dum skyes gzugs can ma// rtag pa don grub dpag meng rin chen 'byung // lha mo drug dang bzhi rnams kyis// phyi dang gsang bas yang
333b3(rgyud 'grel): ngag mchod// dkyil 'khor lha rnams legs bstod nas// rang rang gnas su yid kyis gshegs// de nas phyag rgya'i mchod chen dang // sngags kyi dgod par rab tu grags// myur du dngos grub byed par ni// phyag rgya'i mchod 'ad
333b4(rgyud 'grel): the tshom med// mtshan ma gnyis la sngags sbyor te// mkha' 'gro dpa' mo gnyis med pa// snying po sngags kyis de bzhin du// sngags pas mkha' 'gro ma la sbyor// oM shrI ma hU~M su kha badz+ra he he ru ru ki AHhU~M hUM phaT/ lhan cig/
333b5(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa'i dga' ba yis// dkyil 'khor bar bcas mnyes par bya// phyi rol shin tu dga' bya la'ang // pad rdor byin rlabs 'di dag byung // mdun du yi ge yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhur snang sngon po mtha' gnyis pa don ldan/
333b6(rgyud 'grel): de stengs yi ge raM las me dkyil 'khor// zur gsum nyid las dmar po 'bar bas mtshan// de steng a las pad+ma'i snod// dum bu gcig pa nang dmar po// hUM aM khI hUM a~M khAM aM traM/ dri chu dri chen sha chen po// byang chub sems rang
334a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byung me tog/ lAM mAM pAM tAM/ ba lang khyi dang glang po che// rta smyon kun las bon ldan// rlung gis me sbar bdud rtsi dmar por zhu/ hUM dkar kha T+wAM dkar la bsil// a li kA li thog mtha' ldan brjod pas// kha dog sna
334a2(rgyud 'grel): chags bdud rtsi'i steng du 'khod // yongs gyur aM A d+hi hU~M gsum po gong nas gong // 'od zer tshigs 'bros na mkha'i' mthas klas pa'i// bde gshegs thugs kyi ye shes bdud rtsi bkug/ yig gsum la thim gsum thim des byin brlag/
334a3(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das dang rnal 'byor ma rnams lci// ya~M ge b+h+rUM b+h+ring rdo rje rtse gsum pa// dkar po nas 'bru tsam bkod sbu gus dru ngas// bdud rtsi gsol pas lha tshogs tshim par lnga// rig sngags bzlas brjod bya ste rdo rje'i bzlas pa dang // bzlas
334a4(rgyud 'grel): brjod bye ba'i sngags kyis yi ge gang dag yin pa rnams// rab mi thugs sde'i sa bon las// 'ogro nas 'byung ba rang gi rdo rje'i rtse mo las phyug rgya'i b+ha gar brtan nas// shAd+ma lha mo'i zhal nas rang gi zhal du zhugs pa rang gis
334a5(rgyud 'grel): zhugs par blta zhing // zhal thams cad dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyis kyang zlos par bsgom par bya ste// khro ba'i bzlas pa yang bya'o// rim pa 'dis bzlas brjod kyi nyes pa dang bral bas sems mnyam par gzhag pa rdza srid
334a6(rgyud 'grel): bar ma gyur gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o// bzlas brjod kyi gsang sngags ni 'di dag yin te// oM badz+ra he ho ru ru kaM hu~M hUM phaT DA ki nI dzA la sa~M ba ra swA hA/ aM hrIHhrI hA hraM hUM phaT lha'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o// oM sar+b+ba bud+d+ha DA ki nI li badz+ra
334b1(rgyud 'grel): nI ya suM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ba rban+d+ha nA ye tsuhUM badz+ra sAt+ma/ l+h+wa ma'i snying po dang nye ba'i snang ba'o// a DA kan+d+ha ya hUM b+hU phaT/ a lA ma sh+tsa hUM phaT/ U khA ra ha huhUM phaT/ a ru baN+Da ma buHphyan/ dpa' mo rnams kyi sngags// oM nam b+ha ga pa te wA ra ny+dza
334b2(rgyud 'grel): ya huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA ka la bAg+ni san+ni b+hA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM dza Ta ma ku Tot+ka TA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM paMSh+Ta ka rA lo gra b+hI Sha Na mu khA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM sa ha sra b+hu dz+nye b+hA su rA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM pa ra shu pA sho d+yA ta shU la kha T+wAM ga d+hA ra Ni huM hUM phaT/ oM byAg+h+ra dzi
334b3(rgyud 'grel): nAM bar d+ha rA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA d+hum+b+han+ta ka ra wa pu ShA ya huM hUM phaT/ mchod pa'i sngagaso// ke ra ka ra ku ru ku ru ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ k+Sho b+ha ya k+Sho b+ha ya/ haM ha~M hraHhraHpheMHpheMHphaT phaT da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsaM/ b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha pa sa ru
334b4(rgyud 'grel): d+hid+han+tA mA lA ba liM bi n+yaM/ gr-ih+Na br-istI gr-ib+haM bA tA la ga tASh+Tu gaM sarba s+thA taHya tar+dz+dza ya/ U kAn+d+ha A kar+d+hA/ dz+r-id+h+r-i dz+nyAM/ D+haMSh+kaM/ hrIM hAM/ hUM hrI d+h+waM d+b+h+yAM/ saM wi ki li/ si maM si li/ hi laM hi li/ d+hi li d+h+waM laM/ huMtrUM phaT/ rtsa bo'i sngag so//
334b5(rgyud 'grel): gang tshe bzlas pas skyo bar gyur pa na// sa bon 'od kyis shes rab bdag po dang // 'khor lo pa dang khong pa brtsegs ma rnams// snang bar byas te 'ong gyur rim bzhin bsdu// hUM de yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid ni// zhal gcig
334b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis g.yas brkyang gom pas gnas// lang tsho gzhon pa 'gying bag mtshan dang ldan// phyag rgya drug ldan dril bu 'chang // de nas yongs su bsngo ba dang smon lam gdab pa dang / yi ge brgya pa brjod pa yang byas la lha'i
335a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal gyis gnas par bya'o// gu dang phyi dro'i thun mtshams su// bsam gtan khang par stan bder 'dug/ bdag nyid 'od zer du gyur pa// hUM du gyur te yengs gyur las// bcom ldan 'khor lo bde mchog
335a2(rgyud 'grel): gi/ dkyil 'khor 'khor lo lta lnga yi// khang rtsigs rin chen tshogs las grub// dur khrod brgyad bskor gsal dmigs nas// dbang bsgyur ba la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad bya'o// thun tha me la ni sngar bstan pa'i cho ga thams cad spyad
335a3(rgyud 'grel): la/ bzlas brjod kyi rjes la hU~M gi 'od zer gyis thams cad 'ong du gyur pa dkyil 'khor bdag po la bsdus la// dkyil 'khor gtso bo dang bcas pa phyag rgya dang bcas pa yang 'ong du gyur pa snying gi'i shes rab rab gyur yab yum lo//
335a4(rgyud 'grel): de yang snying gA'i nyi bcas hUM/ nyi ma u du mgo zla tshes// thig laM nA nga'i bar bsdus la// der yang dmigs med gnyis la 'jug/ nang par gyis dus su rdo rje rnal 'byor ma yis glus bskul bas sad par mos par byas la/ cho ga
335a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad nyi ma snga ma bzhin du bya'o// de ltar gus pa dang bcas pas rgyun mi 'chad par bsgom pas sems brtan par gyur pa dang / rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i ting 'dzin bsgom par bya'o// rnal 'byor pa rnams 'bo tshe dpal/
335a6(rgyud 'grel): khrag 'thung sogs pa rnal 'byor pa// me tog sna tshogs lag na thogs// rgyal mtshan pa ngan sna tshogs dang // rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs dang // glu yi mchod pa sna tshogs myos// mkha' spyod gnos su khrid par byed// 'chi ba zhes
335b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di rnam rtog yin// dam tshig ldan zhing bla ma la gus dang // bsgom bsgrub brtson la dngos grub thams cad 'byung // tshe dang longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang // dpal dang gzi brjod dbang phyug las rnams 'grub//
335b2(rgyud 'grel): bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas rtsod pa chen por 'gyur// rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid myur du thob par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'khor lo bde mchog go/ sgrub thabs tshul bzhin byas pa las// dge ba thob pa gang yin des// 'gro
335b3(rgyud 'grel): kun rdor 'dzin rgyal gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor lo bde mchog gi sgrub thabs rin po che yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas pa chen po rdo rje dril bu pas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
335b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro kun sangs rgyas thob par shog// rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ma ti kIr+t+ti dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba mkhos pa mar pa ches kyi dbang phyug gis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// /
335b5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI dI b+hu dza sa ha dza sa~M ba ra sa d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ dpal bde mchog phyag gnyis pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i sgrub thabs/ dpal bde mchog lhan cig skyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gi dag
335b6(rgyud 'grel): bas khams gsum srid mtha'i sdug bsngal ma lus pa/ bsal nas bde ba mtha' dag la ni dgod par bya ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas thob par bgyi'o zhes kyang smon pa bskyed nas su// gzhan dag 'jug pa'i rang bzhin yang na yongs
336a1(rgyud 'grel): sbrel bar bya// rnal 'byor rnams gsum shes bya ste// byin gyis brlab dang rab brtags dang / bsam gyi mi khyab gzugs rdzogs pa'i// rnal 'byor sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags/
336a2(rgyud 'grel): gang yang skad cig sbyor ba yis// rang nyid rdo rje mkha' 'gro gyur// rdzus te skyes pa'i sems can bzhin// sa bon med par bsgom bya ste// dpral bar gnas pa'i thong phreng can// zla bo phyed pa spyi bor 'chang // phyag rgya drug dang
336a3(rgyud 'grel): mgo phreng can// spyan gsum sna tshogs rdo rje can// g.yas brkyang gom stobs bkod pa yis// sna tshogs chu skyes nyi ma la// gnas pa'i 'dzegs byed dus mtshan bcas// mnan cing stag gi lpags pa 'chang // nag po mi
336a4(rgyud 'grel): bskyod cing pam can// rdo rje dril buM ral par ldan// dpa' bo rdo rje phag mo ni// rdo rje thod pa khrag bkang bsnams// dmar po ske rags dum bus mtshan// spyan gsum mgo bo'i phreng ba can// phyag rgya ldu ma skra grol ma// phyogs
336a5(rgyud 'grel): gos sangs rgyas dbu brgyan ma// de ltar skad cig gis rdzogs par// bdag gis lus ni bsgom par bya// ye shes lngarang bzhin gsal// sangs rgyas 'od zer rnam par 'phro// sems kyi spyod yul gcig tu ni// de dag
336a6(rgyud 'grel): kho na yun ring bsam// sems can gnas der bzhag nas su// de nas sangs rgyas dga' ba brtsam// chos dbyings rgyal mtshan kun chags las// dman min 'dzag pa phun tshogs rnams// yang dag rig pa dga' bo'i tshogs//
336b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzag pa can ma 'char ba gang // de ni rgya chen yid byed pa// 'phro ba 'dus byas rgyun rnams la// rtag tu bsgom zhing 'di bzhin du// 'od gsal rjes su dran par bya// sna tshogs mtsho skyes nyi ma dang ni 'jigs byed dus mtshan
336b2(rgyud 'grel): mo// mdzes ma bdag po nam mkha'i nor bu de bzhin gshegs lnga yi yi 'og/ lus dang yan lag mchog dang 'od dkar thig la nA da ste/ 'di rnams sgrib pa med pa'i gnas su rims kyis gzhug par bya// ji ltar dbugs
336b3(rgyud 'grel): rlung me long la// kun nas yal bar 'gyur ba ni// de bzhin rnal 'byor yang dag mthar// yang dang yang du bzhug par bya// thams cad khyab pa snang ba med// snying rje ro gcig yid kyis ni// bdag po yin bzhin stong pa nyid//
336b4(rgyud 'grel): skad cig kho nar 'khyud par 'gyur// rnam bcas rnam pa med pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab de yis 'khyud pa po// skye 'jig spangs pa mi 'gyur bde ba rgod pa la sogs bde ba spangs pa po// sangs rgyas rnams ni skyed
336b5(rgyud 'grel): byed sku gsum ldan pa mi khams gsum yang dag rig pa po// thams cad mkhyen pa mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan de nyid la phyag 'tshal// mi 'gyur bde ba ye shes dus// thabs dang thugs rje'i bdag nyid de/ shes bya'i
336b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam par 'gro 'khor lo// shes rab stong nyid bdag nyid do// kau de bde ba rgyu med blo// snying rje ye shes mi 'gyur ba// stong nyid pri ti se na bzhin// dngos po thams cad mthong ba'o// kun nas phyag dang zhabs ldan pa// kun nas spyan dang dbu
337a1(rgyud 'grel): dang zhal// kun nas dran ldan 'jig rten du// thams cad kun tu g.yogs nas bzhugs// 'di ni ngo bo nyid kyis sku// stong nyid snying rje gnyis med pa// ma ning zhes byar grags pa ste// 'ga' zhig tu na
337a2(rgyud 'grel): zung 'jug ces// sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyis ni// phung po la sogs 'di na gnas// rten dang brten pa'i mtshan nyid 'di// thams cad dkyil 'khor nyid yin no// / dpal bde mchog phyag gnyis pa'i lhan cig sgras
337a3(rgyud 'grel): bi'i sgrub thabs/ dngos grub brnyes pa'i paN+Di ta chen po dpal rdo rje dril bu pa'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po lnga rig pa Na chen grub pa brnyes pa rje btsun+da rat+na rak+Shi ta'i zhal snga nas
337a4(rgyud 'grel): dang chag lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong chos rgyu dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// // kun gyis sangs rgyas myur thob shog// / rgya gar skad du/ ga Na tsakra bo d+hi/ bod skad du/ tshogs
337a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gre la phyag 'tshal lo// na mkha'i mdog can dri med rnal 'byor ma la rol// khyud rnams sprul pa bkye nas bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon mdzad de la phyag 'tshal lo// bsod rnams ye
337a6(rgyud 'grel): shes tshogs yin te// tshogs la dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur// de phyir de yi cho ga ni// brgyad dang bcu bzhi bco lnga dang // chos bcu la ni de rab mchod// dur khrod dam ni shing gcig mchog/ skyed mos tshal dang kun dga' dang /
337b1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin rang gi khyim dang ni// gzhan yang dben pa'i khyim du bya// dang po tshogs kyi yo byas bsags te// de nas bdud rtsis chos 'byung bris la// de'i steng du bdud rtsi lnga dang thod par sbyar ba bzhag/ de nas yon bdag gis phyag byas// me
337b2(rgyud 'grel): tog tshogs kyi slob dpon dang // rnal 'byor yo la phul nas gsol ba gdab// de nas tshogs kyi slob dpon gyis// oM ma hA ra shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA hA ra ra shud+d+ho \u0f85haM/ zhes pa'i sngags mang bar bzlas// de'i rjes la slob dpon gyis rdo rje
337b3(rgyud 'grel): dang dril bu 'dzin pas yum la 'khyud bar snyoms par zhugs par bsam/ de nas bdud rtsi sbyang bar byas/ ye shes bdud rtsi phab la// aM a mr-i ta hUM tsi nus bzlas// rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas/ de nas phyogs bcur sdigs mdzub
337b4(rgyud 'grel): kyis gdor bas byang sems dpal gyi bgegs bskrang / bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bya/ de nas oM AHhUM gis rdzas skyon med par bde bar brlab/ de nas bskyed rimis bsgom ste/ bdun rnam dag gi skabasu mchod pa lnga dang bdud
337b5(rgyud 'grel): rtsi lngas mchod// ye shes 'khor lo la/ gcig de nas dbang bskur yan chad rdzogs pa'i rjes la// rnal 'byor pa lnga'i 'khor lo 'dzin pa gcig mchod// bdud rtsi dang zhal bsil gyi rjes la dbul/ de nas lha bsdus la
337b6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pas sbyang bar byas// rnal 'byor pa rnams la me tog gi phreng ba dang / dri bzang po dbul/ de nas na mkha' khengs pa'i lha mo yis kyang / bkra shis brjod par bsam/ bkra shis brjod par bya// de nas skyes pa'i dum
338a1(rgyud 'grel): bu gcig pa'i thod pa chang gis bkang la tshig 'di brjod la drang bar bya/ ltos shig dam po'i chos bya ba// 'di la rnam rtog yin ma yin// bram ze khyi dang gdol pa gsum// rang bzhin gcig
338a2(rgyud 'grel): pas lhan cig bza'// bde gshegs chos ni sdig med cing // gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// 'dod chags la sogs skyon dang bral// de bzhin nyid la bdag phyag 'tshal// der ni bza' rnams gsol byas te// lhag
338a3(rgyud 'grel): ma snod du bzhag par bya// zhes 'byung bas/ tshogs rol nas gcig gis mas yar lhag ma dang / da tsa'i me tog bsdus la gtor mar bsam de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te/ khru gang ba yi tshad du na// dri ni bzang pos byug par bya
338a4(rgyud 'grel): de phyir dkar de gru gsum yon// nye dang sha sogs gtor mar bzhag/ me tog la sogs gtor mar bzhag/ de mi dmigs par byas la// mos pas chos 'byung gru gsum bsams la/ rtse mo thur na mo las aM las rnam
338a5(rgyud 'grel): srung / g.yon po AHlas snang ba mtha' yas/ g.yas pa b+h+rUM las mi bskyod pa/ nang du pa ljang gu las sna tshogs pad+ma/ ngo'i steng du sems can rnams yabi yu ma dang / khro bo dang khyung du bsams la gtor ma btang /
338a6(rgyud 'grel): hU~M ba~M hoHsa mgrin rang rgyud po spyan drangs la bsgom/ k+ShA ya d+h+r-ikaM gis bsdu'o// bskyod nas bkra shis bya/ de nas yang rig par mchod pa'i cho ga ma tshang ba dang lhag pa rnams// rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yi ge brgya pa gdon/
338b1(rgyud 'grel): mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub la 'dod pa'i gsol ba gdab/ de nas thal mo sbyar la smon lam gdab/ sems can thams cad sdig med cing / sems can thams cad bde gyur cag/ sangs rgyas nyid dang phrad gyur pa'i/
338b2(rgyud 'grel): lam de nyid du zhugs nas kyang // ma bsgral pa rnams bsgral ba dang // ma grol po rnams grol bar shog/ rnal 'byor gtsug la dam tshig la// da lta nyid du gnas par shog/ se gol lan gsum rdab byas la// phyi rol
338b3(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams gshegs su gsol// bdag gis tshogs 'khor 'di byas pas// dge ba dri med gang thob des// tshogs gnyis tshogs ni bsags nas kyang // 'gro kun rdo rje 'arten rgyal shog// tshogs kyi 'khor
338b4(rgyud 'grel): lo'i cho ga slob dpon rdo rje dril bu pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / @#// rgya gar skad du/ shrI tsakra saM pa ra sto tra/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom po'i bstod pa/ dpal bde mchog 'khor lo
338b5(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshalo// zhe sdang tshul gyis zhe sdang 'joms mdzad cing // chos dbyings rnam dag ye shes ngo bo nyid// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang mnyam par sbyar// zhe sdang rdo rje khyod la phyag 'tshalo// hUM gi rdo rje las byung char
338b6(rgyud 'grel): sprin mdog/ dga' ba rnam ngag drag po'i zhal bzhir snang // gar gyi nyams dgus gdul dka' 'dul mdzad pa// hUM mdzad rdo rje khyod la phyag 'tshalo lo// rten 'brel bcu gnyis dag pas sa rnams rdzogs// bcu gnyis
339a1(rgyud 'grel): phyug gis phyag mtshan sna tshogs 'dzin// yul dang yul min rnam rtog 'joms mdzad pa'o// ngo mtshar mtshon cha bsnams la phyag 'tsha // d+hU krId+ha rus sgyid gsum sdug mdzad cing // u bi'i rgyun s+tha phaT kyi
339a2(rgyud 'grel): sgra sgrogs pas/ bdud dang bgegs tsho gos gdul dka' ma lus 'dul// rnam rtog bgegs bdud 'joms la phyag 'tsha lo// spros bral bde mchog pad+ma ro ga'i mdog/ stong nyid 'od gsal dus gsum bde gshegs blo// rnam
339a3(rgyud 'grel): rtog dra ba ma lus 'joms mdzad pa'i// dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum la phyag 'tshalo// sa chu me rlung 'byung ba rnam par dag/ dag pa'i zhal bzhi rigs kyi yum du snang // dran pa nyid gzhag bzhi yi ngo bo nyid// mkha' 'gro ma sogs
339a4(rgyud 'grel): yum la phyag 'tshalo// sems kyi rnam rtogs bla'i srid pa sbyong // zhe sdang rnam dag thugs kyi 'khor lor snang // thod pa'i dum bu rab gtum ma la sogs// gnas dang nye gnas rnams la phyag 'tshalo// gsung gi nga ros sa stengs srid
339a5(rgyud 'grel): pa sbyongs 'dod chags rnam dag gsung gi 'khor lor snang // myu gu can dang sa srungs ma la sogs// zhing dang nye zhing rnams la phyag 'tshalo// sku yi rol pas sa 'og srid pa sbyong // gti mug rnam dag sku yi 'khor lor snang // stobs po
339a6(rgyud 'grel): che dang 'khor lo'i shugs can sogs// 'dus sogs gnas la bzhugs la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag las mtha' 'tsho ba rtsol dang dran/ bde chen dga' ba mos dang gtso la phyogs// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams mim lus bsrungs
339b1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa// sgo bzhi ma mor srung la phyag 'tsha lo// brtson 'grus rnam ngag yang dag spong ba bzhi// gshin rje gartan ma la sogs ma mor snang // phyogs gnyis 'dzin pas sku mdog phyeng gzugs sam// rgyal ba'i yum du bstan
339b2(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshalo// bde gshegs brgyad kyis bstan pa'i snying por bstan// bdag mad dkyil 'khor dur khrod brgyad du gnas// byang chub rkyen du shing brgyad mngon du byung // 'jig rten chos brgyad bsregs la phyag 'tshal// dpal
339b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo sdom pa'i bstod pa// rgyal po chen po in+d+ra b+hU tis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / @#rgya gar skad du/ maN+Da la de ba sto tra rat+na mA yA rA nA nA ma/ bod skad du/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha la bste/
339b4(rgyud 'grel): pa rin po che sgyu 'phrul sbyin pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'ongs dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshalo// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin dkyil 'khor phyag 'tshal te// gus pas bsteng la byin rlabs myur 'byung bdag gis brjod//
339b5(rgyud 'grel): hUM phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing kun bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor na// bcom ldan dpal tshon khro rgyal 'khor lo bde mchog ni// ye shes rnam par dag po thams cad tshogs pa'i sku// 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed pa mthong nag rin chen
339b6(rgyud 'grel): 'odod/ zhal bzhi sngo dang dmar dang ser dang ljang ba'i dbu// ral pa'i thor tshugs zla phyed sna tshogs rdo rjes mdzes// dmar 'jigs brtson gzigs rab dgrang sdang mig glog ltar 'gyu// gtum rngam mche ba gtsigs shing 'jigs pa'i nga ro
340a1(rgyud 'grel): sgrogs// rol pa chen po'i smin mtshams khro gnyer rlabs chen 'khrugs// ljags 'dril lachog las 'od 'phro hU~M phaT 'brug sgra che// lang tsho gzhon pa gar dgu'i nyams ldan 'gying bag can// sum cu rtsa gnyis
340a2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan dang dpe byad brgyad cus brgyan// rten 'brel bcu gnyis 'gags pa'i phyag bsnams rab tu snang // dang po gnyis kyi rdo rje dril bu yum mchog 'dzin// thabs dang shes rab zhal sbyar bde chen mi rtog bzhugs// mtha' gnyis glang chen ko/
340a3(rgyud 'grel): rlom mi lpags na bzar brgyangs// g.yon pa'i gnyis pa kha T+wAM gsum pas thod khrag bkang // bzhi pa rdo rje zhags pa lnga pa tshangs mgo bsnams// g.yas pa'i gnyis pas cang ti'u gsum pas mdung rtse gsum// bzhi pas rdo rje dgra sta
340a4(rgyud 'grel): lnga pa gri gug bsnams// rab tu brjid pa'i mgon po stag lpags sham thabs can// spyi gtsug 'khor lo nor bu snyan cha gdub kor dang / mgur chu phyag rgya sku rigs thal ba rab tu brgyan// lha yi gdugs dkar mdzes pa steng na 'jam
340a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dpal// brgya phyed khrag 'dzag mi mgo'i phreng ba'i do shal can// 'jigs byed dus mtshan ma rungs skrag cing gtsigs pa'i zhal// nyin mo'i dbang phyug gdan la zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum bzhugs// sna tshogs thabs kyis
340a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba ma lus bde lo sbyar// khro bo'i rgyal po thams cad gus pas khyed la 'dud// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang po lha chen tshogs bdag sogs// 'gro ba'i gtso bo thams cad 'jogs dang gus mched po'i// rgyal chen he ru ka dpal khyed
340b1(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal bstod// / hUM dbus phyogs rnam dag rdo rje'i zhing gi dkyil 'khor na// bcom ldan 'das ma mkha' 'gro tshogs kyi gtso bo ni// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes yem par dag pa'i sku// byi ru'i 'od 'bar rdo
340b2(rgyud 'grel): rje phog mo bde gshegs thams cad bskyed pa'i yum// 'dod pa'i dbang phyug skal ldan mkha' 'gro kun gyi rje// rdo rje dbyings kyi khro rgyal phyag rgya chen po'i sku// he ru ka dpal yang dag sbyor ba btsun mo'i rgyal// zhal gcig phyag
340b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis spyan gsum dmar ser me stag 'phro// khro 'dzum zhal gyi mche ba gtsigs shing rol pa mo// dbu skra legs grol skra sor seb pa'i lha mo che// thod pa skam pos dbu brgyan 'gro ba'i zhe sdang 'joms// phyag g.yas rdo rje
340b4(rgyud 'grel): gri gug sngags mdzub gdug pa 'dul// g.yon pa thod pa sdang ba'i khrag gis bkang ba bsnams// dbu yi nor bu snyan cha gdub kor mgur chu dang // phyag dub sku rags phyag rgya lnga yis rab tu brgyan// yi dgas phra mo me shel
340b5(rgyud 'grel): nor bu'i gdan steng na// gcer mo rig po'i rgyal mo zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum bzhugs// rdo rje lha mo khro mo'i gzugs can drag snyems ma// 'byung po'i 'jigs pa ma lus rdo rje chen pos 'joms// 'jig rten gsum phyogs
340b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyis bsdogs mi tshugs shing // bdud kyi 'jigs pa ma lus skem zhing pham mdzad ma// rdo rje gdan bzhugs tshangs sogs dbang byed las rgyal zhing // dngos grub kun 'byung rje btsun ma khyod phyag 'tshal bstod // shar
341a1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs rnam dag sangs rgyas zhing gi dkyil 'khor na// bcom ldan 'das ma sangs rgyas rigs kyi gtso mo ni// me long lta bu'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'i sku// rin chen bai DUr+ya yi 'od 'bar mkha' 'gro
341a2(rgyud 'grel): ma/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum skra grol mtsho bzhi gtsigs// thod pa kha T+wAM gri gug ceng te'u phyag na bsnams// 'khor lo snyan cha mgur chu phyag gdub mchod phyir thogs// phyag rgya lngas brgyam lang tsho rol pa sgeg
341a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sku// gcer mo g.yon brkyang srog seng zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs// chos dbyings las bzhengs 'khor ba grol ba'i khro mo'i rgyal// ma mo na mkha' khyab 'gro 'gro ba'i gti mug 'joms// sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs sems
341a4(rgyud 'grel): can don la khyab par 'jug/ ye shes chen mo rnal 'byor skal ldan 'char ba mo// bdud dang mu stegs mi mthun phyogs rnams rdul du rlog/ lam log 'gro ba bde la thabs kyis sbyor mdzad cing // dngos grub kun ster
341a5(rgyud 'grel): lha mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// byang phyogs rnam dag las mchog zhing gi dkyil 'khor nas// bcom ldan 'das ma las kyi rigs kyi gtso mo ni// bya ba grub pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'i sku// rin chen mar ka ta'i
341a6(rgyud 'grel): 'od 'bor lA mo ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum skra grol mche bzhi gtsigs// thod pa kha T+wAM gri gug cang te'u phyag na bsnams// 'khor lo snyan cha mgu chu phyag gdub mchod phyir thogs// phyag rgya lngas brgyan lang tsho gzhon
341b1(rgyud 'grel): bsgeg pa'i sku// gcer mo g.yon brkyang srog song zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs// chos dbyings las bzhengs 'khor ba sgrol ba'i khro mo'i rgyal// ma mo na mkha' khyab 'gro 'gro ba'i phrag dog 'joms// sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs sems can don
341b2(rgyud 'grel): la khyab par 'jug/ ye shes chen po rnal 'byor skal ldan 'char ba mo// bdud dang mu stegs mi mthun phyogs rnams rdul du rlog/ lam log 'gro ba bde la thabs kyis sbyor mdzad cing // dngos grub kun ster lha mo khyod la phyag
341b3(rgyud 'grel): 'tshol lo// / nub phyogs rnam par dag pad+ma zhing gi dkyil 'khor na// bcom ldan 'das ma pad+ma rogs kyi gtso mo ni// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'i sku// rin chen pad+ma rA gA 'od 'bar dum skyes ma/
341b4(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum skra grol mche bzhi gtsigs// thod pa kha T+wAM gri gug cang te'u phyag na bsnams// 'khor lo snyan cha mgur chu phyag gdub mchod phyir thogs// phyag rgya lngas brgyan lang tsho gzhon pa sgeg pa'i sku/
341b5(rgyud 'grel): gcer mo g.yon brkyang srog song zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs// chos dbyings las bzhengs 'khor ba sgrol ba'i khro mo'i rgyal// ma mo na mkha' khyab 'gro 'gro ba'i 'dod chags 'joms// rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs sems can don la khyab
341b6(rgyud 'grel): bar 'jug/ ye shos chen mo rnal 'byor skal ldan 'bar ba mo// bdud dang mu stegs mi mthun phyogs rnams rdul du rlog/ lam log 'gro ba de la thabs kyis sbyor mdzad cing // dngos grub kun ster lha mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod//
342a1(rgyud 'grel): lho phyogs rnam dag rin chen zhing gi dkyil 'khor nA// bcom ldan 'das ma rin chen rigs kyi gtso mo ni// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rnam par dag pa'i sku// rin chen gtso mo gser 'od
342a2(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba gzugs can ma// zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum skra grol mche bzhi gtsigs// thod pa kha T+wAM gri gug cang te'u phyag na bsnams// 'khor lo snyan cha mgur chu phyag gdub mcho de phyir thogs// phyag rgya lngas brgyan
342a3(rgyud 'grel): lang tsho gzhon pa sgeg pa'i sku// gcer mo g.yon brkyang srog song zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs// chos dbyings las bzhengs 'khor ba sgrol ba'i khro mo'i rgyal// ma mo na mkha' khyab 'gro 'gro ba'i nga rgyal 'joms// rdzu 'phrul
342a4(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs sems can don la khyab par 'jug/ ye shes chen mo rnal 'byor skal ldan 'char ba mo// bdud dang mu stegs mi mthun phyogs rnams rdul du rlog/ lam log 'gro ba bde la thabs kyis sbyor mdzad cing // dngos
342a5(rgyud 'grel): grub kun ster lha mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// de ltar bdag gis rab dad pas// dngos grub chen po 'byung ba'i rgyu// dkyil 'khor lha la gus bstod pas// dung dang kun da ltar dkar ba'i// dge des 'gro kun rdo rje 'dzin thob/
342a6(rgyud 'grel): shog/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha la bstod pa rin po che sgyu 'phrul sbyin pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpor rdo rje dril bu pas mdzad pa rdzob so// / meny+dzu bid+hA ta su ma ti hr-irti dang // bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba mar ba
342b1(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi dbang phyug gis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+rA DA kA s+ya sta pA paN+Da ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gru
342b2(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa rgyun chags zhes bya ba// dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag 'tshal lo// ut+pal mdog sngon char sbyin phreng ba dri med na mkha' sngon po sku mdog rlung chenA mo chu sa yaM dkyil 'khor steng du gnas pa'i gser gyi ri bo'i steng na
342b3(rgyud 'grel): pad+me rgyas pa'i gdan gnas dpung phyug mnan cing dkar mo'i nu ma gnyis po mnyam brdzes zil gyis dbang po nyi dbang nyi ma zla ba laso lha rnams sngangs mdzad lha min du me skrag par mdzad cing 'jig rten srung mdzad dogs pa kun 'gro/
342b4(rgyud 'grel): stag lpags nA bza' bka' mdzad ngan bsgral brtan zhing zab pa'i yi ge hU~M dang pheM gyi rnam pa hU snang ros na mkha' kun gang sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed kyis mtshan gtsug tor dam pa gti mug mun btso legs par sgrol ba dung chen phreng
342b5(rgyud 'grel): ba 'bar ba'i rdo rje slar bcas dril bu rab gsil dam pa'i phyag zung nye bar 'khyud pa nyid med ye shes chags pa'i yan lag rang bzhin btsun mo'i grogs dang ldan pa phyag nyis glang chen myos pa chen po'i lpags pa'i na bza'
342b6(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pas brel zhing rnam par 'phro ba'i dgra sta mdung rno gri gug 'bar ba'i rdo rje kha T+wAM ga dang zhags pa 'phyo ba tshangs pa'i mgo dang cang te'u dang ni thod pa 'phro ba'i phyag rnams kyis mdzes sha dang tshol bu chen po gsol pa bsam gtan ldan
343a1(rgyud 'grel): cod pan ldan pa ye shes ldan pa blo nor ldan pa bcu drug phyed phyed zhal dang ldan pa spyan gsum dag par mdzad pa mgo bo'i phreng bas brgyan pa 'jigs su rung ba drag po mi bzang 'khor ba'i dgon pa yang
343a2(rgyud 'grel): dag sbrel ba bdud rnams 'joms pa rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal// de yis rjes su phyogs kyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma bzhir bzhugs mkha' 'gro chen mo lA ma dum skyes gzugs can ma ni yid 'phrog byung ma rnams dang ldan zhing mtshams
343a3(rgyud 'grel): su kun gnas thod pas bskor cing de nas sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lor bzhugs shing sa 'og sa steng mtho ris spyod pa de nyid gsum las 'phros pa'i dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug 'khor lo dam pa'i 'khor lo can ni phyogs dang phyogs min
343a4(rgyud 'grel): ngag na gnas pa'i khwa gdong la sogs lha mo brgyad kyis mngon par mchod cing rang gi lha mes mnyam par sbyar ba'i sgeg pa dang ldan bdud kyi sde rnams spangs par mdzad pa rnam par 'phro ba sems can la ni yang dag chags can sdang la rnam
343a5(rgyud 'grel): sdang khyo la kun khro nyon mongs rnams 'joms 'chi bdag bdud sogs khrag dron btung bas tshim pa'i thugs bde 'jig rten gsum na mdzad pa gcig bzhugs sangs rgyas mdzad brtson rdo rje lha mo'i bde ba reg pa las skyes pa spu langs
343a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i tshogs kyis khyab pa'i sku can spyan gyi rdzi ma g.yo zhing mgur gyi sbubs nas srid kyi sgrar bcas bzhad cing yang 'od phyag gi zhags pas mgul 'khyud nu ma gnyis rgyas mkhrang rten las byung rdul gyi thigs pa'i tshogs kyis mchod cing 'i
343b1(rgyud 'grel): ma bye ba'i 'od kyi snang bas phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs khyab cing mtha' yas khyab cing snyan chas brgyun pa zla ba gzhon nu phyung ba'i mche ba'i myu gu lha ma med pa la mdzad blo mdzad tshim pa ster zhing rgyas pa ster ba rgyal srid skyer zhing dngos
343b2(rgyud 'grel): grub ster ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rab ster 'dren pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro la ni rtag tu 'dud// dpe med thugs rje'i nyams kyis 'jug pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkod pa ma lus rnam par 'phro bas 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mo bzad nang

350a1(rgyud 'grel): gru bzhi rdo rje yig mtshan pa// 'od zer ser po 'khrug cing 'khrug/ de steng sum yig las byung ba// lhun po rin chen bzhi rang bzhin// gru bzhi rtse mo brgyad kyis mdzes// gzi brjid bzang po mchog
350a2(rgyud 'grel): gi mchog/ de steng paM las pad chen po// sna tshogs 'dab brgyad 'od zer 'bar// de steng hUM yig las sna tshogs// rdo rje shar lho nung byang dbus// dkar ser dmar ljang mthing rtse gsum// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar zhing 'bar//
350a3(rgyud 'grel): de'i stegs bur yi ge 'brum dkar po las byung ba'i khang pa rtsigs ma sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad bsdus pa'i ngo bo thar pa chen po'i pho brang rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin/ rin po che sna tshogs pa las grub
350a4(rgyud 'grel):  gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan// ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes// rtsig pa lnga dang yang dag ldan// stegs bu bzhis bskor brgyad gnyis kyis// mchod pa'i lha mo mchod 'bral 'gying // de
350a5(rgyud 'grel): shal de phyed dar me tog/ nyi zla ma long rda yab dang // rdo rje srang bu bla res mdzes// 'od la sangs rgyas rgya mtsho 'phro// ba dan rtse mo g.yo bkra ba'i// dril bu phyogs kyi sgo nas 'phrul// dur khrod brgyad kyis yongasu bskor// rdo rjer
350a6(rgyud 'grel): ba 'ong chen 'bar// de'i dbus su sna tshogs pa'i 'dab ma can gyi pad+ma rab tu rgyas pa ste/ de'i lte ba la 'jigs byed chen mo dang dus mtshan mo brtsegs po'i snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor/ phyogs kyi 'dab ma rnams ro'i
350b1(rgyud 'grel): snying gar zla ba'i gdan dang ldan pa/ mtshams bzhir zla la bum steng du// bdud rtsis bkang ba'i thod pa bzhi// phyogs bral dang sgo rnams su yang // ro'i snying gar zla ba'i gdan// de nas dus mtshan mo'i snying ga'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
350b2(rgyud 'grel): la a la sogs pa'i dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug nyis 'gyur las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor me lta bu'i ye shes kyi ngo bo// de'i steng du ka la sogs pa'i gsal byed sum cu rtsa bzhi Da D+ha da d+ha ya la bsnan pa bzhi bcu gnyis 'gyur
350b3(rgyud 'grel): yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes/ der yi ge hUM dngul chu lta bu yongs su gyur pa las/ rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po rab tu 'bar ba lte bar yi ge hUM gis mtshan pa so sor rtogs pa'i ye she/
350b4(rgyud 'grel): de bas de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyi rnam par snang ba 'phros pas 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don byas nas/ de dag bsdu ba'i sbyor bas sa bon la bcug pas de thams cad gcig tu 'gyur ba
350b5(rgyud 'grel): ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so// de nas de las bdag nyid rang gi rig ma dang bcas shing dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang bcas par grub pa ni chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo ste/ de yang 'di ltar/ sngo zhing drag shu
350b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam 'gyur drag/ 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par mdzad// mche ba dag kyang gtsigs pa'o// gtsug na zla ba phyed pa la// sna tshogs rdo rje ral pas brgyan// thong pa'i phreng bas rnam par klu bas// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs
351a1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs shing // snang ba thams cad 'dul mdzad pa// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gdun la ni// phyed krung byas pas shin tu gnas// sred dang rmongs dang phrag dog gyur// kA la d+hU traM 'og tu man// spyan
351a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum zhal bzhi mgrin pa bzhi// mkha' ltar sngo dang ser dang dmar// stang gi zhal ni ljang gu ste// phag mo dang ni gnyis mang dgo'// dril bu rdo rje snyoms 'jug cing // 'khar gsol snod zhags mgo bo dang // chos kyi 'khor
351a3(rgyud 'grel): lo mdung rtsa gsum// rdo rje lcags kyu rdo chung ste// khrag gi rba klong 'khyil ba yi// glang chen kau rlan gos su gyon// phyag gnyis na ni chos gos so// mi lpags snam bu gnyis kyis 'phyar// lang tshe gzhon pa 'gying bag can//
351a4(rgyud 'grel): sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang zhing // dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan// gar dgu yi nI nyams dang ldan// stag gi lpags pa'i na bza' mnabs// phyag rgya drug gis rab tu brgyan// mgo phreng do shal chen po can// steng na
351a5(rgyud 'grel): gdugs dkar legs par 'dzin// phag mo mdog dmar gcer bu lo// spyan gsum sgra ni grol ba'o// skrag cing nu ma 'bur la 'khrang // rgyan rnams thams cad rab 'bar ba// g.yon pA ro yi lang bzed de// g.yas pa rnge dud tshwa
351a6(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs sgrogs// byin pa gnyis ni mnyam 'khyud cing // snying rjes dga' ba'i bde ba che// thugs kar shes rab rab gyur nying // sna tshogs pad+ma nyi rdor hUM// de'i rjes la mgo bo dang mgrin pa dang swa gar zla ba dang nyi ma'i steng du
351b1(rgyud 'grel): oM AHhUM dkar po dang dmar po dang sngon po'i 'od 'phro ba bsams la// de nas lte bar sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i nang du 'dab ma brgyad kyi phyi rol 'dab ma lnga bcu rtsa drug pa kha deg sna tshogs pa'i lte ba la yi ge uM kha dog sna
351b2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pa mgo gyen du bstan pa/ snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma brgyad pa kha dog sngon po lte ba la yi ge hUM kha dog sngon po mgo thur du bstan pa/ mgrin pa longs spyod kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma dbus na bzhi phyi rol na
351b3(rgyud 'grel): bcu gnyis pa kha dog dmar po lte ba'i yi ge oM dmar po mgo gyen du bstun paM/ spyi bor bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa kha dog sngon po lta ba la yi ge haM kha dog dkar po mgo bo thur du bstan pa/ 'khor
351b4(rgyud 'grel): lo de dag thams cad kyang yi grwa dang bcas shing 'od shin tu gsal ba bsgom mo// shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma la// ma tang g+h+r-i dang Dem bi nI// ra dza kI dang puk+ka sI// ser dang sngo dang dmar dung khA// 'khar gsil dang ni lhung bzed
351b5(rgyud 'grel): dang / rje chung dang ni gri gug 'dzin// ba d+ha k+Shi sa ha tse rI/ b+hu d+hi tsa rI sha ba r-I/ skya bo dang ni dmar ba dang // ljang gu dang ni dkar po ste// thod pa dang ni 'khar gsil dang // gri gug dang ni rje chung 'dzin// lugasu 'byung dang lugs
351b6(rgyud 'grel): las bzlog/ bzhad dang zho dang snying rje dang / sgeg dang rngam dang mi sdug pa// drag shul kho bo nyams dang ldan// sgo bzhir khro bo dgod bya ba// he ru ka'i 'od ma dang // rdo rje gtum po dang rdo rje/ srin mo rdo rje 'jigs byed ma// drag cing
352a1(rgyud 'grel): gdul dka' kun gsol ma// thal kar mdog dang ljang gu dang // dmar dang sngo ba drag shul 'jigs// lang tsho gzhon pa nu ma rgyas// lhung bzed kha T+wAM khar gsil g.yon// chos kyi 'khor lo rdo chung
352a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yas// phrag pa'i steng na chos gos te// kun kyang zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma// rgyun rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs// ro steng zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas// skra grol gcer bu rgyan lnga
352a3(rgyud 'grel): 'chang // bcom ldan rdo rje rnal 'byor ma// thabs dang shes rab ngo bo nyid// snying rje chen po stong pa nyid// tha mi dad po'i bdag nyid do// bsod snyoms pa dang chos gos gsum// phyis mi lan dang cig pu pa// stan gcig
352a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang bla ga ba med// shing drung ba dang bas mtha' gnas// dur khrod pa dang phyag dar khrod // phyong ba pa dang gzhi ji bzhin// sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis te// de rnams rnal 'byor ma rnams dag/ mdo yi sde dang dbyangs kyis
352a5(rgyud 'grel): bsnyad// lung du bstan drang tshig su bcad// ched du brjod dang gling gzhi dang // rtogs pa brjod dang da ltar 'byung // skyes pa rabos dang shin tu rgyas// rmad du byung dang gtan la phra bo// gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis kyang //
352a6(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor ma yi ngo bo nyid// de nas hUM gi 'od zer gyis// dam tshig gi 'khor lo dang 'dra ba'i ye shes sems dpa' dang / dbang bskur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / phyi dang gsang ba'i mchod pa byed pa'i lha mo rnams spyan
352b1(rgyud 'grel): drangs te// de dag dang lhan cig tu 'ongs pa'i bgegs zhal rnams kyis hUM zhes brjod pas bslang nas/ snying ka'i sa bon gyi 'od zer las byung ba'i mchod yon a~M ar+g+haM br-itIts+tsha swA hA/ zhes bya bas phul la/ dzadz+dzahUM baM hU~MHzhes bya
352b2(rgyud 'grel): dgu pa dang gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang mnyes par byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bdag la dbang bskur du gsol ba btab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rin po che'i bum pa bdud rtsi lnga'i khu bas
352b3(rgyud 'grel): gang bas oM sarba ta thA gA ta a b+hi She ka sa ma ya shri ye hUM zhes gsung zhing dbang bskur ba dang chu'i lhag ma las dbul rigs kyi bdag pos rgyas gdab par bya ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu la rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje
352b4(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor ma la mi bskyod pa'o// ma tang gi la sogs pa bzhi li rim pa bzhin du// rtag pa don grub 'od dpag med dang rin chen 'byung // ba d+ha k+Shi la sogs pa la ni rtag pa dang / rin chen dbang dang 'od dpag med dang
352b5(rgyud 'grel): don yod grub/ he ru ko b+ha la sogs pa la yang ma tang gi la sogs pa la rtag pa la sogs pa yin no// de nas pi wang ma la sogs pa dang / ma tang gi la sogs pa dang / ma tang gi la sogs pa shin tu mdzes shing
352b6(rgyud 'grel): yid 'phrog pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod par bya'o// de nas lha mo de dag gis legs par bstod pa byas nas// lha mo de rnams rang rang gi gnas su yud kyis gshegs par bsam mo// de'i rjes la yi ge hUM las
353a1(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i rdo rje dkar po bya las nor bu dmar po b+hA ser pos bu ga bkag pa/ yi ge A las phyag rgya'i pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma gsum pa d+hA las ze 'bru dkar pe d+hA ser pos bu ga bkag par bsams la/
353a2(rgyud 'grel): lte ba la sogs pa la snying po la sogs pa yang bkod nas/ oM shrI ma hA su kha badz+ra he he ru ru kaM AHhUM hUM phaT swA hA zhes bya bas dga' ba tsam zhig lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba dam pa'i bde bas bdag dang dkyil 'khor bar
353a3(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa rjes su mnyes par bya'o// phyi rol shin tu dga' ba'i bya ba la'ang // pad+ma rdo rje byin rlabs 'di drag bye// mdun du yi ge yaM las rlung dkyil 'khor// gzhur snang sngon po mtha' gnyis ba dan ldan// de steng yi ge raM las me'i
353a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor// zur gsum nyid la dmar po 'bar bas mtshan// de steng a las pad+ma'o snod// dum bu gcig pa nang dmar po// de'i nang du shor nas brtsams te dbus kyi bar du aM khaM AM trAM hUM/ dkar po dang ljang gu dang dmar po dang
353a5(rgyud 'grel): ser po dang mthing ka rnams las byung ba'i bsam pa'i sman dang sha chen po dang / byang chub kyi sems dang rang byung gi me tog dang / rdo rje'i chu rnams la slar yi ge de dag nyid kyis mtshan pa dang / me dang bden bral rlung dang dbang ldan
353a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis phyogs su lAM mAM pAM tAM dkar dang sngo dang dmar dang ljang / ba lang khyi dang glang po che dang / rta'i sgron ma dang / sa bon de dag nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o// de nas rlung gis me sbar bas/ de dag thams cad khu bar gyur pa/ nyi
353b1(rgyud 'grel): ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar dmar por 'bar ba snang ba/ de'i steng du yi ge hUM dkar po yongs su gyur pa las kha T+wAM ga dkar po mgo thur du bstan pa byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin der lhung bas/ bdud rtsi de shin tu mdog dkar po
353b2(rgyud 'grel): bsil ba'i rnam par gyur par blta'o// de nas A li dang kA la thog mar oM dang mtha' mar hUM hUM phaT dang bcas pa brjod pas// yi ge de dag nyid kha dog sna tshogs pa bdud rtsi'i steng du gnas par bltas la/ slar yang yi
353b3(rgyud 'grel): ge de dag nyid oM AHhUM zhes pa'i yi ge gsum dkar po dang dmar po dang mthing ka'i kha dog ci ni gong nas gong du gnas par gyur par bltas te/ de dag las 'od zer gyi tshogs dpag tu med pas phyogs bcu'i na mkha'i mthas
353b4(rgyud 'grel): gtugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka'i sa bon gyi tsha las/ ye shes kyi bdud rtsi bkug ste yi ge gsum la bsdus pa dang / yi ge gsum yang rim pa bzhin du bdud rtsir lhung bas/ de dag ro gcig tu
353b5(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa'i bdud rtsi'i mchog tu bltas nas// yi ge gsum gyis lan gsum byin gyis brlabs la/ bcom ldan 'das dang rnal 'byor ma rnam kyi lce la yi ge hUM/ las byung rdo rje rje gsum po/ dkar po nas 'bru tsam
353b6(rgyud 'grel): bkod ngo de// de yi 'od kyi sbu gus drangs// bdud rtsi gsol bas mchog tshim blto// rig sngags bzlas brjod pas 'grub par 'gyuraro// zhes gsungs pa'i phyir bzlas brjod bya ste/ de ni rdo rje'i bzlas pa dang / bzlas brjod bya ba'i
354a1(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags kyi yi ge gang dag yin pa rnams/ rang gi thugs ka'as sa lha'agalas byung ba rang gi rdo rje'i rtse me nas phyag rgya'i b+ha gar gton nas/ yang lha mo'i zhal nas rang gi zhal du zhugs pa rang gi
354a2(rgyud 'grel): sa bon la zhugs par blta zhing / zhal thams cad dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyis kyang sngags zlos par bsgom par bya ste/ khro bo'i bzlas pa yang bya'o// rim pa 'dis bzlas brjod kyi nyes pa dang bral bar sems mnyam par
354a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhag pas ji srid skyo bar ma gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa brjod bya'o// de la bzlas brjod kyi sngags ni 'di dag yin te/ oM kA badz+ra he he ru ru kaM hUM hUM phaT DA nI dzA la san+da raM swA hA/ oM hriHha ha huM hUM phaT/ lha'i snying po dang nye bo'i
354a4(rgyud 'grel): snying po'o// oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye badz+ra bar+t+ta nAM ye hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra bai ro tsa r-I ye h+ye hUM phaT swA hAHlha me'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying pa'i// oM mA taM gi huM hUM phaT/ oM Dom+bi nI huM hUM phaT/ oM rA dza kI huM hUM phaT/ a~M
354a5(rgyud 'grel): puk+ka sI huM hUM phaT/ oM ba d+hik+Sha huM hUM phaT/ oM saM he tsau rI hu~M hUM phaT/ oM pu d+hi sauR+tha hUM hU~M phaT/ oM sha ba rI huM hUM phaT/ oM he ru ka b+ha huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra tsaN+Da lI hriM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra rAk+Sha swe huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra bI ra bI hu~M/
354a6(rgyud 'grel): hI phaT/ dpa' bo'i sngags so// ai na mo b+ha ga wa te wa re sha ya/ many+dza kal+lag+ni saM ni b+hA ya/ dza nA ku Tot+ka nA ya/ daMSh+T+wA ka rA lo gra b+h+r-i Sha Na me khA ya/ sa ha sra d+hu dza b+hA suM rA ya/ pa ra shu pA sho bya ta shU la kha T+wAM ga d+hA ri Ne/ rmu
354b1(rgyud 'grel): b+hU dzi nam+ba ra d+hA R+Sha ya/ mahA d+hus+thAn+d+ha kArma wa pu ShA ya/ ka ra ka ra ku ru ku ru/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ tU stA ya tras+yA yA/ k+Sho b+hA ya k+Sho b+ha yA/ hau hau/ h+maHdrAHphyo pheMpaT phaT/ da ha da hA/ pA tsa pa tsaM/ b+huk+Sha b+hak+tha/ ba sa ru d+hi rAn+tu mA lU ba laM/
354b2(rgyud 'grel): bi ne/ gr-ih+Na gr-Ih+ma/ sap+ta b+h+r-i ShAM laM gA tA b+hU dza ge sarbaM b+hU tar+dz+dza ya tardza ya/ A kr-Ir+N+Na AMr+d+ha dz+r-i NAM/ dzAM dzAM/ d+h+r-id+h+waM/ hUM hAM/ hAM hAM/ hUM hUM/ kai li ki l-i/ si liM si li/ hi li hi li/ d+hi li d+hI laM/ b+hI hUM/ phaT/ phreng ba'i sngag
354b3(rgyud 'grel): so// oM shrI tsit+ti DA ka a d+h+r-i ka aM khaM huM hU~M phaT/ DA ki nI dzA la sam+b+ha raM swA hA/ oM shr-I bA kA DA ka A ra l-i kats+tshaki nAM dzAM la sa~M ba raM huM hUM piT swA hA/ oM shrI kA ya DA ko nI dz+wa la saM pa ra ru lu b+h+rUM huM hUM phaT sni hA/ oM shrI rat+na nA kA/
354b4(rgyud 'grel): ya DA kA oM AHhUM DA ki nAM dzA la saM pa ri hu~M hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI karma DA ka a khaM hUM Da ki tsA dzA la saM pa ra huM hUM phaT swA hA/ gtso bo lnga'i sngagaso// gang tshe bzlas pas skye bar gyur pa na/ sa bon 'od kyis shes rib bdag po

355b3(rgyud 'grel): bya// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// lha yi gzugs su bsgom par bya// de ni gzugs las 'das gyur pa// sems nyid du yang bsgom mi bya// bsame bya min par bsam de yang // sems nyid du
355b4(rgyud 'grel): ni mtshon po min// de yang bsam bya min bsam bya// de las gzugs ni thob par 'gyur// dang po ri dgas sred bzhin snang ba ste// mtshan ma gnyis pa dung ka'i rnam pa can// gsum pa srin bu me khyer

355b6(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa yin// shrI ni gnyis med ye shes la// he ni rgyu sogs stong pa nyid// ru ni rtogs pa dang bral ba// ka ni gang na'ang mi gnas pa'o// sems ni ngal so rnal 'byor pa// mya ngan 'das pa
356a1(rgyud 'grel): bstan ma min// rnal 'byor pa rnams 'pho tshe dpal// khrag 'thung dpal sogs rnal 'byor ma// me tog sna tshogs lag nu thogs//
356a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mtshan ba dan sna tshogs dang // rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs dang // glu yi mchod pa sna tshogs kyis// mkha' spyod gnas su khrid par byed// 'chi ba zhes 'di rnam rtog yin// de ltar rje
356a3(rgyud 'grel): btsun he ru ka'i// sgrub thabs gsal bar byas pa las// dge ba thob pa gang yin des// 'gro kun rdo rje 'dzin gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das dpal 'khor lo bde mchog gi sgrub thabs/
356a4(rgyud 'grel): rin po che gtsug gi nong bu zhes bya b+ha/ slo dpon chen po la pa pa'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi ti ta chen po sum ti kAN+Di dang /
