391a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa mo// thod pa'i dum bu'i ska rags ci na// thod pa shin tu gang ba dang // de yi kha dog lag char 'dzin// ri bo tshang tshong sman ljongs dang // rgya mtsho chen po'i ngos dag la// gdong nas grub pa'i dur
391a6(rgyud 'grel): khrod du// der ni dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// ji ltar chos kyi skur gyur pa'o// de ltar sbrul dang bsrung bar bya// kha sbyor kha sbyor du gyur pa// rdo rje lu gu rgyud du brjod// rdo rje 'byed byed pad+ma la// de tshe bung ba lta bur
391b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor// zung pa rdo rje nyid du bshad// de nas rim bzhin spros byas nis// lcags kyu nyid kyis 'khyud bya ste// gtun shing gis ni bskyod par bya// dbyig pa'i mnga'i mnyam sbyor te// de nas rig ma khu bar gyur// sangs
391b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yaM// myur ba nyid du bdag la bskul// oM ma hA he ru ka badz+ri swA hA dzaHhUM haHsu ra ta s+t+waM dr-i sh+ya ho// zhes bya ba'i yongs su bskul pa tsam gyis ni// 'jig rten khams kyi bde bI'i bdag/
391b3(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar bskyed pa'i rims pa bzhin// gnyug ma'i sngags las byung gyur te// khu bo'i gzugs la rdo rje can// de nas AHhUM gnyis las bzhengs// khaM dog sngon po 'jigs pa po// dmar po 'od kyis dkyil 'khor
391b4(rgyud 'grel): 'bar// zhol bzhi pA ste 'jigs pa can// drug gnyis phyag gis rnam par brgyan// u ma u ma'i bdag po mnan// nyin byeng dbang phyug gdan du bting // rtsa ba'i zhal ni shin tu gnag/ g.yas pa kun da lta bu ste/
391b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa dmar po 'jigs pa po// nub ni gsar du 'bar ba'o// sngar gyi lag char yang dag ldan// spyan gsum gyis kyang yang dag mdzes// cung zad khro zhing gzhad pa'i zhal// g.yon brkyang ba yi gar gyis bzhugs/
391b6(rgyud 'grel): de yi shes rab phag mo ni// dmar mo kha dog cher 'bar ba// zhal gcig phyag gnyis rnam par mdzes// rdo rje dang ni mi thod 'phyang // bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal bzhi byin gyis brlab pa ni// oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha huM hu~M phaT
392a1(rgyud 'grel): grah+Na gr-ih+Na suM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+NA pa ya grah+NA pa ya hu~M hUM phaT/ oM Ar+d+han ya ho b+ha ga bAnra baud+ya rA dza huM hraM phaT/ de naM lugs lAs bzlog pa'o// oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba at+ma ko haM zhes bya ba
392a2(rgyud 'grel): nI bsnyen pa'o// oM hi snying gar rdo rje sems dpa'o// oM na ma hi spyi bor rnam par snang mdzad do// oM sa hA hu spyi gtsug tu pad+ma gar gyi dpung phyug+sa gau/ oM baM Sha Ta haM mtshan khud+yA gAnyis su dpal he ru ka'o// oM hUM hUM
392a3(rgyud 'grel): ho mig gnyis su rdo rje nyi ma'o// aM phaT haM rta mgrin te/ yan lag thams cad la mtshon cha'o// oM baM lte bar rdo rje phag mo'o// oM hi yaM snying gar gshin rje ma'o// oM hU~M ma~M khar rmongs byed ma'o// oM
392a4(rgyud 'grel): hUM spyi bor skyong byed ma'o// oM hUM hUM spyi gtsug tu skrag byed ma'o// oM phaT phaT lha mo'i gnas thams cad lnga/ nye ba'i sgrub pa'o// snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i yi ge hUM ni thugs rdo rje'o// A~M hrI
392a5(rgyud 'grel): hi hiMhUM hUM phaT lkog mar gsuHrdo rje'o// oM shrI badz+ra he he ru ru kaM hUM hUM phaT DA ki nI dzAM lA saM ba rA swA hA ni pral bar sku rdo rje'o// oM sar+b+ba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye badz+ra wAR+ShA nI ye huM hUM phaT swA hA rjes bya ba na lha mo'i snying gar
392a6(rgyud 'grel): ros au tsaM haM hUM phaT lkog mar ro// oM badz+ra bai ro tsa ni hUM phaT dpral bar ro// spyi bar yi ge oM mo// snying gar yi ge hUM ngo // ze 'bru la yi ge a'i// rkeng par ni yi gi saM'o// baR+Yar ni yi ge ha'o zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa'o//
392b1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes dam tshig mnyam gyur pas/ de phyir 'di ni rdo rjer brjod// dbang gi don ni bsgoms byas nas// phyis ni mchod pas nyes par bya// lang ga gnyis la sngags bkod la// sna rtser a yig rnam par dgod//
392b2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin ling ga'i lte ba la// yi ge bAM ni rnam par bsam// blo ldan rnal 'byor ma la bsrub// dag pa'i lus ni dri ma mang // ces bya ba 'ang ni dang po'i rnal 'byor ro// oM sar+b+ba tA thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na At+ma ko haM// snying ga'i
392b3(rgyud 'grel): sa bon 'od zer gyis// bde bar gshegs pa spyan drangs te// a ba d+hU tI gnas de bzhin// smin ma'i bar du nges par gzhug/ dang por dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// de ni skad cig gis gsal bsgom// mgul mo'i
392b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo ltar gnas pa// rnal 'byor ma ni de bzhin no// 'bar ba'i phreng ba du mi ni// 'khor lo thams cad kyi ni sgo// zhal bzhi dpa' bo rnams kyiso// dpa' bo rnal 'byor mas yongs bskor// rtsa ba'i lam ni
392b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad du// sngags pa ji ltar dbye 'dod na// de nyid dbye ba tha dad nyid// mkha' 'gro ma ni nyes sbyor byed// chags pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor ni// dgos pa'i phyir ni rab sgrub byed// dam pa'i rnal 'byor ma
392b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kun// yul dang yul la nges par sbyar// de nas mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni// gnas la rnam par gnas pa te/ shar nas mkha' 'gro ma sngo skya'i 'od con no// byang nas lA ma ljang ser ma'o// nub nas
393a1(rgyud 'grel): dum skyes ma dmar ser ro// b+h+yo nas gzugs can ma dkar ser gyi mdog can te/ 'di thams cad ni ro'i steng mthong ba dang gri khug lag na thogs pa/ sgra gyen du mdzes pa/ rgyan
393a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis brgyan pa zhal gcig pa/ dbu la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan gyis mtshan pa yang dag par ldan pa gang stabs kyis bzhugs pa'o// thod pa rnamasu glang po che dang ce spyang dang mo dang ba lung rnams rim
393a3(rgyud 'grel): pa ji lta ba'o// mtshams bzhir yang sngar gcig gis ma tshang ba'i snong // mgo bo pul+lI rA ma la ya nas kheN+Da ka pA li dang rab tu gtum ma ste/ so dang sen mo 'bab pa'o// spyi gzugs 'bar ba 'dzin pa nas
393a4(rgyud 'grel): ma hA kaM ka la dang gtum pa'i mig can ma ste/ s+phu dang sgra 'bab pa'o// rna ba g.yas pa ai Di ya na nas kaM kA le dang 'od ldan mA ste/ lpags pa dang dri ma 'bab pa'o// ltag pa ni ar+b+r-i da nas mche ba rnam par gtsi
393a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / sna chenA ma ste sha 'bab pa'o// de dag ni shar phyogs la sogs pa rnams lugs dang mthun pa'o// rna ba g.yon pa'i mchod sbyin nas dpa' bo bzang po dang / dpa' bo'o bla ma ste/ thams cad du chu rgyun
393a6(rgyud 'grel): 'bab pa'o// smin dbus dga' ba'i dbang phyugs nas 'od dpag tu med pa dang / mi 'thung ma ste/ rus pa dang dri ma 'bab pa'o// mi gnyis lha mo'i mkhar nas rdo rje 'od dang lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ste/ de ni rtag tu
393b1(rgyud 'grel): mchi ma 'bab pa'o// dpung pa mA la be nas rdo rje'i lus dang / shing grib ma ste snying ga'i chu 'bab pa'o// de dag ni dbang ldan sa la sogs pa'i mtshams nas/ thugs kyi 'khor lo mkha' spyong ma rnams snyoms par
393b2(rgyud 'grel): zhugs pas zhugs so// de bzhin du mtshan khung 'dod pa'i gzugs nas aM gu ri dang / e ra ba ti ste/ de rtag tu mig 'bab pa'o// nu ma gnyis po oM dre nas/ rdo rje ral pa can dang / 'jigs byed chen mo ste/ 'khris
393b3(rgyud 'grel): pa 'bab pa'o// lte ba tri sha ku ni nas dpa'o chen po dang / rlung gi shugs can ma ste/ glo ba 'bab pa'o// sna'i rtse mo ko sa la nas/ badz+ri hUM ka ra dang / chang 'thung ma ste/ rgyu ma'i phreng ba 'bab pa'o// de dag ni shar la so
393b4(rgyud 'grel): ba gnaso// kha ka ling ka nas su b+ha dra dang / ljang lha mo ste/ log gis rtsa 'bab par bshad pa'o// mgrin pa lam+ba ka nas rdo rje bzang po dang / shin tu bzang mo ste/ lte bar 'bab pa'o// snying kany+tsi nas 'jigs byed
393b5(rgyud 'grel): chen mo dang / rta rna ma ste/ bai sna ma 'bab pa'o// 'doms par hi mA la nas mig bzang dang / khya ga na ste/ mtshegs ma'i srubs 'bab pa ste/ mtshamasu sngar bzhin te/ gsung gi 'khor los spyod ma ste/
393b6(rgyud 'grel): de rnams ni snyoms par zhugs pas rnam par gnaso// lang ga yi degs lhag par gnaso// stobs po cha dang 'khor lo'i shugs can te/ bad kan 'bab pa'o// bshang bil lam khyim gyi gnaso nas rin
394a1(rgyud 'grel): chen rdo rje dang / dum skyes ma stu dri ni rtag tu 'bab pa'o// bAR+YA sau rASh+TA nA sa d+hA mgrin dang chung 'tshong mA ste/ khrag 'bab pa rab tu grags pa'o// byin pa gser glang nas// nam mkha'
394a2(rgyud 'grel): snying po dang / 'khor lo'i go cham ste/ rdul 'bab par gyur pa'o// de dag ni shar la sogs pa'i phyogaso// sor mo nag ra nas ni dpal he ru ka dang / shin tu dpa' mo sti/ tshol 'bab pa'o// rkang pa'i
394a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyu ba sin+d+hu nas ni pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang stobs chen mo ste/ 'di ni rtag tu mchi mu 'bab pa'o// mthe bo ma ru nas/ rnam par snang mdzad dang 'khor lo sgyur ma ste/ mchil ma 'bab pa'o// pus mo ku lu twA nA/
394a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sem sa dpa' dang brtson 'grus chen mo sti/ byis pa'i snrubs 'bab pa'o// sngon bzhin mtshams rnam su ste/ spyi'i 'khor lo sa 'og nas spyod pa rnams snyoms par zhugs pas bzhugs// shAr gyi sgra
394a5(rgyud 'grel): nas khwa gdong ma'o// byang na 'ug gdong ma'o// nub nas khyi gdong ma'o// lho phyogs nas phag gdong can te/ mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams kyi khwa dog dang mtshan ma dang ldan pa/ ro la zhon cing de la
394a6(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer 'bar bas/ bzhin kun tu rnam par 'gyur zhing / sna tshogs su rnam par bsgyur ba ste/ lugs dang mthun pa'o// pho nya mo rnams mi lugs dang mi mthun pas yang dag par rnam par bzhag ste/ mo'i
394b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshams nas gshin rje'i pho nya ma'o// srin po'i mtshams nas gshin rje brtan ma'o// rlung mtshams nas/ gshin rje mche ba gtsigs ma'o// dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas gshin rje 'joms mA ste/
394b2(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag kyang kha dog gnyis gnyis ma'o// yid du 'ong ma snga ma lta bur ro la zhon pa'o// dpal he ru ka la sogs pa dpa' bo rnams ni rdo rje dang dril bus 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya can no// lha mo thams cad kyi
394b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag na gri gug dang thod pa thogs pa/ sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa/ spyan gsum mya mche ba gtsigs pa/ thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan pa/ 'od zer du ma s+thi zhing 'bar ba khro gnyer yon pos mig
394b4(rgyud 'grel): gis blta ba/ ro mnan cing de las 'od zer 'bar ba nyi ma la gar gyis bzhugs pa'o// khwa'i gdong can ma la sogs pa bshad pa naM/ stag gi lpags pa'i shame thubs can/ thor tshugs kyi nor bu dang // rna
394b5(rgyud 'grel): cha dang mgul rgyan dang / gdu bu dang rdo rje'i sked pa dang / thod pa'i phreng bas mgul ba brgyan pa de bzhin du rkang pa gnyis la dril bu g.yer ka sa brgyan pa/ shin tu g.yon brkyang bas bzhugs pa'o// gong go
394b6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo nyi shu bzhi// he ru ka dpal rigs byung ba// mkha' 'gro ma ni nyi shu bzhi// phag mo'i rigs las byung ba'o// ye shes dam tshig mnyam gyur pas// de phyir rdo rje zhes su brjod// dbang gi don ni bsgom byas
395a1(rgyud 'grel): nas// phyi nas mchod pas mnyes byas te// thams cad snga ma lta bu'o// da ni byang chub phyogs kyi sum cu rtsa bdun gyi lha'i sbyor bas rnam par bzhag ste/ lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni/
395a2(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba nas/ mi dge ba'i chos mA skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa ni gshin rje brtan ma'o zhes byi bo'o bar/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i chung chen pos gsungs te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
395a3(rgyud 'grel): sum cu rtsa bdun gyi lha'i rnam par dag pa'o// snying gi nang song pad+mar ni// 'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar bcas// de'i nang du sen pa'i rtsa// mar me lta bu'i rang bzhin te// chu shing gau ni mu tog bzhin// 'phyang
395a4(rgyud 'grel): zhing kha ni 'og tu'o// de yi ngan song dpa' bo ni// yungs kar sgrim phra'i tshad tsam ste// gzhon med hUM des sa bon nI// ba mo lta bu 'dzag pa nyid// lus can rnams kyi snying dga' ba// de phyir zhes bya rnam por
395a5(rgyud 'grel): bshad// me ni chen po'i gzugs kyis ni// phag mo'i thig le ru ni brjod// las kyi rlung gis bskul ba yas// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du ni 'bar// dpying thob pas ni mnyes gyur nas// snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par
395a6(rgyud 'grel): dag/ 'di ni he ru ka dpal dpal// dpyid kyi thig lar brjod pa'o// stong pa nyid kyi tshul 'dzin ma// rgyu dang mi rgyu yang dag gnas// sku gsung thugs kyi dbyi ba yis// sgo ni rnam pa gsum 'byung bar// 'byung ba 'di ni
395b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa ste/ 'di dag thams cad lus la gnas// lte bI'i A yi tshul gyis nI// thung na ru ni yongs su grags// snying la hUM gi yi ge ni// ring po tshang gnyis dag du gnas// mgrin par oM gyi gzugs kyi ni//
395b2(rgyud 'grel): shin tu ring po tshang gsum pas// dpral ba'i haM zhes bya ba ni// mi shigs pa'i thig le'o// 'khor lo bzhi yi dbye ba yis// sa sogs 'byung ba bzhi dag dang // thun bzhis byin gyis brlabs pa yis// skad cig
395b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi ni 'byung ba dang // dga' ba bzhi yi rang bzhin gyis// sbyor ba bzhi yi sngon du'o// mchog tu dga' ba'i mtshon nyid kyis// bya dang byed po'i dngos po min// rdo rje sems dpa'i tshul gyis ni// 'dir ni ji ltar
395b4(rgyud 'grel): bde bar rol// pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi po yang // phyogs bzhir rnam par gnas pa ni// 'byung ba bzhi yi rtsa yin te// mar me lta bu'i rang bzhin no// mtshams su rnam pararA gnas pa'i tshe// de yi nang song bzhi
395b5(rgyud 'grel): po yang // de nas bdud rtsi lnga 'bab pa// de nyid rang bzhin med tshul gyis// 'dir ni mchod pa'i tshul gnas pas// mchod pa bzhin du yang dag bshang // lus kyi snying gi'i nang na ni// rtsa rnams brgyad ni
395b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam par gnas// gzhin yang sku gsungs thugs dbye bas// nyi shu rtsa bzhi yang dag bshad// gnas sogs dbye ba la brten te// gnas dang gnas la rnam par gnas// ltung byed la sogs rnam dag pa//
396a1(rgyud 'grel): gdong la sogs sngar ji bzhin// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can gyis rgyas btab pa'i phyir gsungaso// rdzas bcu las ni sngar bsam pa// yi ga a lAs byung ba'i snong // rlung gi m+me yi
396a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la// sbar bas 'khor bar gyur pa dang // dbyangs yig dang po yang dag ldan// skad cig de las 'bar zhing blta// bzlog pa'i yo ge mnyam sbyor ba// rgyud kyi sngags ni bsgom par bya// yi ge a~M gyis
396a3(rgyud 'grel): kun gsal bas// de nyid gsum la yang dag brjod// de ltar bsgom gyur na lha mo// rjes kyi dngos grub bzang po byed// 'di yi rnal 'byor dngos grub ni// byin gyis rlab par yang dag 'gyur// oM a ral+li dzaHhUM
396a4(rgyud 'grel): baM heHsa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM badz+ra DA ki ni/ kha kha khA he khA hi/ i maM ba lo b+huny+dza tha pi ba tha ma ma karma sA d+ha ya tha oM oMHhUM pheM pheM swA hA/ oM na mo b+ha gaM wa te bI raM yA ya/ ma hA gal+la gi saM ni b+he ya/ dzaM TA ma ku Tot+ka TA ya//
396a5(rgyud 'grel): daMSh+TA ka rA lo g+h+ra b+hI Sha na mu khA ya// sa ha sra b+ha su d+ha ya/ pa ra ku pA sho pyA taM shu la khA nAM ga d+ha ri Ne/ byAg+ma dzaM nam+bA ra d+hA rA ya/ many+dzi d+hAR+ShAn+ta ka ra wa pu ShA ya/ oM ka ra ka ra ku ru ku ru/ ban+d+ha bar+N+Na/ tA sa ya tA sa yA/ k+Sho b+ha
396a6(rgyud 'grel): d+h-i ya N+DiH / la phanang bong he/ bcab tsa/ b+hiSh+Tha Sh+yaSh+Ta ba sa ru d+hi m+ba mA lAM pa la ba ni/ gr-ih+na gr-ih+Na sa~Mb+ta bA tA la ga ti b+h+rU~M dzi ma sarba glai rdza ya taN ya/ a r+b+ho I kaN+Di / d+hAd+hAHha~M/ dzaHts+tsha d+hI/
396b1(rgyud 'grel): la~M ki lai/ saM la sa laM/ hA laM hA laM/ d+hi l-i d+hi l-i/ huMd+d+he phaT phaT/ sngags thams cad kyi mtha' ru hUM dang / phaT ces bya ba'i yi ge sbyar ro// rab tu g+hatum mo la sogs pa'i mkha' 'gro mA rnams ni/ rat+na gi ming gau sngags
396b2(rgyud 'grel): nye bar brjod do// dang por oM g+hi yi ge dang / mthar hUM gau yaM ge rab tu sbyar ro// oM shrI badz+rA he ru ru ko huM hUM phaT/ DA ki ni dza lA se bau re swA hA/ oM hU~M/ ha ha huM hUM phaT/ oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha ni hUM hUM phaT/ aM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hu~M hUM phaT
396b3(rgyud 'grel): oM gr-ih+NA pa ya/ gr-ih+NA pa ya huM hUM phaT/ oM A na yai ho b+ha ga bAM badz+ra r-i dzi huM hUM phaT/ snying po dang nye bo'i snying po'o// oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye/ badz+ra wan+ta nA ya huM hUM phan+d+ha swA hA/ skying pa'o// oM bai ro tsa nI ya
396b4(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM phiT swA hA/ nya bA'i snyid po'o// oM tsau r-I hUM hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying pa'o// rje btsun ma'i rkang pa'i sngags so// au ha na ma hi/ swA hA hubaM She TaM hedz+dzi d+h+r-i ho/ phaT haM/ dpa'
396b5(rgyud 'grel): de'i go cha drug go// oM ba~M ha~M yaM hUM ma~M hreM hU~M hUM hUM phaTayi ge oM ni thams cad du ste/ rnal 'byor ma drug gi go cha'o// dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrib thabs slob dpon chen po
396b6(rgyud 'grel): brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
397a1(rgyud 'grel): bde mchog 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi chog bzhugs
397b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu gar skad du/ b+ha ga wAn shri tsak+ka staM ba ra maN+Da la bid+hi/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das dpal bde mchog 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga/ bcom ldan 'das dpal
397b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo// dpal ldan khrag 'thung 'gro ba'i mgon// nyi shu rtsa bzhi gnyis med la// phyag 'tshal dkyil 'khor spyod pa dang // brtul zhugs rim pa bsnyen pa bshad// lugs
397b3(rgyud 'grel): su byung dang bzlog pa dang // tha dad phyi ni sbas pa dag/ shes nas gang yang cho ga 'di// bdag gi thams cang bshad par bya// sgra dang sgra nyams brda dang ni// sde ba sbyor mtshan nyid spangs pa yi// 'khor lo/
397b4(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa'i cho ga gsal// de ni bdag nyid dran phyir dang // gar gyi gnas dang mtshungs 'dra ba'i// phyi rol bstan bcos sun 'byin pa// don la rtog pa de nyid can// spyod dang thar pa'ang rang dga' yin//
397b5(rgyud 'grel): legs par brtags pa'i slob ma la// slob dpon gyis ni dkyil 'khor bri// 'jam zhing snyan par smra ba dang // snying rje la sogs phan sems ldan// thos dang klog lo mngon par brtson// gsang ba'i cho ga
397b6(rgyud 'grel): lhag par dang // rtag par rgyun tu bla ma gus// slob ma de ni yongs su bzung // de ni dngos grub ma lus pa// sgrub byed ye shes bshad bya ste// lha ni mnyes par ma byas na// bdag nyid rnam par sun 'byin yin//
398a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan khrag 'thung 'khor lo yis// sngags rnams mnyes par rab dang cing // dpa' bo'i snying po'i gsang sngags ni// khri drug gsum du bzlas brjod bya// rnal 'byor ma yi 'khor lo
398a2(rgyud 'grel): yis khri phrag nyis ni bsnyen par bya// kA ka'i gdong sogs rnam pa brgyad// snying po rnal 'byor ma bzhi yi// stong phrag lnga dang lnga brgya ni// sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba ste// bdag gi yang ni dkyil 'khor ni// sngon du bsnyen
398a3(rgyud 'grel): byas 'grub par 'gyur// gang 'dor rjes gnang dbang bskur ba'o// bla ma'i gtso bo bri bya zhing // 'khor lo'i yo byad phun tshogs pa'o// slob mas de la gsol ba gdab// 'khor lo mchod pa'i rim ji bzhin// khyod
398a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis thams cad 'byor gyur tam// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma dga' bar// gus po yis ni byed nus sam// gal te dpa' bo thams cad du// gzi brjid can byed nus smra ba// de nas dpa' bo chen pos 'dir// shas
398a5(rgyud 'grel): rab yan lag gnyis ming lus// dpal ljon khrag 'thung rnal 'byor che// 'khor lo kun la rnam par bzhugs// dang po gnas mi khyad par du// dA las 'bad pos btsal bar bya// sems can don bya'i rgyu ru ni/
398a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis byang chub de la bdag/ da ni dngos grub thams cad kyi// yon tan gnas ni bshad bya ste/ shin tu bgrod par dka' bo yi// dur khrod chen po'i gnas dag tu// r-i langs dang ni srin po rnams// mi
398b1(rgyud 'grel): zad 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs pa// yi ge po gi sgras khyab pa 'am// sgrub pa po dang mtshams phyogs su// 'jigs bral yongs su dag pa'i blos// ma lus rnam rtog bral ba yis// byams dang snying rje'i rgyun gyis
398b2(rgyud 'grel): ni/ 'dres med rnal 'byor pa der gnas// sems can gcig tu gdug cing gtum// sdug bsngal dang ni las kyis gzir// stong dang snying rje'i snying po yis// byang chub la bzhag yid la bya// kye ma sems
398b3(rgyud 'grel): can sdug bsngal zhing // kun rtog la ni mngon par zhen// de yi rtog pa gzhom phyi bdag/ dpal ldan he ru ka rang bya// sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o// gnas las langs pa nyid dang ni// 'jug dang rdzogs pa
398b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid dring ni// 'jug dang rdzogs pa nyid dag dang // byin gyis brlabs dang dbang bskur dang // ting 'dzin mchod pa nye bar bsdu// yang dag ye shes rgyud shes shing // he ru ka dpal gsang sngags shes// khro ba
398b5(rgyud 'grel): med cing gtsang la mkhas// sbyor shes ye shes pha rol 'gro/ dpal ldan khrag 'thung sogs cha lugs// bdag nyid sngon du byed bdag ni// skye ba bye ba stong phrag tu// gsang ba'i ye shes rnam par spangs// dman
398b6(rgyud 'grel): la mos pa'i sems can rnams// mthong nas slob dpon tshul la gnas// sems can gdon par bya'o zhes// snying rjes rnon po'i sems dang ldan// de bosaM he ru ka rnal 'byor// bde mchog mgon po bdag ston no//
399a1(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig sgreng zhing brten byed pa// bu khyod cig sgo gyur tam// he ru ka dpal tshul 'di lnga// bza' dang bsrung la brten pa dang // skye bo mang po'i sdig pa ni// bsags pas rnam par 'jig
399a2(rgyud 'grel): byed pa// dpa' bo 'khor lo sdom pa yi// sdom pa so sor bsrung bar bgyi// slob mas gsol ba'o// de nas 'dir ni dpa' bo ches// sngon du spyod pa byas nas ni// nga ni sems can bsgral bya zhing // dga' ba'i sems ni
399a3(rgyud 'grel): sngon du bya// 'khor lo bde mchog dpal rnal 'byor// rgyud kyi cho gas lha rnams ni// mnyes byas dkyil 'khor bri bya zhing // sa yang yongs su brtag par bar bya// ri dang nags dang sman ljongs dang // rgya mtsho chen
399a4(rgyud 'grel): bi'i 'gram dang ni// sngon nas grub pa'i dur khrod dang // yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs dang // gang yang sems ni 'jug pa dang // mdzes shing yid ni dga' ba ru/ chu dang ba lang lci bas byugs// me tog sna tshogs rnam par
399a5(rgyud 'grel): dgram// dbugs dbyung mchog dang bAr ma dang // dr-i ni chu dang bcas par byugs// de la sogs pa mnye ba dang // kun tu rgya cher brdung ba dang / shar dang byang du gzhozhal bas ni// sngags pa rnams ni dngos grub 'grub/
399a6(rgyud 'grel): dbus su mtho bas rgyal srid dam// rig pa 'dzin pa'i gnas ngag thob// byang du mtho bas 'chi 'gyur zhing // nor rnams rab tu 'jig par byang // ji skad bshang pas shar mtho bas// rigs rnams rab tu bzang bar byed //
399b1(rgyud 'grel): dbus su dma' ba'i rang bzhin gang // sgrub pa po ni 'joms dang ldan// de ltar mtshan nyid bcas pa yis// dpa' bo'i dbang po sogs pas mtshan// sa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o// // de ltar sbyangs pa byas
399b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pa'i// sa yi dbus su 'dug nas su// mdzes dkar ma mo zhes bya ni// bskul bas 'di yis gsol ba gdab// dang por sgra la sogs sngon gyis// rnal 'byor dmigs pa thams cad du// dpal ldan khrag
399b3(rgyud 'grel): 'thung rnal 'byor che// gnyis med ye shes la legs gnas// sa la reg pa'i phyag rgya dang // mi shIgs thig ler byas pa yis// ser mos lan gsum bsnun pa ni// bkug gnas mdun du 'dug par bsam// yan
399b4(rgyud 'grel): lag rgyan rnams thams cad dang // kha dog ser po legs par mdzes// lag na bum po thogs nas ni// bdag gi so ci bgyi bka' stsol smra// mchod yan rkang pa dkrug sogs byin la// gzi brjid can de 'di ltar bya//
399b5(rgyud 'grel): skyob po sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyi// sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa la// lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur// shAkya seng gis skyob pa yis// ji ltar bdud ni sde bcom pa// de bzhin bdag gis/
399b6(rgyud 'grel): bdud sde las// rgyal bar byas nas dkyil 'khor bri// de skad lan gsum brjod nas ni// der ni thim par rnam par bsam// sa bslang ba'o// mgul rgyan gdu bu rna rgyan dang // spyi bor nor bus rnam par brgyan// mchod
400a1(rgyud 'grel): phyir thogs rgya thal ba yi// rgya yis yan lag kun nas brgyan// dpal ldan khrag 'thung rnal 'byor che// sgom nas bgegs rnams bsal bar bya// de nas rkang pa gnyis su yi ge hUM
400a2(rgyud 'grel): las 'bar ba'i rdo rje bsam la// mig ginyis su ma dang Ta las zla ba dang // nyi ma bsam te/ rdo rje lta bas thams cad du bltos la// lag pa g.yon pas dril bu gzungs zhi // g.yas kyis rdo rje gsor ba la 'bad//
400a3(rgyud 'grel): khA T+wAM ga la legs par byung nas nga ni gnas pa 'das bskrab par bya'o// sa phyogs 'dir sems can gyi don rtsom gyi lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / srin po dang /
400a4(rgyud 'grel): smin mo la sogs pa gang dag gnas pa'i sa'i bdag po myur du song shig/ 'di ltar dpal he ru ka'i bka' nos la/ myur ba nyid du song shig/ gang dag mi 'gro ba nga la da'i ye shes kyi rdo rje dang / kha T+wAM 'dis
400a5(rgyud 'grel): spyi bo nas rnam pa brgyar dgas par bya'o zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o// dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te g.yas nas lan gsum du bskor bar bya'o// bskal pa'i me lta bu'i 'od zur rkang pa'i 'og nas
400a6(rgyud 'grel): b+hung nas gdug pa rnams bsregs por gyur nas phan tshun byer bar gyur par bsam mo// gauyas dang g.yon du bskor ba dang // 'khyud dang ku tsa pa yi ngo // ba ra ti dang swa ti ka/ br-ing nge ke shig kya la sogs//
400b1(rgyud 'grel): chags bcas tshul gyis sbyor bas ni// rol pa rab tu bya ba dang // rol pa'i goms stabs bcas pa'am/ gom pa brgyad par gar bya'o// rkang pa bskyod dang lag pa bskyod// sman ma 'degs dang rab dgas 'brang // cung zad
400b2(rgyud 'grel): ngo tsha'i mig zur dang // parla rgyas lta na sdug pa dang // myig yangs gar ni byed 'gyur zhing // kha yi pad+ma 'dzum dang bcas// cung zod dman pa'i mtsho ba 'chang // kun da ltar kar so yi phreng // dpal ldan khrig 'thung rnal
400b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor che// sems can sgrol la rmad du byung // de la sogs pa gar gyis ni// bgegs la sogs pa bskrad par bya// zhal bzhi la sogs sngags kyis ni// phur bu ra ba dra ba bya// tha ma pa dbyangs yo ga las byung ba
400b4(rgyud 'grel): yi/ sna tshogs rdo rje'i rang bzhin las// yi ge bdun gyis sngags kyis ni// rdo rje'i lta bas ltas nas ni// dkyil 'khor gyi ni sa yi cha// nyes dang ldan yang rig par 'gyur// bgegs bsal ba'o// /
400b5(rgyud 'grel): nA da sogs pa'i gzugs las byung // ri lnga sogs pa ji bzhin bsam// in+d+ra nI l+ya'i sa ga'i la// 'khor lo gsum gyi bdag nyid bsam// sna tshogs pad+ma 'jam pa la// ji bzhin gnas su rnam par
400b6(rgyud 'grel): bsam// A li kA l-i la sogs las// dkyil 'khor du ni rnam par rtag/ de la gtso bo'i gan su ni// dpal ldan khrag 'thung shes rab kyi// pho brang mchog dpa' rnal 'byor ma// yan lag gnyis ming 'dus
401a1(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa// gnyis su med par ji bzhin bsam// rang bzhin mi gnas ye shes 'khor ma ni// dam tshig 'khor lo 'di yi gzhug par bya// rkang pa gnon cing gyen du bltas nas ni//
401a2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i sgra ni bsgrag par bya// phyogs bcur gnas pa'i dpa' bo dang // rnal 'byor ma ni dgug pa ste// dang por go cha ji bzhin pas// legs pa nyid du bsrung bar bya// mdzub gnyis mdud cing gung mo gnyis/
401a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyar te mthe bo rdo rje ni// brtan par sbyar la dpral ba yi// dbus su legs par bzhog par bya// phyag rgya ma ma tshogs bskul nas// bskor zhing bskor zhing nges gzhug par// dam tshig 'khor lo bsam par bya/
401a4(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro kun dang gnas bdag no// yid kyi mkha' bsam yid bzhug bsam// sa yi 'jig rten dag phyogs gzhug/ sa 'og lus ni kun la sbyar// rang mdog phyag tshogs yan lag 'khyud pa dang /
401a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad mchod cing phyogasu ma mo rnams// mtsham su brgyad po rnams dang sa yi ni// bdag po rnams kyang logs par bsam par bya// ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs pa'o// / rang gi ming
401a6(rgyud 'grel): brjod gsang sngags rgyal// dang por oM dang hUM gnyis ldan// phaT dang yang dag sbyar ba ni// lha rnams ma lus pa yi yin// bar ma dbugs phyung mchog dri chu// mchod par rtag tu brtson pa dang // cho ga'i rjes
401b1(rgyud 'grel): mthun thams cad mchod// dpal ldan khrag 'thung sogs bsam pa// rang gnas dbus kyi phyogs su ni// yongs su bskor cing bshad pa yi// gsang sngags ji bzhin rim dang po// g.yon nas bskor zhing rang
401b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang // thA dang phyi yi me tog sogs// dpal ldan khrag 'thung rjes mthun 'gro/ ma lus lhag par gnas bya zhing // gsang sngags rgyal po sngon 'gro bas// phyogs kunA ma lus khyab pa dang // ku tse gnyis
401b3(rgyud 'grel): ni 'khyud pa yis// dpal ldan khrag 'thung sogs sum bcu// rtswa bdun rnam bsams tshogs mchod// gnyis med ye shes las byung ba// khyab bdag dngos kun bdag nyid can// ston pa'i gtso bo khrag
401b4(rgyud 'grel): 'thung dpal// phag mo lhan cig yang dag ldan// gang du phyogs bcu'i dpa' bo dang // rig pa'i lha mo rdzu 'phrul can// byang chub sems dpa' la sogs kun// ma lus bdag la dgongs su gsol// dri zhim me tog
401b5(rgyud 'grel): 'phreng ba dang // thod pa der ni lnga pa ste// dpel lhun khrag 'thung sogs kun la// bdud spos legs par 'bul bar bya// de 'og rang gi dbugs dbyung bsam// tshogs brtul zhugs can zhugs par bya// sku
401b6(rgyud 'grel): la gsol ba gdab pa'o// / slob ma'o gtso bo la sogs pa// lhag par gnas bya mchod par bya// bu tshur theg pa chen po la// khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te// gsang sngags spyod pa'i cho ga 'di
402a1(rgyud 'grel): khyod la yang dag bshad par bya// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang // de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang // da ltar 'byung ba rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'gro la phan phyir bzhugs
402a2(rgyud 'grel): pa kun// de dag kun gyi gsang sngags kyi// cho ga bzang po 'di mkhyen nas// dpa' bo byang chub shing drung du// thams cad mkhyen pa mtshan med brnyes// gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de// skyob pa dpal
402a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan he ru kas// bdud ste shin tu mi bzad pas// dpu chen dag kyang de'i btsem// de bos kun mkhyen thob pa'i phyir// bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig/ dpa' bo yan lag las byung ba'o// sdom pa la sogs
402a4(rgyud 'grel): slob ma lA/ byang chub thob pa'i don gyi phyir// cho ga thams cad sbyin par bya// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// rtag par bdag ni skyabs su mchi// rnal 'byor gsang sogs mkha' 'gro ma// 'khor lo
402a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi bdag nyid can// kun la rtag tu skyabs su mchi// dpe' bo dpa' mo'i dbang lha mo// byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid che// khyad par du yang slob dpon la// rtag par bdag ni skyabasu mchi// dpal
402a6(rgyud 'grel): chen khrag 'thung sogs pa'o// rnal 'byor mo dang snang mdzad sogs// byang chub sems dpa' dpag med la// thams cad bdag la dgongasu gsol// che ge dus 'di nas bzung ste// ji srid gnyis med la gnas
402b1(rgyud 'grel): bar/ de yi tshangs spyong gnyis med pa// nyi shu rtsa gnyis legs par bsrung // rang gi srog ta nI yi rgyun// yi ge bdun gyi mngon bsngags pas// slob ma la ni bsrung ba'i phyir// thigs pa kun tu dag par bya//
402b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyis ni// kha nas thams cad dbang bskur ro// dkyil 'khor gyis ni sa ya che// gnyis med ye shes ye shes las byung mchog/ dpal chen kun gyi rang lha mo// mchod pa'i cho ga
402b3(rgyud 'grel): rjes su sbyang // phyi nang bdag nyid can gyis kyang // dpal chen khrag 'thung 'khor lo mchod// slob ma lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o// shes rab can gyis nad par sngar// thig gdab gnyis med ye shes
402b4(rgyud 'grel): las// byung ba'i dkyil 'khor kun bri'o// slob dpon mtshan nyid bzang dang ldan// yang dag ye shes de nyid shes// dpal ldan khrag 'thung gsang sngags shes// khro med gtsang lnga mkhas pa dang / sbyor
402b5(rgyud 'grel): shes ye shes pha rol 'gro/ thod pa la sogs spyi bor bcings// yan lag thams cad rnam par byugs// lus la phyag rgya drug la sogs// kha T+wAM ga ni lag na thogs// brgya phyed pa'i phreng bas brgyan
402b6(rgyud 'grel): he ru ka'i rang byas te// 'khor lo la bltas snying gor dgod// de ltar bdag nyid go bgos shing // sngags dang phyag rgyas brgyun nas ni// dngos grub chen por brtsol ba yi// dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bar bya
403a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas ro yi srad bu la// mad+hA ra tI ras brlan pas// dpal ldan khrag 'thung dkyil 'khor bris// grong khyer dam pa'i thig gdab po// khru gang ba la sogs pa bri// ji srid bcu gnyis
403a2(rgyud 'grel): bcu drug par// rnal 'byor dbang phyug dbang phyug che// shes rab can gyi thig gdab bo// ji bzhin srad bu wA ru ni// rnam par phye ste btsos nas// dpal ldan khrag 'thud la sogs pa// spyan drangs gnas ni de ru
403a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'gro mo// rtsa ba'i sngags dang gnyis med de// pad+ma'i snod du legs bzhag ste// rang byung me tog dag gis mchong // ye shes thig ni bskyed nas su// mkhas pas thig ni gdab
403a4(rgyud 'grel): par bya// sngon chad cho ga mthong gyur pas// ye shes thig ni gdab par bya// bla mas khu tshur gyis bzung zhing // gcig gi mtha' ru slob ma yis// dbugs 'byin 'gro bar bas na su// thig gnyis dag ni legs
403a5(rgyud 'grel): par bsgril// gnyis med gnyis su med sngags kyis// bsgril nas de ni thog gdab bya// b+h+rUMb+h+rU~M zhes pas legs btang zhing // blo ldan brgyab nas 'gro bar bya// dang por lho dang shar yi ni// sgo dbus ji bzhin gnas nas
403a6(rgyud 'grel): lho ru mngon par phyogs nas kyang // nam mkhar de bzhin thog gdab bo// yon pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis// lte ba'i phyogs su bzung na su/ shar dus bltas nas dpa' bo yis// sa la tshangs pa'i thig gnyis gdab/
403b1(rgyud 'grel): thig skung dag ni 'degs pa yi// 'jig rten khams ni ma lus pa'i// sangs rgyas la sogs 'gro don gyis// khyod ni don dus yin zhes bskul// slob dpon nyid dang grogs kyis ni// g.yon nas bskor ba shAn
403b2(rgyud 'grel): tu brtsom// rlung dang dbang ldan phyogs nas nang // me dang bden bral phyogs nas te/ bla mas mtsham su thig gnyis ni// mi yi phyogs nas brtsams te gdab// byang du mngon par bltas nas ni// me yi
403b3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su thig gdab po// nub phyogs su ni kha bltas la// bden bral du ni srang bus bri// rlung gi phyogs su gnas pa dang // lho phyogs su ni bltas pa yi// nub kyi thog ni gang yin pa// brtul zhugs can gyis
403b4(rgyud 'grel): tsho gas gang bya// dpa' bos shar du bltas nas ni// byang gi thig ni gdab par bya// phyogs la sogs pa dbye shes nas// kun nas thig ni thams cad kyang // man ngag ji ltar thob pa las// b+h+r-i ldan ji bzhin
403b5(rgyud 'grel): thog gradab po// zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgya no// drA baM dra phyed 'phyang bas mdzes// g.yer go'i phreng ba'i dra bu tsAn// mtshams kyi cha ni thams cad dang // sgo khyud kyi ni nang rnamasu/
403b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rin chen gyis spras pa// phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab po// de yi nang du pad+ma ni// pad+ma'i rgyab du 'khor lo bya// 'khor lo gnyis pa de yi rgyun// rdo rje phreng bas bskor bar bya// rdo rje 'khor lo cha mnya
404a1(rgyud 'grel): par// rdo rje'i thig gis bskyor bar bya// ge sAr dang ni 'dab mar bcas// 'dab ma bcu drug dag tu gnas// man ngag dag ni thob pa las// dkyil 'khor thig gdab kun shes na/
404a2(rgyud 'grel): sgo ni 'khor lo'i brgyad cha ste// khyams ni de yi phyed du bya// sgo khyud dag ni sgo yi tshad// lha yi snam bu'i tshad de bzhin// mtshams kyi thog nas bskor ba dag/ rta babs kyi ni gnas su bshad// ba dan dril
404a3(rgyud 'grel): bu'i 'o zer gyis// brgyan par thams cad thig gdab bo// lcags ris mthar thugs pa yi bId+ma// rdo rje'i phreng bas mngon bskor zhing // 'od kyi dkyil 'khor nang du ni// rim gnyis thig ni gdab par bya//
404a4(rgyud 'grel): chen gyis ni de yi phyed// rtsa ba'i thig ni gdub par bya// dang por rdor rgyas thig sogs pas// thig rnams thams cad nges par bya// de'i steng du ye shes thig/ kun nos yongasu brkyang bar bya// ye shes thig
404a5(rgyud 'grel): gdab po// dur khrod rus pa'i phye ma dang // de yi so phig yang dag ldan// de yi shing gi 'dab ma ni// rnal 'byor pas de'i tshon du sgyur// de yi sol ba'i phye ma dang // bA bla dag dang de bsres te// kha dog lnga
404a6(rgyud 'grel): dang yang dag ldan// lnga po lnga ni sprul par bya// dur khrod sa gnas thams cad ni// dbang phyug chen po'o rgya 'di yos// ye shes thog ni ji bzhin du// brtul zhugs can gyis tshon bskyed bya// sems dag na
404b1(rgyud 'grel): bar mongs nas nA~M// zlu hU~M legs pa byas nas su/ rgyud kyi yan lags lus pa'i// las ky-i dkyil 'a khyir dag du brtsam// 'di na tshos dbyings dgrubA ste// sems can khams ni sgrol byeng ba// dpal ldan
404b2(rgyud 'grel): khrug 'thung rgyal po nyid// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi spyi gnas// skyes pa kun las rnam par grol// tshon gyi las ni yang dag bArnam// slob dpon gyi ni dang por dgye// phyi nas kun tu skyob mas so// gnas
404b3(rgyud 'grel): stsogs par brtsams nas ni// ri mo l+yA la rgyabA tu'o// tshon dang bzo yi las byed pa// dam tshig dang ni slab pa sbyin// mthe chung gi ni sor gyi dpangs// drang la mtho bar yang dog bri// gal te ri mo mi mnyam pa'am/
404b4(rgyud 'grel): yo zhing dma' dang chad pas kyang // ri mo dma' bas mi 'grub cing // yon po sra gdung ba bskyed byed la// chad pas slob dpon slob mA brtag/ gnyis ka'i tsha bar shes par bya// de bsdu mtshan ldan ri mo nau// mtshan
404b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid kun gyis mtshan bar bya// slob ma la stsogs 'dir zhugs nas// dri yi chus ni rab gong pos// lus kun dbang ni bskur bya zhing // glanod mdzes sngags kyi rig pas thung // yig bdun rnal 'byor bdag nyi
404b6(rgyud 'grel): can// skye ba bdun sogs bag pa can// slob ma tshogs dkrus pas ni// sems ni shel dang 'dra bar 'gyur// nang gi pad+mo'i 'dab ma ni// gser la sogs pa'i phye mas so// pad+ma'i rgyab kyi 'khor lo ni// rtsis
405a1(rgyud 'grel): brgyad pa yang de dang mnyam// dza ka ba'i rlobs la no// rdo rje'i thig gis bskur ba bya// mthing shun la sogs mdog gis ni// thugs kyi 'khor lo rab tu grags// de bzhin 'khor lo'i
405a2(rgyud 'grel): rtsibs dag kyang // pad+ma'i ka bar yang drug ldan// pad+ma'i thig gis bskor ba ni// gsung gri 'khor lo zhes sprul pa// b+hu ru la sogs mdog 'dra yi// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i las bya'o// sku'i 'khor lo rnam bgos la//
405a3(rgyud 'grel): rtsibs brgyad snga ma de dang 'dra// de bzhin 'khor lo'i ka ba dang // 'khor lo'i thig gis dbye bar bya// mu tig la sogs phye ma yis// sa yi 'khor lo bri bar bya// ji ltar pad+ma la sogs cha// sgo'i cha yi kha dog ste/
405a4(rgyud 'grel): rI mo lnga sogs kha dog mdzes// ji ltar mdzes pa rab tu bstan// tshon dgye ba'o// / de ltar sna tshogs bris pa yis// gzhal yas khang mchog lha yi gnas// cho ga mthong bas dang por ni// ji
405a5(rgyud 'grel): srid bshad bzhin rdzogs par bya// tshogs rnams kun gyis rab brgyan cing // bde ba thams cad rab ster ba'o// dpal ldan khrag 'thung la sogs ni// 'khor lo gsum bdag nyid can sbrul// mkha' spyod sna spyod ces
405a6(rgyud 'grel): byA dang // sa 'og la sogs mi 'am ci// khwa gdong la sogs brgyad po ni// rang gi stan la bzhugs par dgong // re yaM rtse mor ge ser dang // sna tshogs pad+mar A l-i dang // kA li uSh+ma Na'i bzhi po// thig le sgra
405b1(rgyud 'grel): las yang dag 'byung // ho ru ka dpal rgyal po che// shes rab yan lag gnyis mod 'du// zhal bzhi zhal re spyan gsum pa// mgo dang dum bus rnam par brgyan// ljang dang dmar dang de bzhin ser// phyag ni bcu
405b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis yang dag ldan// g.yas brkyang ba yi rnam par bzhugs// ral pa'i thor tshugs ngar dbyangs dang // phyag gnyis dag gis 'khyud par mdzad// gzhan gnyis glang chen lpags pa te// dgra sta rtse gsum gri
405b3(rgyud 'grel): gug dang // Da ma ru ni phyag g.yas na// kha ts+tsha gA dang de bzhin du// thong pa khrag gis bkang ba dang // phyag na zhags pa drag dang mgo/ bdud ni bzhi las rnam rgyal ba// phyag g.yon dag na bsnams par mdzad/
405b4(rgyud 'grel): yi dgas chen po kun khyab bo// pang na gnas pa'i phag mo ni// phyag gis 'khyud par mdzad pa las// gdug pa bdud kyi khrag 'chang zhing // zhal nas khrag gis rgyun mdzag pa// khrag chen gyis byugs sku yan
405b5(rgyud 'grel): lag/ chags dang bcas shing skra grol ba// thod pa'i phreng bas bcings pa yin// ha he zhes bzhad spyan gsum sku// dum bu dang ni thod pas brgyan// g.yas na sdigs mdzub rdo rje ste// bdud sogs kun la sngags
405b6(rgyud 'grel): bar mdzad// mkha' 'gro ma ni mA ma kI/ mdun gyi 'dab ma gnon par bzhugs// phyag bzhi sgra ni grol ba la// rtsi mo lnga yis rnam brgyan pa// phyag phya lnga sogs sku la mnga'// spyan gsum khro bo hUM mdzad cing // skra
406a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyanamadzurmAN+Da la 'dzegs pa che// hA rbA nus ni 'jigs par mdzad// rnang ba rdung ba ste// dbus grol zhing 'jigs pa mdzad// kha n+ta ga brtan thong ba bsdums// rnal 'gyur
406a2(rgyud 'grel): mtshon cha Da ma ru g.yas// phyag bzhi pas ni rnam par brgyan// g.yon nas bskor ba'i pad+ma la// lA ma zhes bya sgrol mdzad ma'o// sku mdog ljang gu 'jigs pa che// ha hA zhes bzhang gtsigs pa po// rtse bran
406a3(rgyud 'grel): lngas ni brgyan pa ste// dbu skra grol zhing 'jigs mdzad pa// spyan gsum pa la hUM mdzad cing // kha T+wA~M ga brten thod pa bsnams// rnal 'byor mtshon dang Da ma ru// phyag bzhi pas ni rnam par brgyan// khaN+Da ro nau/
406a4(rgyud 'grel): gos dkar mo// byang gi 'dab ma gnon byas bzhugs// sku modog dmar mo shas cher 'bar// phyag bzhi 'jigs pa'i hUM mdzad pa// dbu skra grol zhing 'bar ba lo// rtse bran lngas ni rnam par brgyan// rnal
406a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byor snod dang kha T+wA~M gra/ rnal 'byor mtshon dang De ma ru// phyag rgya lngas ni brgyan pa dang // spyan gsum 'og lhag dag gis brgya nA// nub kyi 'dab mar gzugs can ma// sku mdog ser zhing cher 'bar ba//
406a6(rgyud 'grel): hoho zhes bzhad 'jigs par mdzad// skra grol kha T+wAM ga dang bca so// phyag poni dag gis rnam par brgyan// spyan gsum hUM gis 'jigs par mdzad// rtse bran lngas ni rnam par brgyan// phyag rgya lnga
406b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs sku la mnga'// rnal 'byor mtshon pa snod rnams la'o// chu dang me dang rlung dang nI// sa yi khams bdag nyid yin no// sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor ma bzhi po// phyi dang nang na yang dag bzhugs// mtshams kyi ma
406b2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma la// ma dang de bzhin pha dag dang // rgyal po dang ni rgyal rigs gnyis// mgo bo'i snod ni mchod byed pa// gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor ma// pu la sogs pas yang dgra drangs// bkug ste 'khor
406b3(rgyud 'grel): lo'i nang du bzhugs// rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu mchod// de la bu skyes rnal 'byor mi'i// 'khor lo'i gnas ni bshad bya ste// pu shes bya ba ni pul+li ra ma la ya ste// thod po'i dum bu can dang // rab
406b4(rgyud 'grel): gtum ma'o// dza zhes bya ba nI dzI lan+d+ha ra ste/ keng rus chen po dang / ga tu mau mig ma'o// o zhes bya ba ni u n+yan tre/ keng rus tsan dang / 'od ldan ma'o// a zhes bya ba ni arbu ta ste/ mche ba rnam par gcig
406b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / sma chen+da ma'o// dau dag ni gnaso// go zhes bya ba ni go dA byA rI ste/ lha dgra dang / brtan pa'i blo tsanA ma'o// rA zhes bya ba ni rA me shwa rI ste/ 'od dpag med dang / mau'u thung ma'o// de zhes bya ba ni de bi ko Ti ste/ dza
406b6(rgyud 'grel): rje 'od dang l-i ka'i dbang phyug ma'o// mA zhes bya ba ni mA la ba ste/ rdo rje'i sku dang / shing grub ma'o// de dag ni nye ba'i gnas yin la/ thugs kyi 'khor lo ste/ nam mkha' la rgyu ba yin no// /
407a1(rgyud 'grel): kA zhes bya ni kA ma ra pA ste/ myu gu can dang / sa srungs ma'o// oM zhes bya ba ni o Ta ste/ rdo rje ralnga pa can dang / 'jigs byed chen mo'o// de dag ni zhing ngo // tra~M zhes bya ba ni tr-i sha kun
407a2(rgyud 'grel): ste/ dpa' bo chen po dang / rlung gi shugs can ma'o// ko zhes bya ba ni ko sa lA ste/ rdo rje hUM mdzad dang // chad 'thung ma'o// de dag ni ny+tsa bi'i zhing ngo // ka zhes bya ba ni ka ling+tha ste/ rab tu bzang po dang / mdog
407a3(rgyud 'grel): ljang ma'o// la zhes bya ba ni l-i pA kA ste/ rdo rje bzang po dang / shin tu bzang mo'o// de dag na tshin+to ha'o// ka zhes bya ba ni kany+dzi ste/ 'jigs byed chen po dang / rta rna ma'o// hi zhes bya ba nI hi mA lA ya te/ mig
407a4(rgyud 'grel): mi bzang dang bya gdong ma'o// de dag ni u pa tshan+do ha yin pas gsung gi 'khor lo ste/ sa la rgyu byi yin no// pra zhes bya ba pre ta pu ri ste/ stobs po che dang / 'khor lo'i shug can ma'o// gr-i zhes bya ba ni gra
407a5(rgyud 'grel): hu ba ste/ rin chen rdo rje dang / dum skyes ma'o// dI dag ni 'dus pa zhes bya'o// sau zhes bya ba sau rASh+Ta ste/ rta mgrin dang / shoN+Di nAM'o// su zhes bya ba ni su war+N+Na dwI pa ste/ na mkha' snying po dang / 'khor lo
407a6(rgyud 'grel): go cha ma'o// de dag ni nye ba'i 'dus po can no// na zhes bya ba ni na gar ste/ dpal he ru ka dong / shin tu dpa' mo'o// sa zhes bya ba ni sin+d+hu s+t+waM/ pad+mo gar gyi dbang phyug dang / stobs chen mo'o// de dag ni dur khrod
407b1(rgyud 'grel): ma zhes bya ba ni ma ru dwe shA ste/ rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'khor lo sgyur ma'o// ku zhes bya bA nAM ku lu ta ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen mo'o// de dag ni nye ba'i dur khrod ngo // sku'i 'khor lo s+thA
407b2(rgyud 'grel): sa 'og ni gnas pa yin no// sgo rnams ni khwa gdong ma dang // 'ug gdong can ma dang / khyi'i gdong can ma dang / phag gdong can ma'o// mtshams rnams su no gshin rje brtan ma dang / gshin rje'i
407b3(rgyud 'grel): pho nya mo dang / gshin rje mche ba ma dang // gshin rje 'joms ma'o// grub pa'i dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma// phyogs kun tu ni rnam par gnas// pha rol phyin bcu dag pa ste// sa bcu la ni rnam par bzhugs/
407b4(rgyud 'grel): he ru ka dpal rgyal po che// phyi dang nang du yang dag bzhugs// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ byang chub sems dpa' du ma'o// dkyil 'khor du lha dgod pa'o// / mkha'
407b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ma la sogs pa dang / sgo srungs brgyad po gtogs pa// 'khor lo gsum la thod pa'i dum bu l-i sogs pa rnams ni phyag gnyis pa/ zhal gcig pa/ ral ba'i thor tshugs dang ngar gyis
407b6(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa/ phyag rgya lce dang spyi gtsug gi nor bu dang ldan pa 'og lhag gis brgyan po/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag gnyis kyis 'khyud pas/ rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa/ lha mo la gzigs shing sgros
408a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'o// rab tu gtum ma la sogs par lha mo rnams ni/ rang gi bdag pa'i sku mchog dang ldan pa/ zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa ste/ dbu skra grol bas rnam brgyan pa// thod pa
408a2(rgyud 'grel): dang nI 'khyud pa dang // gri gug dang ni sdigs mdzub can// spyan gsum hUM gis 'dzegs par byed// rtse bran dum bus rnam par bergyan// mkha' 'gro mo sogs thams cad kyang // g.yon nas skor ba sngon 'gro ba// rgyu
408a3(rgyud 'grel): dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsum// 'gro kun g.yon nas 'byung ba yin// dkAr myin+ya dkar dang dmar po ni// tha ma mchog dang bar mA ste// thams cad ji bzhin dgod pa ni// bla mi'i rim gyis drin yin no// khA la
408a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa brgyad po ni// mkha' 'gro la sogs dbye ba yosi// zhabs kyis rol gnon pa dang // sna tshogs gzugs can bzhi po yin// thams cad khro bo rnam rgyal sogs// rnal 'byor ma brgyad pa sprul ba yin//
408a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje mtshan pa'i kha T+wAM ga/ pad+ma'i snod ni lnga can te// g.yas pas mtshon cha 'phyar ba ni// gdug pa thams cad nges gnon pa'o// dpal ldan he ru ka sogs kun// g.yon gyis 'khyud cing nu ma 'dzin// lha rnams kyi
408a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag dang // sku mdog dang / phyag mtshan to// byang chub kyi yan lag sum cu rtsa bdun du byas pa'o// / nA nga'i gzugs sogs sngon du 'gro ba dang // gos dang / phyag rgya lnga la sogs pa da
408b1(rgyud 'grel): rab kyi yan lag dang / phur bu dang / dru ba dang / A la~M kA l-i zhes brjod nas// rgyu sogs rtog pa sngon 'gro ba// 'jug pa sgra la sogs pas nas// ji srid bsdus pa'i rim gyis s+ho// 'dud pa yis te de bzhin
408b2(rgyud 'grel): du shes rab yan lag bstan gyi ste// mgul rgyun gtsug tor dbu rgyan da // rna rgyan tshangs po'i sred bu dang // mgul bar rgyan bcings mgo bor+ya phreng // sku rags dang ni sil khrol sgra// ral bco
408b3(rgyud 'grel): pan dar dang ni// bcos ma'i sgra yis rnam par brgyan// rdo rje pad+ma kha T+wAM bcas// rde'u chung sgra dang hUM sgrogs shing // dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma'i// go cha gsum gyis brgyan pa yin// ru ka dpal dpa' ba
408b4(rgyud 'grel): che rang gi bdag nyid gcig tu byas// sems can kun la rjes brtse ba'i// blo ldan bum pa mngon par bzlas// bum pa mchog ni bcu drug tu// de nyid kyi ni mtshan nyid gsungs// chu ni 'o mar yang dag bsre// chu
408b5(rgyud 'grel): chen chu chung bum pa dag/ dri dang me tog sna tshogs pas// dbugs dbyung mchog deng bar ma yis// dri yi chus ni yang dag byug/ khyo ni 'dab mas yang ngagra brgyan// sangs rgyas kun gyis mkha' 'gro ma// cho ga
408b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du mngon par bzlas// mgul pa gis kyis rnam dkris shing // rgyan ni mdzes pas rnam par brgyan// me tog phreng gis kun bskor ba// brgyad po dag ni glo ru dgang // bum pa dgu pa dbu su'o// ma dang de bzhin
409a1(rgyud 'grel): pa dag dang // rgyal po rgyal rigs gnyis kyi ni// bum pa chus ni rab tu dgang // kha dog lnga pa'i gos kyis ni// brgyan cing mgul ba dkri bar bya// sna tshogs 'dab mas kha dgab cing //
409a2(rgyud 'grel): rang byung me tog dag gis mchod// lho i sgo yi log su nI// ri mo'i dbus su bzhag par bya// bla bri dag ni bre bya zhing // sna tshogs pa yi gos kyang bri// rgyal mtshan gdugs sogs dar rnams kyis// gnas
409a3(rgyud 'grel): dang gnas su rnam par brgyan// bum pa bzhag nas mchod pa ni// ji skad bshad pa bzhin du bya// rin chen gser gyis mdzes par ni// dkyil 'khor kun tu gtor bar bya// spos snod dag ni brgyad po dang //
409a4(rgyud 'grel): mer me'i sdong bu de mnyam bya// til mar chen po rab sbar la// spos ni lnga po sngon 'gro ba'o// sna tshogs me tog 'phyang ba dang // sna tshogs chang dang khu ba dang // rol mo dag gis rab bkang zhing // sna tshog
409a5(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor me spang na// dri bzang mi tog sna tshogs ldan// sna tshogs bya yi glu len cing // sna tshigs gar gyi gar bzung byed// bik+ku shis sgra ni sna tshogs pa'o// dga' ston shri hUM ru ka yi// spyod pa dang ni
409a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'i gnas// 'dod pa rnal 'byor ma yi laM// sgo bzhi dag tu rnal 'byor ma// dpa' bo gnyis med dag gis mtshan// tshon chen la sogs gos dag gam// dar la sogs pa dag gis brgyan// phyag rgya lnga
409b1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i lus// rtse bran lngas ni rnam par brgyan// rdo rje dril bu yang dag 'khyud// sgo brgyad dag tu khA sbyor ro// tshogs kyi gtso bo bdag po kun// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rnal 'byor yin// sngar bshad rgyan gyis
409b2(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa dang // stan dang gnas ni rnam mdzes par// dpal ldan rdo rje dril bu 'phyang // 'khyud cing nu ma 'chir ba dang // steng gi mgo bo spyi gtsug dang // mig sog sa gos ches rnam par brgya ni// rdo rje sems sogs
409b3(rgyud 'grel): byin brlabs la// rnal 'byor chen po gnyis med gnas// byang chub yan lag sum cu bdun// byas shing go bgos mnyam par bzhag/ de ltar go bgos bdag nyid ni// sum cu gsum pas kyang mi shig/ dkyil
409b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi lha mo dang dpu mo rnams la mchod pa'o// rang nyid ji ltar grub par ni// yuM shes 'khor lo rnam par bsgom// bdag nyid kha sbyar byas pa yis// dam tshig la ni gzhug par bya// dang por spyan drangs
409b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya yis// gyen du pho gi sgra bsgrags la// mchog dang bar ma'i rnal 'byor ma// 'jig rten khams la sogs pas dgug/ rang nyid sku mdog phyag mtshan dbyibs// sngar bshad pa yi rgyan dang ldan// rang
409b6(rgyud 'grel): gr-i phyag mtshan rgyan bcas la// ral pa'i thor tshugs dge dang ldan// dam tshig 'khor lor zhugs nas ni// gnyis med ye shes bsgom par bya// he ru ka dpal la sogs kun// g.yas brkyang bas ni gdan la
410a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs// ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drang ba'o// / he ru ka dpal sogs 'khor lo'o// lha rnams phyi dang nang gis mchod// lha yi grangs bani b+h+rU~M wAn+d+ra bsdu// mdzes pa'inas
410a2(rgyud 'grel): kyang dbul bar bya// 'khor lo sgyur dang dpa' bo ni// rang 'byung me tog gis mchod cing // gdong ni dag par bkru bar bya// lho phyogs sgo nas dag pas so// gnyis med gnyis med sngags kyis ni// mngon par bzlas
410a3(rgyud 'grel): la byin gyis brlab// sangs rgyaces kun gyi mkha' 'gro mas// khyad par du ni mngon par bzlas// sgo srung kun gyi rnal 'byor mas// ji srid brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par// sngags pas lha yi grangs bzhin du// A li kA li
410a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes smra zhing // byin gyis brlabs lA mnyam par mchod// dkyil 'khor lha rnams mnyes par bya// dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab pa'o// / bya ba'i mchod pa'i khyad par ni// b+ha ra ti sa ti gi bri ste// ki shig
410a5(rgyud 'grel): kye dang a ra ba dI// gar rnams kun gyis gar bya'o// chags bcas mngon sbyor tshul gyis ni// rnam par 'phyar bso rnam rol cing // sgeg dang bcas pa'i gom stobs kyis// gom stabs brgyad kyi gar bya'o// byud do bya ba ku
410a6(rgyud 'grel): ni// 'gyud cing num bcing ba dang // dang po rnal 'byor ma mnyes bya// nang gi bdag nyid sbyin sreg gis// skye bo dam pa kun 'dus bya// he ru ka dpal rgyal po che// mje' ba thams cad yang dge 'dus// zhi ba'i tshul dngos grub
410b1(rgyud 'grel): ni/ dam bI'i gnas ni rtag pa 'grug/ rgyun chags la sogs thams cad dang // bza' ba zhim po sna tshogs dang // sha rlon dag gis khyad par du// sngags dang ldan pas sbyin sreg bya// oM sarba badz+rI k+Sha mi na~M b+hak+Shi sho d+ha
410b2(rgyud 'grel): yA gu h+ya badz+ra Ni hUM phaT swA hA// mngon par bsngags shing byin gyis brlab bya'o// lta ba yis ni sbyi ni sreg mas// pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dab brgyad pa// dpa' bo'i dbang sogs sum cu bdun// pad+ma'i lte ba gre sar la// dzaM/
410b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin las kyis rjes mthun par// lha yi bdag nyid dngos byas la// cho gas sbyin sdig kun byos na// brtag mi dgos par dngos grub 'gyur// bza' 'am yang na btung ba dag/ brtul zhugs can ni ci za ba// mchog
410b4(rgyud 'grel): dang bar ma'i dbugs dbyung ba// bsam pa thams cad rab tu brtag/ bdag nyid lha ni lho yi mchog/ bdag nyid lha ni lha dam pa// bdag gi gzugs la ma chags la// gzugs brnyan la sogs lta bur shes// bdag nyid
410b5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad dang // dpa' bo kun gyi gnas yin te// de las 'bad pa thams cad kyis// bdag nyid he ru ka dpal mchong // de ltar 'bad pa thams cad kyis// dge ba yongs su rgyas par 'gyur// las
410b6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs gang zhig bsams pa rnams// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// dpal 'khor las kyi nang gi sbyin sreg go/ drug cu pa sogs bzar bcas pa'i// zan dron sha dang nya sha dang / khar dang mchog gi lnga po yi//
411a1(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma 'bad de dbul bar bya// thod pa'i nang du legs bzhag ste// dang po phyag rgyas spyan drang ngo // gyen du pheM gi sgra sgrogs shing // mig dang gdong dang yan lag bsgyur// bkug cang bkug cing
411a2(rgyud 'grel): kun mchod la// dpa' bo rnal 'byor mas spyan drang // rdo rje thal mo spyi bor dbye// reg par gyur na 'byung bar 'gyur// dpa' bo rdo rje rnal 'byor ma// ji bzhin las la sbyar bar bya// mtshan mo skra grol gcer bu
411a3(rgyud 'grel): yis// brtul zhugs can gyis gtor ma sbyin// he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor bdag/ des ni rnal 'byor ma rnams mnyi ste// gtor ma'i cho ga'o// pha rol phyin pa'i rgya drug sogs// byang chub sum cu rtsa bdun nyid// gnas
411a4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa sa bcu dang // che mchog lha mo bdag nyid can// gdan du byas byi'i bdag nyid cano// dbang bskur ba nI dam pa'o// dag dang ma dag 'dres pa ste// sgrub pa po ni mngon sum gnas// mnyes byed rnam par dag pa
411a5(rgyud 'grel): dang // gsal byed yon tan ldan pa'i mi// de ltar phyi dang nang gi sbyin sreg bya// gtor ma'i bya ba dang // mchod pa'i bya ba'i lus ma lus par byas pa'i rnal 'byor pas slob ma ma lus pa'i tshogs kyi bdag po nyid mngon sum
411a6(rgyud 'grel): du byas la 'di skad ces brjed par bya'o// grong naso gong ma'i sdom pa ni// bu khyod kyis ni bsrung ba ste// grol po'i rgyu ni de las gzhan// thabs ni ci yang yod ma yin// gnyis med gnyis med rnal 'byor dag/ byang chub
411b1(rgyud 'grel): skyes rag yan lag sbrul// sa dang tsunan 'dug dang // rtul po nga ni rgyal rig sa gas// spyo pa de ni sngags bzhag pa// slab ma'i sdug pa 'jig byung ba'o// ba can khas na dbang bsgyu r+yag/ yag bdun ma mkhyenan/
411b2(rgyud 'grel): slob ma// khu tshur zhes ni brjod bya zhing // go cha che la sogs pas bsrung // rdo rje sems sogs pas go bskon// dar dpyangs dag kyang bcings par bya// sems can dman dang mchog dang ni// slob ma la sogs yid shes bya//
411b3(rgyud 'grel): dngas grub 'dod pas dngos kun gyis// dang por slob dpon mgu bar gyi// skyob ma yongasu brtag pa'o// // / de nas skyob ma sogs byu ba// lag bsdu lag pa gzung nas ni// b+h+rUM hwe ru kA yA bAd+d+hi sno
411b4(rgyud 'grel): yad+hI ma h+ye swA hUM/ zhes bya bas dpa' bo bskul bar bya'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku// slob dpon la ni sgrubasu mchi// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma 'khor lo// rnal 'byor gnas la bdag phyag 'tshal// slob mi'i gso
411b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// don dam smra ba'i seng ge rnal 'byor che zhes pa// nyon mongs gcod pa'i don lnga shin tu mkhas gyur po// sbrid pa'i nyes brgyu bskyed lnga nyon mongs gcod mdzad lho'i// rnal 'byor don dam rgyal po de nyid grub par mdzod/
411b6(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// he ru ka dpal grong khyer mchog/ snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni// bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bgyi// de nas lho phyogs kyi sgor mngon du phyogs par byas la// oM na ma ste hUM/ na mA
412a1(rgyud 'grel): mi hUM/ na mo na ma hUM swA hA/ zhes bya bas sku gsung thugs kyi sgo nas phyag bya ba sngon du 'gro bas lan gsum phyag byas la// aM sarba bI ra yo gi ni pU dzo pa s+thA nA ya At+ma nAM nir+ya ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta/
412a2(rgyud 'grel): bI ra yo gi ni At+ma naM badz+ra DA kI ni a d+hi tiSh+Tha sA mI zhes bya bas lus thams cad kyis phyag byad du gzhug go/ de nas g.yon phyogs su de snying gar thal mo sbyor du bcug la shar phyogs kyi sgo n+yas// oM sarba bI rA yo gi ni pU dzi a
412a3(rgyud 'grel): b+hi She ka At+ma na nAr+ye ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta b+ho rA yau gau ni a ta ma naM badz+ra lA mI rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsau tumAM/ de nas byang phyogs kyi sgor thal mo de nyid dpral bar bzhag la phya byad du bzhug ste/ oM sarba bA ri yo gaM ni pU dza pra brti na ya
412a4(rgyud 'grel): At+ma naM nir+ya tau yA mi/ sarba ta thA gA ta b+hi ra yau gi ni At+ma na badz+ra khaN+Da ro ha r+ya pra bir+t+ta ya mAM/ de nas nub phyogs kyi sgor thal mo de nyid mgor bzhag la phyag byed du gzhug ste/ oM sarba bI ra yo gi ni pU dz+ya karma ka ra Na ya At+ma nom
412a5(rgyud 'grel): ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta bI ra yau gi ni At+ma badz+ra rU pi Nar+ya karma kA ru mAM/ phyag bzhi'o// de nas lhor ni phyag byas te/ slob ma'i lag nas bzung na sA ni// bde mchog sdom pa'i cho ga bzhin// thams cad brjod de sbyin par bya// sangs
412a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu song // 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs 'ongs po'i// sdom pa brtan par gyur pa'o// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya ni// blo chen khyod kyis bzung bar bya// byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/
412b1(rgyud 'grel): shes rab dril bu zhes gragaso// slob dpon khyod kyis bzung bya ste// bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// 'di ni rdo rje rigs dag pa'i// dam tshig sdom pa yin par bshad// rIn+da chenA rigs la rtag tu ni// nyin re bzhin yang lan
412b2(rgyud 'grel): drug tu// chos dang zang zing mi 'jigs byams// sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin// phyi dang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum// dam pa'i chos kyang ma lus bzung / 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs dag pa'i// dam tshig yid du 'ong
412b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'os las kyi rigs mchog chen po la// sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni// yong dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi// mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bya// rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi ni// gang phyir rgyud las gsungs pa rnams//
412b4(rgyud 'grel): blo chen khyod kyis rtag tu ni// dngos grub phyir ni bsrung bar bya// dam tshig bsgrag pa'o// slob dpon 'dir ni bdag la gson// gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa/ de ltar bdag ni bgyid paro 'tsho la// ji ltar dus gsum mgon
412b5(rgyud 'grel): po rnams// byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i// byang chub sems ni bla med pa// dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la// sdom pa yi ni tshul khrims dang // dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang /
412b6(rgyud 'grel): sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum// bdag gis brtan por gzung bar bgyi// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum// de nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi// nam du yang ni mi
413a1(rgyud 'grel): btang ngo // rdo rje'i rigs mchog chen po la// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang // yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi// skyob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi// rin chen rigs mchog chen po yis// dam
413a2(rgyud 'grel): tshig yid du 'ong ba la// nyin re bzhin du dus drug du/ sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin// byang chub chen po las byung ba'o// pad+ma'i rigs mchog dag pa la// phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum// dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar
413a3(rgyud 'grel): bgyi// las kyi rigs mchog chen po la// sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni// yang bdag nyid du gzung bar bgyi// mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi// byang chub sems ni bla med pa// dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyis
413a4(rgyud 'grel): nas/ sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// bdag gis sdom pa mya lus gzung // mu sprul ba ni bsgralnga par bgyi// ma grol ba ni dgrol bar bgyi// dbugs ma phyung ba dbugs dbyung zhing // sems can mya ngan 'das
413a5(rgyud 'grel): la dgod// sdom pa gzung ba'o// deng khyod dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi rigasu zhugs kyis// ngas khyod la dpal he ru kA'i ye shes bskyed par bya ste/ ye shes gang gis khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams
413a6(rgyud 'grel): cad dang / dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur na dngos grub gzhan lta ci smos/ khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi mdun du smra bar mi byi ste/ dam tshig nyams par gyur te
413b1(rgyud 'grel): re/ he ru ka dpal deng khyod kyi snying la yang dag bzhugs par gyur// gal te tshul 'di smras na ni// de ma thag tu dral te gshegs// de nas dam tshig blung pa ni// ga bur tsan dan ldan pa dang // bde ba'i me tog tshur bcas pa/
413b2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun dang mkha' 'gro ma'i// slob ma blo gros brtan pA la// blangs te rgyun gyis de la sbyin// spyod pa legs pad+ma sbyang nas ni// gzi ma dang bcas pa 'di skad brjod// 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig
413b3(rgyud 'grel): 'das ni bsregs par byed// dam tshig bsrungs nu dngos grub ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'thob// oM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i tau da ka ThaHhUM/ deng nas brtsams te khyod kyi dpal he ru ka dA nyid yin gyis// gang 'di
413b4(rgyud 'grel): byos shig ces bsgo ba do khyod kyis bya'o// khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig/ khyod mi bde ba ma spangs par dus byas nas dmyal bar lhung bar 'gyur ta re// de nas dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyis byin
413b5(rgyud 'grel): gyis rlobs shig/ dpal he ru ka bdog la 'bab par mdzod cig ces smrar gzhug gau/ thang chu lnga rtsi leg swA sgyur ba'o// bskus shing gos ni legs brdungs dang / byi la'i rtug pa nyid dang ni// gu gul lhan cig sbyar
413b6(rgyud 'grel): nas ni// pad+ma'i snod du bzhag nas su// yi dgas me yis brdung bar bya// gnyis med gnyis mid sngags kyis ni// 'gyings bcas 'dug ste gzi ldan pa// sngar bshad rgyan dang ldan pa dang // de bzhin go cha bgos
414a1(rgyud 'grel): nas ni// 'kho lo kun gyi dpa' bo drang // rnal 'byor ma rnams de snying gzhug/ g.yas brkyang pa la legs bsdams pas// gnyis med sngags ni brjod nas ni// gdug pa de dag gsung
414a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis// skad cig de nyid dag la 'jug/ oM tiSh+Tha ma hA kro d+ha A be sha hU~M/ oM shri he ru kA ya pad+mi haM bid+hi rA dzA ya d+hi mo he swA hA/ zhes bya ba 'dis dpa' bo bskul bar bya'o// de nas lag pa gzung ba yis// mig phye
414a3(rgyud 'grel): nas ni blta bar bya// he ru ka dpal deng khyod kyis// mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad// oM badz+ra Ne tra ya a pa he ra pa Ta laM hUMHdkyil 'khor bzang po 'di lta ltos// da ni dang ba rab tu bskyed// khyod ni rnal
414a4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ma rigs skyes// sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs// 'gro ba phun sum tshogs kun dang // dngos grub phun tshogs khyod mngon 'gyur// dam tshig thams cad bskyang ba dang // gsang sngags la yang
414a5(rgyud 'grel): brtson par gyis// gang du me tog lhur gyur pa// dau yi gnas sogs bstan par bya// slob ma gzhug pa'o// // sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte bar bzhugs// gnyis med gnyis med pang nu gnas// brtan
414a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yo kun gyi bdag nyid can// spyod dang grol ba rab stsol ba// kun mkhyen kun mdzod gtso bo ste// dpa' bo che la bu khyod ltos// rnal 'byor ma la sogs pa'i tshogs// grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma lnga po// thod pa'i dum bu
414b1(rgyud 'grel): lasogs kun// 'khor lho mkha' la spyod pas bskor// rab tu gtum mo sogs yang dag 'khyud// gnyis po thugs kyi sprul pa yin// myu gu can la sogs pa kun// rnal 'byor ma brgyad gany+dzi su med/
414b2(rgyud 'grel): gsung ni rnam dag ngo bo yis// mi yi 'jig rten drug tu khyab// stobs po che sogs par gnas pa// grub pas sa 'og gnas pa yin// sku'i sprul par bshad pa ste/ chags po kun gyi rjes su
414b3(rgyud 'grel): chags// he ru ka dpal sogs 'khor la// g.yon nas 'khyud cing nu ma 'dzin// sku gsum zhes bya'i sprul pa ste// 'bring dang mchog dang tha ma'o// khwa la sogs pa brgyud pa yi// gzugs ni sgyu yis yang dag
414b4(rgyud 'grel): bstan// khro bo rnam rgyal lnga sogs brgyad// byang chub sum cu rtsa bdun sprul// mkha' la spyod dang sa la spyod// sa 'og dag gis ma mo brgyad// brgyad gnyis mchod pa'i lha mo ya~M si// lha rnams de nyid me chen pa yin/
414b5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid do// / de nas slob ma bla ma yi// zhabs la dad pas phyag 'tshal te// thal sbyar yon no phul ba yis// dbang bskur don du gsol ba gdab// he ru ka dpal dbang
414b6(rgyud 'grel): bskur ba// 'gro ba skyob phyir gzi brjid can// ji ltar yon tan 'byung gnas sogs// de bzhin bdag la de stsol cig/ dpa' bo chen po mi ldog pa'i// dbang bskur ba ni bdag la stsol// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir
415a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon bgyid// 'jug pa sgo yi lho phyogasu// he ru ka dpal bdag nyid sems// pad+ma 'dab brgyad steng du ni// seng ge'i khri sogs la bzhag ste// slob ma gnyis med
415a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyar ldan pa// sna tshogs stan la gzhag nas ni// gnyis med ye shes sems ldan gyis// me tog dbang bskur la sogs pa// thams cad cho ga bzhin sbyin zhing // dkyil 'khor lus nang chud par bya// phyag rgya
415a3(rgyud 'grel): lnga la sogs pa'i lus// he ru ka dpal bdag nyid sbrul// spyod dang brtul zhugs brtan pa dang // de bzhin gnyis med tshangs spyod bstan// steng du gdugs dkor bzung nas ni// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshogs kyi// bkra
415a4(rgyud 'grel): shis sgra yis gang ba yis// glu len rol mo snyan pa yis// ho ru ka dpal bdag nyid sbrul// rab tu 'bad de mchod par bya// dbang bskur bar gsolnga pa'o// rnal 'byor pA yis yungs kar ni// cho ga bzhin du yongs bzlas
415a5(rgyud 'grel): pas// gsang sngags brjod cing brdeg pa ste// he ru k+Sha dpal sogs gnyis med// bizlas nas dkyil 'khor thams cad ni// dkyil 'khor glu yis gru lan cing // gnyis med ye shes gzigs pa rnams// thams
415a6(rgyud 'grel): cang cho ga bzhin dbang bskur// yang na sngar gyi cho ga yis// rnam rgyal bum par brdeg par bya// 'dab ma'i rtse mos blangs nas ni// snga ma bzhin du dbang bskur zhing // gsang sngags nyi shu gnyis pa dang // sngar bsnyen pa yi
415b1(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis ni// he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor che// brtag mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur// yang na nus pa med gyur na// 'khor lo kun gyi lha rnams ni// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes can// nam mkha'i khams ni thams cad
415b2(rgyud 'grel): dgang // sngon mdzad pa yi shugs kyis ni// dgyes pa chen pos legs byon te// he ru ka dpal la sogs pa// bsgoms nas thams cad dbang bskur ro// bkra shis glu yi rnam pa dang // chang dang sha khu'i dga' ston gyi
415b3(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor ma kun dpa' bo rnams// gnyis med ye shes dag gis sbrul// lha yi rigs kyis mtshan pa yi// me tog ji bzhin gtor bar bya// me tig lhung ba blangs nas ni// slob ma'i mgo la bcing bar bya// 'dab
415b4(rgyud 'grel): ma'i rtse dang lag gnyis kyis// sngags pas bum pa bteg nas ni// lus dang gtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// cho ga bzhin du kun dbang bskur// de 'og rnam rgyal bum pa dang // dril bu sgra sgrogs glu yis ni//
415b5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma sogs kun// bsgom sA la thams cad dbang bskur ro// chu yis dbang bskur byin pa yis// sdig pa thams cad bkru bar bya'o// de nas rdo rje rgyu grum mgor// rAl po'i thor tshugs kyis
415b6(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa yis// dar dbyangs dbang bskur byin par bya// oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye badz+ra war+t+ta nI ye hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes brjod la 'khor lo thams cad kyi dpa' bo la sogs pa brjod
416a1(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi bskul ba'o// lag tu rang mtshan de nyid dang // mtshan ma'i dbang bskur sbyin par bya// he ru ka dpal dbang bskur bas// de ring khyod ni dbang bskur bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams
416a2(rgyud 'grel): da de// rab tu sgrub phyir rdo rje long // de nas 'diri rang gi mtshan ma'i dbang bskur sbyin par bya ste/ oM shrI he rA kaM a d+hi pa ti s+t+wa a b+hiShIny+tsa mi tiSh+Tha mi tiSh+Tha b+hi ra sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje
416a3(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' dga'i' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po'i bdag/ rdo rje'o// 'di ni rnal 'byor ma kun gyi// shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang /

416a6(rgyud 'grel): a d+hi pa ti trAM a b+hi Shiny+tsA si/ shrI hi ru na ma a b+hi She ka taM zhes bya ba dang / b+hI'i sgra dang bcas pas ming gi dbang bskur sbyin par bya'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de// he ru ka dpal phyophyig no gnas// khyod kyis kyang na

416b2(rgyud 'grel): T+wAM ga/ rnal 'byor ma ni Da ma ru// rdo rje kha ts+tsha rdo rje bcas// dril bu sil sil sgra sgrogs shing // tshangs pa'i skud thogs rnal 'byor bdag/ kha T+wAM gA dang rnal 'byor snod// dpa' bo chen pos blang bar gyis// dbang bskur ba

417a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang rang nyid de// sems can ma rig ljongs byas pa// ye shes sgron mas snang bar gyis// mar me'o// ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis// 'jig rten rab rib bsal ba ltar// bu khyod
417a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis ni mi shes pa'i// rab ring rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal// oM badz+rA Na tra yau A pa ha ra pa Ta lAM hrIHthur ma'o// chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste// dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med// gzung du med cing brjod

417b1(rgyud 'grel): langs sems bdag nyid// ma lus las ni byas nas kyang // bsrung dang bza' la sogs pa yi// sdom pa'i bdag nyid can bsrung ngo // lus dang srog la bltos med par// dam tshig dang ni sdom pa bsrung // nyin dang mtshan mo//
417b2(rgyud 'grel): lan gsuM guny+tsin+da re bzhi ni bzlas par bya gang tshe nyams na rnal 'byor pa// kha na ma tho sbom por 'gyur// dgun zla 'bring po nas brtsams te// zla ba re re bsrung bar ni// gnyis med gnyis med 'khor lor gnas// tshes
417b3(rgyud 'grel): bcu la ni de rab mchod// chang dang sha sogs gang ci'ang rung // dpa' bo rnal 'byor me'i tshogs// thams cad gnyis med pang na gnas// he ru ka dpal rab tu mchod// theg pa dman la 'dod mi bya// sems

417b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum bor du gsol ba gdab// bdag gi ma khyod bu yin te// ji srid byang chub byung bar du// byang chub yan lag nu ma las// byung ba'i rang gi 'o mas skyongs// gnyis medo ye shes spyod ldan pa'i// bslab pa blangs
418a1(rgyud 'grel): pa sngon 'gro ba'i// nad la sogs sngon 'gro bas// tshangs par spyod pa shin tu bsrung // dam tshig de la rtag tu bsrung // de sngon 'gro ba sbas pa'i gnas// spyod drang grol ba'i gnas 'dod
418a2(rgyud 'grel): pi'i/ yid la 'dod pa kun 'byung 'gyur// gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal bya// ji ltar bdag ni bgyis par 'tshal// dam tshig dang sdom pa bsrung ba'o// / 'dir dbang bskur ba'i slob ma ni// lag nas
418a3(rgyud 'grel): bzung nas gzi bcas pas// gnyis med ye shes bla med pa// ma lus don ni kun brjod bya// gnyis myed ye shes sems ldan la// mi bya ba ni ci yang med// tshangs par spyod pa rtag menos la// 'dod pa lnga ni spyang
418a4(rgyud 'grel): bar gyis// gnyis med la gnas zas la ni// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs brda// gnyis med pa dang thogs med pa// dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod pa bya// sna tshogs dbang phyug legs sbyang cing // tshangs par spyad pa de
418a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin no// khro ba med pa'i rgyun spyad pa// sgrub pa pos ni yongs su bsrung // rtag tu bsgrub la gnas nas ni// yul kun la ni rnal 'byor pa'i// gnas med grub pa'i rnal 'byor mo// mi brtan srog ni ji srid par
418a6(rgyud 'grel): bu khyod kyis ni bsgrub par bya// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la// ci dga' bar ni lo ngas spyod thams cang // he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor cher// bsams nas thams cad rab tu brtag/ bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams
418b1(rgyud 'grel): cad dang // rnal 'byor ma nI kun ku gyi gnas// de bsu 'bad pa thams cad kyis// he ru ka dpal bdag mchod do// 'dod chags byul ba lta bu yi// khams gsum na ni stag med pas// de bas 'dod la chags bral bar/
418b2(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis nam yang mi bya'o// bsrung ba'i dam tshig go// / g.yon pa yis ni chos gos mthu'// g.yas kyis mi 'jigs dbugs 'byin pa// he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor tshwa// 'khor lo thams cad
418b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par gnas// he ruM glu dpal lung ston bzhin// mgrin gcig tu ni thams cad kyis// 'di ltar nga yis lung bstan te// he ru dpal de bzhin gshegs// dngos po mchog tu grub pa'i phyir// srid pa'i ngan 'gro//
418b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams las bton// shrI he ru ka nA ma ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi sa ma ya s+t+waM b+huR+ShA ba sAHgang la tshigasu bcad pa 'dis don yod par grub pa'i phyag rgyas gnas pa las mchog tu gsang ba'i tshogs mgrin gcig tu rgyal ba rnams
418b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis lung ston par mdzad do// lung bstan pa dang gzong bstod pa'i// // khams gsum gyis ni rgyal spring che// rgyal ba'i bdag por bstan pa dang // deng ni bdud las rnal rgyal zhing // grong khyer mchog tu
418b6(rgyud 'grel): zhugs pa yis// deng ni sangs rgyas nyid thob par// khyed rnams the tshom med pa yin// dbang ni bskur ba tsam gyis ni// slob ma yon tan bdag por 'gyur// slob dpon nyid kyi bde ba yis// brtan g.yo kun gyi dam
419a1(rgyud 'grel): tshig yin// dbugs dbyung ba'o// // rta dang glang po shIng rta nor// nor bu byu ru mu tig sogs// yon gyi mchog ni blangs pa rnams// phyag byas nas nr-i dbul bar bya// de nas brtsams
419a2(rgyud 'grel): te bdag bran du// khyod la bdag ni phul ba lags// rang gi slob mar gyur pa dang // tsha yis kyang ni spyad du gsol// slob ma gus pa med pa yis// dngos grub ring bar the tshom med mos pa kun gyis slob ma yis// dang por yon
419a3(rgyud 'grel): gyis bya ba yin// gal te lha ni mnyes 'dod na// 'bad de bla ma mnyes par bya// dpa' bo ji bzhin rig de bzhin// rig pa ji bzhin bla ma 'dra// dpa' bo rig dang bla ma la// mchod pa'i 'bras bu mnyam pa yis// slob dpon
419a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi ni yon yin no// de bas 'dir ni mdor bsdus nas// me tog ldan zhing shin tu brlabs// shin tu gsang ba'i sa phyogs ni// khams lha dang ni yang dag ldan// phye mar byas te de thams cad// rdo rje lam du byug par bya/
419a5(rgyud 'grel): kun tu dga' la sogs pa bzhi// 'khor lo kun bdag rnal 'byor ldan// 'did chags chos las byung ba'i mgon// chags pa kun gyis rjes chags pas// pad+ma'i spyod du lag bzhag ste// rnal 'byor ma ni 'di skad smra/

419b1(rgyud 'grel): gsungs dam tshig bsten par ni// lA moM bdag gis byed par nus// pad+ma bi gas tha~M kr-i mug+ne kA shi bi ba sre kau me tog chur ldan dpa' bo y-is// rnal 'byor ma la rdo rje sbyin// de nas brtsamAs te bu khyod nI// brtul zhugs bzang

419b3(rgyud 'grel): rje rnal 'byor ma dpa' bo// gnyis med ye shes sems ldan la// dpa' bo las byung byang chub sems// rgyun gyis dbang ni bskur bar bya// 'di ni byang chub 'grub rnal 'byor// khams lnga bcud kyi bdag
419b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid can// he ru ka dpal bdag sbyor bas// yang dag bde ba myong bar gyis// gnyis med ye shes dbang po skur nI// gsang ba kun la sogs par bshad// 'di dag thams cad gasngal ba che// dbang bskur

419b6(rgyud 'grel): mchod 'grub 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhing sogs zhing rnams la// khyad par du ni sbyin la spyod// dmangs rigs stong phrag gnyis dag kyang // bram ze gtsang ma gtsog dang 'dra// bram ze stong phrag gnyis dag ni//
